1b1(mdo sde): susu//
1b2(mdo sde): sa sunan+thi ts+tsha d+hAR+R-i /sa su sto/
1b3(mdo sde): / Sh+T+r-iDU /
1b4(mdo sde):
2a1(mdo sde): //dge slong khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/zag pa
2a2(mdo sde): zad pa/nyon mongs pa med pa/dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/shes rab shAn
2a3(mdo sde): tu rnam par grol ba/cang shes pa/glang po chen po/bya ba byas pa/byed pa byas pa/khur bor ba/bdag gi don rjes
2a4(mdo sde): su thob pa/srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/yang dog pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/
2a5(mdo sde): sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/mngon par shes pa/mngon par shes pa'i nyan thos
2b1(mdo sde): chen po sha stag la 'di lta ste/tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang /tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang /tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang /tshe
2b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa ming chen dang /tshe dang ldan pa bzang po dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs
2b3(mdo sde): dang /tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srungs dang /tshe dang ldan pa ga yU 'od srungs dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /tshe dang ldan pa
2b4(mdo sde): mod+gal gyi bu chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa kA t+ya'i bu chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa na ma gru dang /tshe
2b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa ka pi na dang /tshe dang ldan pa ba ling bdag dang /tshe dang ldan pa pi lin+d+ra'i bu dang /tshe dang ldan pa be ku la dang /tshe dang
2b6(mdo sde): ldan pa gsus po che dang /tshe dang ldan pa b+ha ra d+h+wa dza dang /tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang /tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' dang /tshe dang ldan pa
3a1(mdo sde): /mdzes dga' dang /tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin
3a2(mdo sde): dang /de dag dang nyan thos chen po gzhan dag dang /slob pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /gzhan yang slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong
3a3(mdo sde): nyis stong dang /skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa dge slong ma drug stong dang /sgra gcan zin dang /dge slong ma grags 'dzin 'khor dang
3a4(mdo sde): bcas pa dang thabs cig go//byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
3a5(mdo sde): ldog pa/gzungs thob pa/spobs pa chen po la gnas pa/phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la
3a6(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byas pa/sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/sangs rgyas brgya stong mang pos yang dag par bstod pa/lus
3b1(mdo sde): dang ngag dang sems byams pas yongs su bsgos pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'dzud pa la mkhas pa/shes rab chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
3b2(mdo sde): rtogs par khong du chud pa/'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong mang por rnam par grags pa/srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yang dag par sgrol ba
3b3(mdo sde): sha stag la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang
3b4(mdo sde): phyug dang /byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang /byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad ces bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson dang /
3b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' brtson pa mi gtong ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen dang /byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po dang /byang chub
3b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sman yang dag 'phags dang /byang chub sems dpe' bkod pa'i rgyal po dang /byang chub sems dpa' rab tu sbyin pa dang /byang chub sems
3b7(mdo sde): dpa' rin che ni zla ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od dang /byang chub sems dpa' zla gang dang /byang chub sems dpa' gnon pa
4a1(mdo sde): chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas gnon dang /byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gsum gnon dang /byang chub sems dpa'
4a2(mdo sde): spobs pa chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' rtag par rgyun du brtson dang /byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin dang /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa dang /
4a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal dang /byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i rgyal po dang /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems
4a4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po seng ge dag dang yang thabs cig go/bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug 'di lta ste/bzod skyong dang /dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang /
4a5(mdo sde): ded dpon bzang po dang /mis byin dang /phug sbas dang /chus byin dang /dbang pos byin dang /bla ma'i blo gros dang /khyad par blo gros dang /'phel ba'i blo
4a6(mdo sde): brogros dang /mthong ba don yod dang /shin tu yang dag zhugs dang /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa dang /dpe med blo gros dang /nyi ma'i snying po dang /sa 'dzin
4a7(mdo sde): dag dang yang thabs cig ste/de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri dag dang yang thabs cig go/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /'khor lha'i
4b1(mdo sde): buny-i 'di lta ste/lha'i bu zla ba dang /lha'i bu nyi ma dang /kun tu dri dang /rin chen 'od dang /lha'i bu snad 'od dang /de dag la sogs pa lha'i bu nyi khyi dang yang thabs cig go/
4b2(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /'khor lha'i bu sum khri 'di lta ste/rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pa dang /rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang /rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang /
4b3(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang /lha'i bu dbang phyug dang /lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang /'khor lha'i bu sum khri dag dang yang thabs cig go//mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang
4b4(mdo sde): 'khor chungs ris kyi lha'i bu khri nyis stong 'di lta ste/tshangs pa gtsug phud can dang /tshangs pa skar ma'i 'od dang /de dag la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu khri nyis stong dang yang
4b5(mdo sde): thabs cig go//klu'i rgyal po brgyad 'di lta ste/klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /nyer dga' dang /rgya mtsho dang /nor rgyas kyi bu dang /'jog po dang /gzi can dang /ma dros
4b6(mdo sde): pa dang /klu'i rgyal po ut+pal dang /'khor klu bye ba brgya stong mang po dag dang yang thabs cig go//mau 'am ci'i rgyal po bzhi 'di lta ste/mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa dang /mi 'am
4b7(mdo sde): ci'i rgyal po chos chen dang /mi 'am ci'i rgyal po chos bzang dang /mi 'am ci'i rgyal po chos 'dzin dang /'khor mo 'am ci bye ba brgya stong mang po dag dang yang thabs cig go//dri za'i
5a1(mdo sde): ris kyi lha'i bu bzhi 'di lta ste/dri za yid du 'ong ba dang /yid 'ong dbyangs dang /'jam snyan dang /dri za dbyangs snyan dang /'khor dri za bye ba brgya stong mang po dag dang
5a2(mdo sde): yang thabs cig go/lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi 'di lta ste/lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs can dang /phrag rtsub dang /thag bzang ris dang /lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang /
5a3(mdo sde): 'khor lha ma yin bye ba brgya stong mang po dag dang yang thabs cig go//nam mkha' lding gi dbang po bzhi 'di lta ste/nam mkha' lding gi dbang po gzi brjid chen po dang /lus
5a4(mdo sde): chen po dang /rdzogs chen dang /nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'phrul chen thob dang /'khor nam mkha' lding bye ba brgya stong mang po dang yang thabs cig go/lus 'phags
5a5(mdo sde): ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang yang thabs cig go/de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/bsti
5a6(mdo sde): stang du byas/btsun par byas/ri mor byas/mchod par byas/brjed par byas/gsol ba byas te/nges par bstan pa chen po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
5a7(mdo sde): mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' la gdams pa/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba bshad de/chos kyi gdan de nyid la skyil mo krung bcas
5b1(mdo sde): nas/mtha' yas nges par bstan pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sku mi g.yo zhing sems mi g.yo bar gyur nas bzhugs so//bcom ldan 'das snyoms
5b2(mdo sde): par zhugs ma thag tu/bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man+da ra dang /man+da ra chen po dang /many+dzu Sha ka dang /many+dzu Sha ka chen po rnams kyi me tog gi char chen po mngon par bab
5b3(mdo sde): ste/bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor bzhi po de dag la 'thor ro//thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/'gul kun tu rab tu
5b4(mdo sde): 'gul/ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg/'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so//de'i tshe dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma dang /lha dang klu dang
5b5(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams dang /rgyal phran dang /stobs kyi 'khor
5b6(mdo sde): los sbyor ba dang /gling bzhi'i 'khor los sgyur ba gang dag 'khor der 'dus nas 'khod par gyur pa 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing 'khod
5b7(mdo sde): de ngo mtshar du gyur/rmad du gyur/shin tu dga' bar gyur to//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzad spu nas 'od zer gcig byung nas/de shar phyogs
6a1(mdo sde): su sangs rgyas kyi zhing khri brgyad stong du song ste/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po yan chad srid pa'i rtse mo man chad
6a2(mdo sde): 'od zer de'i 'od kyis shin tu khyab par snang ngo //sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi 'gro ba drug po de dag na sems can gang yod pa de dag thams cad ma lus par snang ngo //sangs
6a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ngo //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag chos gang
6a4(mdo sde): 'chad pa de dag thams cad kyang ma lus par grag go/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na dge slong dang dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma dang /rnal 'byor can
6a5(mdo sde): dang /rnal 'byor spyod pa gang dag 'bras bu thob pa dang /'bras bu ma thob pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ngo //sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
6a6(mdo sde): chen po gang dag nyan pa dang /dmigs pa dang /mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'i rgyu'i thabs mkhas pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de dag thams cad kyang
6a7(mdo sde): snang ngo //sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba de dag thams cad kyang snang ngo //sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na//
6b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi ring bsrel gyi mchod rten rin po che las byas pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ngo //de nas byang chub sems
6b2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma de bzhin gshegs pas ltas cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa 'di 'dir ci'i rgyur 'gyur zhig gu/ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das/
6b3(mdo sde): kyis ltas cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu 'di bstan te/bcom ldan 'das kyang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba chen po bsam
6b4(mdo sde): gyis ma khyab pa 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang snang bar gyur pa 'di'i don bdag gis su la dri 'di na don 'di'i lan ldan nus pa ni su yid snyam mo//de yang 'di snyam du 'jom dpal gzhon nur
6b5(mdo sde): gyur pa 'di sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa ste/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis sngon chad kyang
6b6(mdo sde): sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ltas 'di lta bu byung ba rnams mthong zhing sngon chad chos chen po'i 'bal ba'i gtam dag kyang myong bas
6b7(mdo sde): na/bdag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la de'i don dri'o snyam du sems so//dge slong dang dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor bzhi po de dag dang /lha dang klu dang /
7a1(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa mang po de dag kyang /bcom ldan
7a2(mdo sde): 'das kyi ltas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po'i snang ba 'di lta bu 'di mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur ltad mor gyur te 'di snyam du/bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe
7a3(mdo sde): 'phrul chen po'i snang ba 'di lta bu 'di bstan pa bdag cag gos su la dri snyam du sems so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas skad cig thang cig
7a4(mdo sde): yud tsam de nyid la 'khor bzhi po rnams kyi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal bcom ldan
7a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis lhas ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba rdzu 'phrul gyi snang ba 'di lta bu 'di bstan te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing khri brgyad stong po 'di dag rnam par bkra ba/mchog tu lta na sdug pa//
7a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa sngon du bzhud pa/de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su 'dren par snang ba 'di'i rgyu gang rten gang /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
7a7(mdo sde): byams pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//'jam dpal ci yi phyir na 'di lta bu//mi yi mgon pos 'od zer gcig po 'di//
7b1(mdo sde): zhal gyi smin mtshams kyi ni mdzod spu nas//shin tu snang ba'i 'od zer rab tu btang //lha rnams dga' bas tsan+dan phye ma dang //lha yi spos rab yid du 'ong ba dang //man+da ra dang many+dzu Sha kA yi//
7b2(mdo sde): me tog dag gi char chen rab tu pho ba//des ni sa 'di kun tu mdzes gyur cing //'khor bzhi 'di dag dga' ba rab tu thob//zhing rnams 'di dag thams cad rnam drug tu//shin tu 'jigs//
7b3(mdo sde): pa'i gzugs su kun nas g.yos//'od zer de yis shar gyi phyogs logs kyi//zhing ni stong phrag bco brgyad tshang ba rnams//skad cig gcig gis thams cad rab tu snang //zhing
7b4(mdo sde): rnams gser gyi kha dog bzhin du mdzes//mnar med yan chod srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar//zhing de dag na sems can ji snyed pa//'gro ba drug po de na yod pa rnams//gang dag der
7b5(mdo sde): yang shi 'pho skye ba rnams//de dag las kyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang //'gro ba bde dang mi bde rnams kyang snang //bzang po ngan pa de bzhin bar ma yang //'di na 'dug kyang de dag
7b6(mdo sde): thams cad mthong //sangs rgyas seng ge mi yi dbang po rnams//chos nyid rab ston rnam par dbye ba mthong //sems can bye ba mang la rab ston pa//snyan pa'i sgra dang dbyangs su gsung
7b7(mdo sde): ba dag/zab cing rgya che rmad du byung ba'i sgra//so so'i zhing rnams su yang rab tu 'byin//dpe dong gtan tshigs khrag khrig bye ba yis//sangs rgyas chos 'di rab tu ston pa ni//
8a1(mdo sde): sems can gang rnams sdug bsngal gzir ba dag/skye dang rga bas yid skyo mi shes la//'di ni dge slong sdug bsngal tha ma zhes//de la rab zhi mya ngan 'das pa ston//
8a2(mdo sde): mi rnams gang gis rgya che mthu thob cing //sangs rgyas mthong bas de bzhin bsod nams ldan//de dag la ni chos tshul 'di brjod cing //rang rgyal theg pa yang ni ston pa mdzad//
8a3(mdo sde): gzhan yang bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po gang //bla na med pa ye shes 'chol ba dag/bye ba sna tshogs rtag tu byed pa la//de dag la ni byang chub phyir bsngags gsung //'di na 'dug
8a4(mdo sde): bzhin de na 'di 'dra dang //khyad par gzhan yang stong phrag bye ba dag/shin tu mthong zhing thos te 'jam pa'i dbyangs//de dag las ni phyogs tsam smos par bya//bdag mthong zhing
8a5(mdo sde): rnams mang po de dag na'ang //byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i bye ma snyed//gang rnams bye ba stong phrag mi nyung ba//brtson 'grus rnam pa mang pos byang chub skyed//la la sbyin pa sbyin
8a6(mdo sde): pa'ang de bzhin te//nor dang 'gron bu gser dang dngul rnams dang //mu tig nor bu man shel byu ru dang //bran pho bran mo rta dang shing rta lug/de bzhin rin chen dog gis
8a7(mdo sde): brgyan pa'i khyogs//yongs su dga' ba'i yid kyis sbyin pa gtong //bdag cag gis kyang theg pa thob shog ces//byang chub mchog 'dir yongs su bsngo bar bya//sbyin pa
8b1(mdo sde): 'di 'dra 'di dag sbyin byas na//khams gsum nang na theg mchog khyad par can//sangs rgyas theg pa bde gshegs gang bsngags pa//de ni bdag gis myur du thob gyur cig/la las rta
8b2(mdo sde): bzhi can gyi shing rta la//kha khyer bcas pa me tog rgyal mtshan brgyan//rin chen dag las byas pa'i ba dan can//la las de lta bu yang sbyin pa byin//de bzhin bu dang chung ma rnams kyang byin///
8b3(mdo sde): la la phangs pa'i sha yang sbyin par byed//byang chub dam pa 'di ni 'tshal ba'i phyir//lag pa dang ni rkang pa blangs na byin//la la dag gi mgo dang la las mig/la la bdag gi lus mchog
8b4(mdo sde): rab kyang gtong //dang ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa rnams byin nas//de bzhin gshegs kyi ye shes don du gnyer//'jam dpal bdag gis mthong ba la la na//rgyal srid skyid pa rnam par spangs/
8b5(mdo sde): byas te//btsun mo'i 'khor dang de bzhin gling kun dang //gnyen dang blon po thams cad rnam spangs nas//'jig rten rnam par 'dren gyi drung dong ste//zhi ba'i phyir ni choso rab mchog 'dri
8b6(mdo sde): zhing //ngur smrig gos rnams rab tu gyon byed de//skra dang kha spu dag kyang 'dreg par byed//bdag mthong byang chub sems dpa' la la ni//dge slong gyur cing nags tshal gnas pa dag/
8b7(mdo sde): dgon pa stong pa rnams su gnas 'cha' zhing //la la lung nod kha ton byed la dga'//bdag mthong byang chub sems dpa' la la dag/ri sul dag tu zhugs pa'i brtan pa rnams//
9a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ye shes 'di la rnam par sgom//yongs su sems shing nye bar rtogs par byed//kha cig gis ni 'dod pa ma lus spangs//yongs bsgoms bdag nyid spyod yul/
9a2(mdo sde): rnam par dag/mngon par shes pa lnga yang der thob nas//bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po dgon par gnas//brtan pa la la rkang gshi bas der gnas te//'dren pa'i spyan sngar thol mo
9a3(mdo sde): sbyar byas nas//dga' ba bskyed de rgyal dbang rgyal po la//tshigs su bcad pa stong gis mngon par bstod//dran dang ldan zhing dul ba mi 'jigs pa//la la spyod pa phra ba shis pa dag/
9a4(mdo sde): rkang gnyis gtso la chos kyang 'dri bar byed//thos nas de dag chos rnams 'dzin par 'gyur//yongs bsgoms bdag nyid rgyal dbang sras po rnams//la la dag gis de dang der mthong ba//
9a5(mdo sde): dpe dang gtan tshigs khrag khrig du ma yis//srog chags bye ba mang la chos rnams ston//mchog tu dga' skyes chos rnams rab ston cing //byang chub sems dpa' mang po yang dag
9a6(mdo sde): 'dzud//bdud rnams stobs dang bzhon par bcas bcom ste//chos kyi rnga 'di shin tu rdung bar byed//la la bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa la//bder gshegs sras la lha mi gnod
9a7(mdo sde): sbyin dang //srin pos mchod kyang ngo mtshar mi 'dzin cing //snyems med zhi zhing rab zhi spyod pa mthong //phal cher nags gnas de bzhin gzhan dag kyang //snang ba'i 'od ni lus
9b1(mdo sde): las rab gtong ste//sems can dmyal nas sems can rnams 'don cing //de dag byang chub la yang yang dag 'dzud//rgyal ba'i sras po la la brtson 'grus gnas//kha cig gis kyang ma lus
9b2(mdo sde): gnyid spangs nas//'chag pa byed cing nags tshal gnas pa dag/de dag brtson pas byang chub mchog la zhugs//la la tshul khrims ma ral srung ba ni//rtag tu rnam dag nor bu rin chen bzhin//
9b3(mdo sde): la la spyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur//de dag khrims kyis byang chub mchog la zhugs//rgyal sras la la bzod pa'i stobs can te//dge slong nga rgyal can dag khro ba dang //de bzhin
9b4(mdo sde): gsho zhing sdigs pa'ang bzod par byed//bzod pas de dag byang chub mchog la zhugs//bdag mthong byang chub sems dpa' la la ni//rtsed mo dga' ba thams cad rnam spangs te//byis
9b5(mdo sde): pa'i grogs po rnams kyang yongs spangs nas//'phags pa rnams dang 'grogs dga' mnyam par bzhag/rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems ni rnam spangs nas//lo stong bye bar nags dang ri sul
9b6(mdo sde): na/rtse gcig sems su bsam gtan byed pa rnams//de dag bsam gtan byang chub mchog la zhugs//dge 'dun slob bcas rgyal ba mngon sum du//bza' dang bca' dang de bzhin
9b7(mdo sde): zas dang skom//na ba'i sman ni mi nyung mang po dag/kha cig de ltar sbyin pa sbyin par byed//dge 'dun slob bcas rgyal ba mngon sum du//de dag gos brgya bye ba sbyin par byed//la la stong
10a1(mdo sde): phrag bye ba brgya ri dang //rin thang med pa'i gos rnams rab tu 'bul//rin po che dang de bzhin tsan+dan gyi//gtsug lag khang ni bye ba brgya byas nas//stan dang mal cha
10a2(mdo sde): mang pos brgyan pa rnams//bde bar gshegs pa rnams la mngon sum 'bul//kun dga' ra ba yid 'ong gitsang ma rnams//me tog 'bras bu sna tshogs ldan pa dag/skyes bu
10a3(mdo sde): khyu mchog nyan thos bcas pa la//la la nyin par zhugs phyir rab tu 'bul//dga' ba skyes nas sna tshogs rnam mang po//de lta bu yi sbyin pa sbyin par byed//byin nas byang
10a4(mdo sde): chub phyir yang brtson 'grus bskyed//sbyin pas de dag byang chub mchog la zhugs//la la zhi tshwa'i ches kyang rab 'chad de//dpe dang gton tshi gos khrag khrig du ma yis//de
10a5(mdo sde): dag srog chags bye ba stong la ston//de dag ye shes byang chub mchog la zhugs//byed pa med pa'i chos rab shes pa ni//gnyis med rab zhugs nam mkha' mtshungs 'dra ba//
10a6(mdo sde): ma chags bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po rnams//de dag shes rab byang chub mchog la zhugs//bdag gis gzhan yang mthong ba 'jam pa'i dbyangs//bder gshegs mya
10a7(mdo sde): ngan 'das pa'i bstan pa la//byang chub sems dpa' brtan pa mang byung nas//rgyal ba'i ring bsrel dag la rim gro byed//mchod rten bye ba stong phrag mi nyung ba//ji ltar
10b1(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bzhin//gang gis bye ba zhing rnams rtag brgyan pa//rgyal sras de dag byed du 'jug pa mthong //rin chen sna bdun mchog gi rgyal mtshan gdugs//de na bye ba stong rnams
10b2(mdo sde): bsgreng ba ni//'phang du dpag tshad lnga stong phyin pa ste//khor yug tu ni dpag tshad nyis stong yod//rnam rgyal ba dan bcas pa khor mor mdzes//dril dang dril bu g.yar kha rtag tu
10b3(mdo sde): 'khrol//me tog dri dang de bzhin sil snyan gyis//lha mi srin po gnod sbyin rnams kyis mchod//yongs 'du shing gi me tog rgyas pa bzhin//de ltar phyogs bcu de dag mdzes
10b4(mdo sde): byas te//rgyal ba'i ring bsrel dag la 'di 'dra 'dir//bde gshegs sbas kyis mchod pa byed du btsud//rgyal bas 'od zer gcig po 'dri btang bas//lhar bcas 'jig
10b5(mdo sde): rten 'di dag rab rgyas pa//bdag dang srog chags bye ba mang po 'dis//'di na 'dug bzhin de dag thams cad mthong //gang gis 'od zer gcig pa der btang bas//zhing rnams
10b6(mdo sde): stong phrag mang por ston pa de//kye ma skyes bu khyu mchog de yi mthu//kye ma ye shes rgya che zag med do//rmad du byung ba tshad med 'di 'dra ba'i//ltas rnams mthong nas bdag cag
10b7(mdo sde): ngo mtshar gyur//'di yi don rnams 'jam dbyings rab ston te//sangs rgyas sras rnams the tshom gyur pa stsol//'khor bzhi 'di dag rab tu dga' sems kyis//dpa' bo
11a1(mdo sde): khyod dang bdag la mngon par lta//bde bar gshegs pas de ring ci yi phyir//snang ba 'di 'dra 'di ni rab tu btang //bde gshegs sras po khyod kyi lung ston
11a2(mdo sde): la//dga' ba skyed cing the tshom rnam par sol//'di ltar 'od zer rgya chen rab btang ba//de dag ci 'dra'i don du 'gyur ba zhig/bde bar gshegs pa skyes bu ngom pa yis//
11a3(mdo sde): byang chub snying por chos mchog gang brnyes pa//de dag 'jig rten mgon po 'dir 'chad dam//byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag lung ston tam//zhing rnams stong phrag du ma
11a4(mdo sde): gang bstan pa//sna tshogs rab tu bkri ba rin chen brgyan//mtha' yas spyan can sangs rgyas rnams snang ba//'di ni mi chung rgyur 'gyur gor ma chag/rgyal ba'i sras la byams
11a5(mdo sde): pas kun dris nas//lha mi gnod sbyin srin po de dag dga'//'jam dbyangs 'dir ni ci zhig lung ston ces//'khor rnams bzhi po de dag shin tu sdod//de nas 'jam dpal
11a6(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de la smras pa/rigs kyi bu dag 'di
11a7(mdo sde): ni de bzhin gshegs pa chos chen po bsgrags pa'i 'bel ba'i gtam mdzad par dgongs pa'o//rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi char chen po
11b1(mdo sde): mngon par 'bab pa dang /chos kyi rnga chen po rab tu brdung ba dang /chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng ba dang /chos kyi sgron ma chen po rab tu 'bar bar mdzad pa dang /chos kyi dung chen po
11b2(mdo sde): rab tu 'bud pa dang /chos kyi rnga bo che chen po rab tu brdung ba dang /chos bstan pa chen po mdzad par dgongs pa ste/rigs kyi bu dag bdag ji ltar spobs pa dang /ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin
11b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi snga ltas 'di lta bu 'di bdag gis mthong ste/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang /'od zer gyi
11b4(mdo sde): snang ba 'di btang bas/bdag ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'ang chos chen po bsgrag pa'i 'bel ba'i gtam mdzad par bzhed pa dang /chos chen po bsgrag pa thos par mdzad bzhed
11b5(mdo sde): pas 'di lta bu'i snga ltas 'di mdzad pa snyam byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad dang mi
11b6(mdo sde): mthun pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bsgrag par bzhed pas snga ltas cho 'phrul chen po 'od zer rab tu btang ba'i snang ba 'di lta bu 'di ston to//rigs kyi bu dag bdag gis dran pa'i dus na
11b7(mdo sde): bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa yangs pa dpag tu med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dpag gis mi lang ba tshad med pa de'i pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol tu gyur pa de'i tshe de'i
12a1(mdo sde): dus na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'du
12a2(mdo sde): ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyi zla sgron ma zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/des chos bstan pa tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dag ba
12a3(mdo sde): bar du dge ba tha mar dge ba don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba yang dag par ston te 'di lta ste/nyan thos rnams la ni skye ba
12a4(mdo sde): dang rga ba dang /na ba dang 'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa las shin tu 'da' ba'i phyir/mya ngan las 'das pa'i
12a5(mdo sde): mthar thug pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang ldan pa/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i chos ston to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ni bla na med
12a6(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las brtsams te/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa'i chos ston to//rigs kyi bu dgu de bzhin/
12a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma de'i pha rol gyi'ang ches pha rol na/yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
12b1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma zhes bya ba zhig 'jig rten du byung ste/ma pham pa 'di ltar snga rol dang snga rol brjod pa'i tshul 'dis/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
12b2(mdo sde): nyizla sgron ma zhes bya bar mtshan gcig pa rigs dang gdung gcig pa sha stag ste/'di ltar b+hA ra d+h+wa dzA'i rigs su mthun pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyi khri byung ngo //ma pham pa de la de
12b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa nyi khri po de dag thog ma'i de bzhin gshegs pa nas tha ma'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar du de dag gis chos bshad pa'ang tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dge ba bar du dge ba
12b4(mdo sde): tha mar dge ba don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba yang dag par ston te 'di lta ste/nyan thos rnams la ni skye ba dang rga ba dang na
12b5(mdo sde): ba dang 'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa las shin tu 'da' ba'i phyir/mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa 'phags pa'i
12b6(mdo sde): bden pa bzhi dang ldan pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i chos ston to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
12b7(mdo sde): las brtsams te/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa'i chos ston to//ma pham pa 'di ltar yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
13a1(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma de sngon gzhon nur gyur cing khab na bzhugs pa las mngon par ma byung ba'i tshe sras brgyad yod
13a2(mdo sde): par gyur te 'di lta ste/rgyal bu gzhon nu blo gros zhes bya ba dang /bzang po'i blo gros dang /mtha' yas blo gros dang /dkon mchog blo gros dang /khyad par blo gros dang /the
13a3(mdo sde): tshechom kun bcom dang /dbyangs kyi blo gros dang /rgyal bu gzhon nu chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba yod do//ma pham pa bcom ldan 'das nyi zla sgron ma do'i sras rgyal bu gzhon nu brgyad po de
13a4(mdo sde): dag rdzu 'phrul chen por gyur te/de dag re re'ang gling chen po bzhi la kun tu longs spyod par gyur cing de dag na rgyal po byed do//de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de khab nas
13a5(mdo sde): mngon par byung bar shes shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par thos nas/rgyal po'i longs spyod thams cad spangs
13a6(mdo sde): te/bcom ldan 'das de'i rjes su rab tu byung nas thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te chos smra bar gyur to//rgyal bu
13a7(mdo sde): gzhon nu de dag rtag tu tshangs par spyod cing sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur to//me pham pa de'i tshe na'ang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
13b1(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma des/nges par bstan pa chen po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams
13b2(mdo sde): la gdams pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba bshad nas/de'i tshe skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du chos kyi gdan chen po de nyid la skyil mo
13b3(mdo sde): krung bcas te/mtha' yas nges par bstan pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sku mi g.yo zhing sems mi g.yo bar gyur nas bzhugs so//bcom
13b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das de snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/bcom ldan 'das la me tog man+da ra ba dang man+da ra ba chen po dang /many+dzu Sha ka dang /many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang /lha'i me tog dag gis char
13b5(mdo sde): chen po mngon par bab ste/bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la mngon par gtor ro//thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par
13b6(mdo sde): gyur te/'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul/ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg/'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so//ma pham pa yang de'i tshe 'khor der dge slong dang dge slong ma dang /dge
13b7(mdo sde): bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma dang /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams dang /
14a1(mdo sde): rgyal phran dang /stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba dang /gling bzhi'i 'khor los sgyur ba rnams 'dus nas 'khod par gyur pa 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan
14a2(mdo sde): 'das la lta zhing ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur dga' bar gyur to//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla sgron ma'i smin mtshams kyi bar gyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer gcig
14a3(mdo sde): byung nas de shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi khrir byung ste/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad 'od zer de'i 'od kyis shin tu khyab par snang bar gyur te/ma pham pa 'di lta ste dper na/
14a4(mdo sde): de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dag snang bar gyur pa bzhin no//ma pham pa yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs 'bring na/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu 'khod pa dang /
14a5(mdo sde): 'khor de na chos nyan pa de dag 'od zer chen po'i snang ba des 'jig rten snang bar byas pa mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur te ltad mo tshar byung ngo //ma pham pa de'i tshe na yang bcom
14a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od mchog ces bya ba byung ste de'i slob ma brgyad brgya yod do//bcom ldan 'das de'ang ting nge 'dzin de las
14a7(mdo sde): bzhengs nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od mchog la brtsams te/dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par ston te/bar gyi bskal pa drug cu tshang bar gdan
14b1(mdo sde): gcig la bzhugs nas sku mi bskyod/sems mi g.yo bar bshad do//'khor de dag thams cad kyang stan gcig la 'khod de/lus mi bskyod sems mi g.yo bar bar gyi bskal pa drug
14b2(mdo sde): cur bcom ldan 'das de la chos nyan te/'khor de na sems can 'ga' yang lus ngal ba'ang med/sems skyo ba'ang med do//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
14b3(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron mas bar gyi bskal pa drug cu 'das kyi bar du/dam po'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa chen
14b4(mdo sde): po byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams pa/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba bshad nas/skad cig de nyid la mya ngan las 'da'o zhes lha dang bcas bdud dang
14b5(mdo sde): bcas tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i mdun du/dge slong dag do mod nam gyi gung thun la de bzhin gshegs pa phung po'i lhag
14b6(mdo sde): ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes gsungs so//ma pham pa de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
14b7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma des/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan
15a1(mdo sde): nas 'khor de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po 'di/nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
15a2(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i spyan zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar gsungs
15a3(mdo sde): so//ma pham pa de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla'i sgron ma de'i nub mo nam gyi gung thun la/phung po'i
15a4(mdo sde): lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so//dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
15a5(mdo sde): chen po 'od mchog des blangs te/bar gyi bskal pa brgyad cu'i bar du/bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa de'i bstan pa la yang dag par bstan to//ma pham pa de la
15a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de'i sras blo gros la sogs pa brgyad po de dag byang chub sems dpa' 'od mchog de'i slob mar gyur te/des de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
15a7(mdo sde): byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so//de dag gis de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po mthong ste/bkur sti byas nas de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa
15b1(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/de dag gi tha ma'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad yin no//slob ma
15b2(mdo sde): brgyad brgya po de dag las gcig rnyed pa la rab tu gdu ba bkur sti la gdu ba shes kyi khe la gdu ba grags pa 'dod pas de la bstan pa/bstan pa'i tshig dang /yi ge mi zin mi chags te de'i
15b3(mdo sde): ming yang grags 'dod ces bya bar gyur to//des kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po mnyes par byas so//mnyes par byas nas bsti stang byas btsun par
15b4(mdo sde): byas ri mor byas mchod pa dang /bkur ba dang /rim gro byas so//ma pham pa de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' 'od mchog ces bya ba chos smra bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin
15b5(mdo sde): pa snyam du khyod som nyi 'am yid gnyis sam the tshom za bar gyur na de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kho bo de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' 'od mchog ces bya ba chos smra bar
15b6(mdo sde): gyur to//gang yang byang chub sems dpa' grags 'dod ces bya ba le lo can du gyur pa de ni/ma pham pa khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/byang chub sems dpa' grags 'dod ces bya ba
15b7(mdo sde): le lo can du gyur pa yin no//ma pham pa de ltar kho bos rnam grangs 'dis na bcom ldan 'das kyi snga ltas 'di lta bu'i 'od zer btang ba mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das kyang dam pa'i
16a1(mdo sde): chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa chen po de bshad par bzhed pa skum byed do//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa don de nyid
16a2(mdo sde): rgyas par ston cing de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//'das pa'i dus rnams rjes su dran pa ni//tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab bskal pa na//de tshe rgyal ba byung ba skye dgu'i
16a3(mdo sde): mchog/mtshan ni nyi zla sgron ma zhes bya ba//skye dgu 'dren pa de ni chos ston te//sems can mtha' yas bye ba rnam par 'dul//byang chub sems dpa' bsam yas bye bo stong //ming
16a4(mdo sde): po de dag ye shes yang dag 'dzud//rnam par 'dren pa gzhon nur gyur pa yi//de tshe de yi sras gyur rgyal po dag/thub chen rab tu byung ba de mthong nas//'dod spangs thams cad mur
16a5(mdo sde): bar rab tu byung //'jig rten mgon po de yi chos bshad pa//mtha' yas nges par bstan pa mdo sde mchog/de ming shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo zhes bya//srog chags stong phrag bye
16a6(mdo sde): bdag la ston//rnam par 'dren pa de yis bshad ma thag/de tshe skad cig skyil mo krung bcas nas//mtha' yas nges bstan ting 'dzin dam pa la//thub mchog chos gdon
16a7(mdo sde): bzhugs nas bsam gtan mdzad//lha yi me tog man+da ra ba 'bab//ma brdungs par ni rnga yi sgra yang byung //lha dang gnod sbyin par snang gnas 'khod pa//rkang gnyis dam pa
16b1(mdo sde): la ni mchod pa byed//zhing rnams thams cad de ma thag tu g.yos//de na ngo mtshar rmad du byung bar gyur//smin mtshams nas ni shin tu mdzes pa yi//'dren pas 'od zer gcig po rab btang
16b2(mdo sde): ba//shar gyi phyogs su 'od zer de song bas//zhing rnams stong phrag bco brgyad tshang po dag/rab tu snang bas 'jig rten thams cad mdzes//sems can rnams kyi shi 'pho skye ba skyon//
16b3(mdo sde): rnam par 'dren pa'i 'od zer de yi mthus//de ltar de na la la rin chen zhing //de bzhin kha dog bai DUr+ya yi mdog/lta na sdug pa sna tshogs snang bar gyur//lha dang mi dang de bzhin gnod
16b4(mdo sde): sbyin klu//lha yi bu mo dri za mi 'am ci//grang rnams bde bar gshegs la mchod brtson pa//de dag 'jig rten khams na mchod byed snang //sangs rgyas rang 'byung de dag nyid kyang snang ///
16b5(mdo sde): goser gyi mchod sdong lta bur lta na sdug/bai DUr+ya yi dbus na gser gzugs bzhin//'khor gyi dbus na chos ni rab tu gsung //de na nyan thos grangs yod ma yin te//bde gshegs
16b6(mdo sde): nyan thos de snyed tshad med pa//so so'i zhing du rnam par 'dren pa yi//'od zer 'od kyis de dag thams cad ston//brtson 'grus ldan zhing tshul khrims ma nyams te//tshul khrims
16b7(mdo sde): skyon med nor bu rin chen 'dra//mi mgon sras dag ri yi sul dag na//gnas shing spyod pa de dag snang bar gyur//bdog pa thams cad ma lus yongs su gtong //brtan pa bzod
17a1(mdo sde): pa'i stobs can pasam gtan dga'//byang chub sems dpa' gad+hA'i bu skyed mang //'od zer de las thams cad rab tu snang //bskyod pa med cing g.yo ba med par yang //radza/
17a2(mdo sde): nas bsam gtan dga' zhing mnyam par bzhag/de dag bsam gtan byang chub mchog zhugs pa//bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs kyi spos rnams snang //yang dge zhi ba zag pa
17a3(mdo sde): med pa'i gnas//shin tu shes nas yang dag rab ston te//'jig rten khams mang du ni chos kyang 'chad//de 'dra'i byed pa bder gshegs mthu yis byung //nyi ma zla ba sgron ma
17a4(mdo sde): de yi mthus//skyong ba'i 'khor bzhis de dag mthong nas su//de tshe thams cad dga' bar gnas gyur te//'di ltar ci zhig ces ni phan tshun 'dri//gnod sbyin lha mis de mchod
17a5(mdo sde): mi ring bar//'jog rten 'dren pa ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs//chos smra byang chub sems dpa' gang mkhas pa//'od mchog smras la de tshe 'di skad gsungs//mkhas pa khyod ni
17a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten mig dang lam//nga yi chos 'dzin shin tu yid brtan pas//ji ltar srog chags phan phyir ngas bshad pa//nga yi chos mdzod 'di la khyod mngon sum//byang chub
17a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' mang po kun bkod de//dga' bar byas shing shin tu bsngags bstod nas//bar gyi bskal pa drug cu chang bar ni//de tshe rgyal ba de yis chos mchog bshad//gdan
17b1(mdo sde): gcig steng bzhugs 'jig rten mgon po yis//chos mchog dam pa dag ni gang bshad pa//de dag thams cad 'od mchog rgyal ba'i sras//chos smrar gyur pa de yis shin tu bzung //rgyal ba
17b2(mdo sde): des ni chos kyi mchog bshad de//skye bo du ma rab tu dga' byas nas//de yi nyin par lhar bcas 'jig rten mdun//rnam par 'dren pa de ni 'di skad gsung //nga yis chos kyi tshul 'di rab
17b3(mdo sde): bstan te//chos kyi rang bzhin ci 'dro bshad zin gyis//dge slong do nub nam gyi gung thun la//nga ni mya ngan 'da' ba'i dus la bab//nga yi bstan pa 'di la rab sbyor la//bag med ma yin dad
17b4(mdo sde): pa snying por gyis//bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'das par yang //rgyal ba drang srong chen po rnyed par dka'//rkang gnyis dam pa shin tu myur ba ru//mya ngan las ni 'da' ba'i sgra thos nas//
17b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas sras rnams mang po mya ngan skyes//sdug bsngal rab dang shin tu ldan par gyur//srog chags bsam yas bye mang de dag la//mi yi dbang po rgyal pos dbugs phyung ba//mya
17b6(mdo sde): ngan nga 'das dge slong ma 'jigs shing //nga yi 'og tu sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni//byang chub sems dpa' dpal snying mkhas pa 'di//zag med ye shes 'di ni rtogs par rig/nga yi byang
17b7(mdo sde): chub mchog rab 'thob 'gyur te//spyan dang yan lag dri med rgyal bar 'ong //de tshe de yi nam gyi gung thun la//rgyu zad me dang 'dra bar mya ngan 'das//de yi sku gdung shin tu rgyas gyur to//
18a1(mdo sde): mchod rten bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas so//de na dge slong de bzhin dge slong ma//gang rnams byang chub mchog la rab zhugs shing //bde gshegs de yi bstan la mngon//
18a2(mdo sde): brtson pa//de dag mi nyung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed//de tshe chos smrar gang gyur dge slong ni//gang gis chos de bzung ba 'od mchog ste//bar gyi bskal pa brgyad cu tshang bar des//bskal
18a3(mdo sde): pa de la chos mchog rab tu ston//de yi slob mar gyur pa brgyad brgya dag/de dag thams cad yongs su smin par byas//de dag sangs rgyas bye ba mang po mthong //drang srong chen
18a4(mdo sde): po de dag bkur sti byas//de tshe spyad pa rjes su mthun spyad na//'jig rten mang po khams su sangs rgyas gyur//gcig 'og gcig tu de dag rjes bzhin du//byang chub mchog tu
18a5(mdo sde): gcig gis gcig lung bstan//sangs rgyas de dag rim gyis byung ba yi//tha mar gyur pa mar maM mdzad pa ste//lha yi lha mchog drang srong mang po'i mchog/srog chags
18a6(mdo sde): bye ba stong yang rnam par rabatul//gang sngon bde bar gshegs pa de yi sras//de yi tshe na 'od mchog chos smra ba'i//slob ma sred dang ldan zhing le lo can//shes kyi khe dang
18a7(mdo sde): rnyed pa 'tshol ba dang //shin tu grags pa 'dod pa'i shas che zhing //grong nas grong du rgyu bar gyur pa ste//de yi kha ton lung nos de bzhin kun//de yi tshe na bshad pa rnams
18b1(mdo sde): mi zin//de yi ming yang 'di zhes bya bar gyur//grags pa 'dod ces phyogs su rnam par grags//de yang dge ba rnams kyi las de dag/'dren mar gyur pa mngon par 'dus byas pas/
18b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas stong phrag bye ba mnyes byas te//de dag mchod pa rgya cher byas par gyur//rjes su mthun pa'i spyod pa rab spyad nas//sangs rgyas shAkya seng ge 'di yang mthong //de ni 'dir
18b3(mdo sde): yang tha mar byung ba ste//rjes bzhin byang chub mchog kyang 'thob 'gyur ba//byams pa'i rigs su bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur//srog chags stong phrag bye ba rnam par 'dul//bder
18b4(mdo sde): gshegs mya ngan 'das pa'i bstan pa la//de tshe la lo can du gang gyur pa//don de 'drar gyur pa khyod nyid do//de tshe chos smrar gyur pa kho bo ste//kho bos de dang de yi rgyu dang gzhis//
18b5(mdo sde): ye shes grags pa de yi ltas byung ba//sngon tshe de na kho bos mthong gyur pa//de 'dra'i ltas 'dra dang yang mthong bas na//nges par rgyal ba'i dbang po kun tu spyan//shAkya'i rgyal chen ngon
18b6(mdo sde): dam gzigs pas kyang //de tshe kho bos rnam grangs mchog thos gang //de dag nyid ni 'dis kyang bshad par dgongs//de yi ltas nyid de ring yongs rdzogs kyis//rnam par 'dren
18b7(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa//shAkya seng ge yang dag 'jog mdzad de//chos kyi dbyings nyid phyag rgya ston par 'gyur//thal mo sbyar te sems bzang brtson par gyis//'jig rten
19a1(mdo sde): phan zhing thugs brtse gnon gyur te//mtha' yas pa yi chos kyi char pa bab//gang dag byang chub phyir zhugs ngoms par mdzad//byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 'dir
19a2(mdo sde): zhugs pa//gang dag mkhas pa nyid las skyes gyur pa//de dag rnams kyi som nyi gang yin dang //yid gnyis the tshom gang yin de sel gyur//dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam
19a3(mdo sde): /grangs las gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o////dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po//bam po gnyis pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen
19a4(mdo sde): bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs so//bzhengs nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
19a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams kyis thugs su chud pa/sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni zab pa mthong bar dka' ba rtogs par dka' ba ste/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shes par dka'o///
19a6(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur
19a7(mdo sde): mdzad mdzad pa/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa spyad spyad pa/yun ring po nas rjes su zhugs pa/brtson
19b1(mdo sde): 'grus mdzad mdzad pa ste/ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan zhing shes par dka' ba'i chos rnams mkhyen pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
19b2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ldem por dgongs te bshad pa ni shes par dka'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rang gis rig pa'i chos rnams thabs mkhas pa dang /ye shes mthong ba dang /rgyu dang
19b3(mdo sde): gzhi dang dmigs pa dang /nges pa'i tshig dang /rnam par rig byed sna tshogs kyis yang dag par ston te/thabs mkhas pa de dang de dag gis sems can de dang de la chags pa rnams rab tu
19b4(mdo sde): 'grel pa'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni thabs mkhas pa chen po dang /ye shes mthong ba dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin
19b5(mdo sde): pa'o//shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang /stobs dang /
19b6(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa dang ma 'dres pa dang dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rmad du byung ba'i
19b7(mdo sde): chos dang ldan te/chos rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa'o//shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni ngo mtshar chen//
20a1(mdo sde): po brnyas pa'o//shA ri'i bud tsam gyis bshad pa chog par gyis shig/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
20a2(mdo sde): rnams ni ngo mtshar mchog brnyes pa ste/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang mkhyen pa'i chos de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la 'chad do//
20a3(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu chos thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ston to//chos thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen te chos de dag gang yin pa dang /chos de dag rje
20a4(mdo sde): lta bu yin pa dang /chos de dag ci 'dra ba dang /chos de dag gis mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang /chos de dag gi ngo bo nyid ci yin pa dang /chos de dag gang yin pa dang /ji lta bu yin
20a5(mdo sde): pa dang ci 'dra ba dang /mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang ngo bo nyid ci yin pa'ang mkhyen to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgyas par ston cing de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
20a6(mdo sde): bka' stsal to//lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten na//dpa' bo chen po dpag med pa//rnam 'dren sems can thams cad kyis//rnam pa kun tu shes mi nus//de dag stobs dang
20a7(mdo sde): rnam thar dang //'jigs med gang dag ci 'dra dang //sangs rgyas chos rnams ci 'dra ba//sus kyang shes par mi nus so//sangs rgyas bye ba gang dag na//zab cing shin tu phra ba
20b1(mdo sde): dang //rig dka' mthong bar dka' ba yi//spyod pa dag ni sngan chad bsnyen//bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su//spyod pa de dag spyad pa yi//'bras bu de ni ci 'dra ba//byang chub snying por
20b2(mdo sde): ngas mthong ngo //da ni 'jig rten rnam 'dren pa//gzhan dag na ni ngas kyang de//ci lta yin dang ci 'dra dang //de yi mtshan nyid ci 'dra shes//de ni bstan du mi nus te//de ni brjod du yong med do///
20b3(mdo sde): mos pa la ni gang gnas pa//byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par//gang la chos de bstan pa dang //bstan pa dag kyang shes pa yi//de 'dra'i sems can su yang ni//'jig rten dag
20b4(mdo sde): na yod ma yin//gang dag 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i nyan thos pa//lhag par byas pa bde bar gshegs pas bsngags//zag zad tha ma'i lus 'dzin de dag gi/yul ni rgyal ba'i ye shes 'di
20b5(mdo sde): la med//gal te 'jig rten de dag thams cad du//shA ri'i bu dang 'dra bas gang gyur te//gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas rnam bsams kyang //de dag bder gshegs ye shes shes mi nus//
20b6(mdo sde): gal te khyod dang 'dra ba'i mkhas rnams kyis//phyogs rnams bcu car gang bar gyur pa dang //gang yang nga yi nyan thos 'di gzhan rnams//de dag gis kyang de bzhin gang gyur te//de dag thams cad/
20b7(mdo sde): gcig tu deng 'dus nas//bde bar gshegs pa'i ye shes rnams bsams kyang //ji tsam tshad med ye shes ngas shes pa//thams cad 'dus pas shes par mi nus so//zag pa med
21a1(mdo sde): par gyur pa'i rang sangs rgyas//dbang po rno ba tha ma'i lus 'dzin pas//ji ltar smig dang 'dam bu'i tshal bzhin du//phyogs bcu thams cad gang bar gyur pa dag/gcig
21a2(mdo sde): tu'adus nas rnam par bsams byas kyang //nga yi chos kyi mchog gi phyogs tsam yang //bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas su//de yi yang dag don ni yong mi shes//byang chub
21a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' theg par gsar zhugs pa//sangs rgyas bye ba mang la bya ba byas//shin tu nges don chos smra mang po rnams//de dag gis kyang phyogs bcu gang gyur te//smig dang
21a4(mdo sde): 'dam bu bzhin du 'jig rten kun//bar mtshams med par rtag tu gang gyur la//gcig tu 'dus nas rnam par sems byed cing //shes rab phra bas gzhan du mi sems par//
21a5(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba mang po dpag med pa//gang+gA'i bye ma snyed du bsam byas kyang //chos gang bde bar gshegs pas mngon gzigs pa//'di la de dag rnams kyi yul med do//phyir/
21a6(mdo sde): mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang //mi nyung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed rnams kyis//gzhan du mi sems rnam par bsams byas kyang //'di la de dag gi yang yul med do//zab cing
21a7(mdo sde): shin tu phra ba'i chos rtogs shing //rtog pa med la thams cad zag med pa//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rgyal ba de dag dang //ngas ni 'di na de dag ci 'dra shes//gzhan min
21b1(mdo sde): gsung ba rgyal ba drang srong che//yun ring dus na mchog gi don 'chad kyis//bde bar gshegs pas gang bstan de la ni//mos pa phun sum tshogs 'byor shA ri'i bu//nyan thos pa ni
21b2(mdo sde): 'di dag thams cad dang //rang sangs rgyas su mi gang zhugs pa dang //mya ngan 'das la ngas ni gang bkod cing //sdug bsngal rgyud las yang dag dkrol li bsko'o//gang phyir 'jig
21b3(mdo sde): rten du ni chos mang bshad//de dang de la chags pa rab dkrol zhing //theg pa gsum dag nye bar bstan pa ni//de dag nga yi thabs mkhas mchog yin no//de nas 'khor don kun shes
21b4(mdo sde): kaukoN+Di n+ya la sogs pa nyan thos chen po gang dag dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa dbang dang ldan par gyur pa stong nyis brgya dang /gzhan yang gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa la zhugs pa'i dge
21b5(mdo sde): slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma dag dang /gang yang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pa de dag thams cad 'di snyam du sems te/bcom ldan 'das kyis
21b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa cher bsngags pa dang /chos zab mo de yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes gsung zhing nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams
21b7(mdo sde): cad kyis shes par dka'o zhes gsungs pa'i rgyu ni gang /gzhi ni ci zhig/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par grol ba gcig go//zhes bka' stsal to//bdag cag rnams kyang sangs
22a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos rnams rnyed par 'gyur zhing mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa yin mod kyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa de'i don bdag cag gis ma rig go snyam mo//de nas
22a2(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'khor bzhi po de dag som nyi dang the tshom za bar rig ste sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas//bdag nyid kyang chos la the tshom za bar gyur te de'i
22a3(mdo sde): tshe bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa mkhyen pa'i chos bstan pa yang dang /
22a4(mdo sde): yang bsngags pa mdzad pa dang /chos zab mo ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bgyi ba dang /ldem por dgongs te bshad pa'ang shes par dka'o zhes yang dang yang gsungs
22a5(mdo sde): pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu sngan chad ma thos te/bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po 'di dag kyang the tshom dang som nyi
22a6(mdo sde): 'tshal na/de bzhin gshegs pas ci la dgongs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos zab mo yang dang yang gsung ba mdzad pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par bshad du gsol/de
22a7(mdo sde): nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to//stobs dang rnam thar bsam gtan dag/dpag tu med pa ngas thob ces//ring nas mi yi nyi ma yis//deng
22b1(mdo sde): gdod bka' mchid 'di 'dra mdzad//khyod la zhu ba ma mchis par//byang chub snying po'ang brjod pa mdzad//khyod la su yang mi zhu bar//ldem por dgongs te bshad pa brjod//ma nus par ni
22b2(mdo sde): gsung mdzad de//nyid kyi spyod pa bsngags pa mdzad//ye shes brnyes pa brjod mdzad cing //zab mo dag kyang rab bshad pas//dbang ldan gyur cing zag med pa//mya ngan 'das par gang //
22b3(mdo sde): bzhugs rnams//rgyal ba ci zhig gsung snyam ste//de ring 'di dag the tshom 'gyur//rang rgyal byang chub gang 'tshal ba//dge slong de bzhin dge slong ma//lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang //lto
22b4(mdo sde): 'phye che dang dri za dag/the tshom 'tshal zhing rnam sems te//de dag phan tshun gtam mchi zhing //rkang gnyis mchog la rab lta na//thub pa chen po lung bstan gsol//bde bar gshegs
22b5(mdo sde): pa'i nyan thos rnams//'di na ji snyed mchis pa kun//de yi nang na bdag mchog ces//drang srong mchog gis bstan lags na//mi yi gtso bo nyid kyi gnas//'di la bdag kyang tha
22b6(mdo sde): chom 'tshal//mya ngan 'das mthar bdag phyir tam//'on te bdag la spyod bstan tam//rnga mchog dbyangs kyis rab tu gsung phyung ste//chos 'di ji lta lags pa bshad du gsol//
22b7(mdo sde): rgyal sras thugs sras mchis pa 'di dag rnams//thal mo sbyar bar bgyis nas rgyal la lta//lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin srin por bcas//bye ba stong phrag gang+gA'i bye ma snyed//byang chub
23a1(mdo sde): mchog 'di 'tshal ba gang lags pa//brgyad khri tshang bar gang mchis de dag dang //sa bdag 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang //bye ba stong gi zhing nas lhags pa dag/
23a2(mdo sde): spyod pa ji ltar yongs su rdzogs bgyi zhes//thams cad thal mo sbyar te gus par mchis//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces
23a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal to//shA ri'i bu don 'di bshad pas ci zhig bya/de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu don 'di bshad na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dngangs par 'gyur ro//yang tshe dang ldan pa
23a4(mdo sde): shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la lan gnyis su gsol ba btab pa/don 'di nyid bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol//bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/de ci'i slad du zhe na/
23a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di na srog chags brgya phrag mang po/srog chags stong phrag mang po/srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po/srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po sngon gyi
23a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mthong ba shes rab dang ldan pa gang dag/bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa la dad pa dang yid ches pa dang 'dzin par 'gyur ba mchis so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
23a7(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol to//srog chags stong rnams 'khor na mchis pa dag/dad dga' bde bar gshegs la gus pa ste//khyod kyi chos bstan de dag 'tshal bar 'gyur//
23b1(mdo sde): mi dbang rgyal po gsal bar bshad du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la lan gnyis su yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ri'i bu don 'di bshad pas ci
23b2(mdo sde): zhig bya/shA ri'i bu don 'di bshad na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di dngangs par 'gyur te/dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du gyur pa rnams g.yang sa chen por lhung bar 'gyur ro//de nas
23b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//nga yi chos 'di bshad pas chog/ye shes 'di phra ba rtag mi nus//byis pa mang 'khod nga rgyal can//nga yis
23b4(mdo sde): chos bshad mi shes spong //de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du yang gsol ba btab pa don 'di nyid bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/bde bar
23b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa bshad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di na bdag dang 'dra ba brgya phrag mang du mchis so//bcom ldan 'das srog chags brgya phrag mang po srog chags stong phrag mang
23b6(mdo sde): po srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po/srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi srid pa dag na yongs su smin par mdzad pa gzhan dag kyang mchis te/bcom
23b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bshad pa la dad par 'gyur yid ches par 'gyur 'dzin par 'gyur ro//de'ang de dag gi yun ring po'i don dang sman pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro//de nas tshe dang ldan pa
24a1(mdo sde): shA ri'i bus de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to//rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gis chos bshad gsol//khyod la sras kyi thu bo bdag gsol pa//'di na
24a2(mdo sde): srog chags bye ba stong mchis pa//de dag khyod kyis chos bshad 'di dad 'gyur//sngon gyi srid pa rnams su khyod kyis gang //yun ring rtag tu sems can smin mdzad pa//de kun thal mo
24a3(mdo sde): sbyar te 'di na mchis//de dag chos 'di la ni dad par 'gyur//bdag 'dra brgya phrag bcu gnyis 'di dag dang //gang dag byang chub mchog tu zhugs pa dag/de la gzigs nas bde
24a4(mdo sde): gshegs rab bshad de//de dag dga' ba mchog kyang bskyed du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lan gsum du gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/tshe dang
24a5(mdo sde): ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ri'i bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum gyi bar du gsol ba 'debs na/shA ri'i bu de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa
24a6(mdo sde): la khyod la ji skad byas/shA ri'i bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' de stsal ma thag tu/'khor
24a7(mdo sde): de nas dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma lhag pa'i nga rgyal can lnga stong stan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal nas
24b1(mdo sde): 'khor de nas dong ngo //'di ltar lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba ma thob par ni thob par 'du shes/khong du ma chud par ni khong du chud par 'du shes pa de dag rang gi skyon shes te/'khor de nas/
24b2(mdo sde): dong ba la bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ri'i bu nga'i 'khor shin te ma
24b3(mdo sde): med par gyur te/shA ri'i bu snying po ma yin pa med par gyur la dad pa'i snying po la gnas te lhag pa'i nga rgyal can dag dong ba'ang legs so//shA ri'i bu de lta bas na de'i don bshad do//bcom
24b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni
24b5(mdo sde): brgya la res 'ga' zhig 'di lta bu'i chos bstan pa gsung ngo //'di lta ste dper na/u dum+ba ra'i tshal la me tog ni brgya la res 'ga' 'byung ngo //shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'ang brgya
24b6(mdo sde): la res 'ga' zhig chos bstan pa 'di lta bu gsung ngo //shA ri'i bu nga la yid ches par gyis shig nga ni bden par smra ba'o//nga ni yang dag par smra ba'o//nga ni gzhan ma yin par smra ba'o//
24b7(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldem por dgongs te bshad pa'i don khong du chud par dka'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu ngas nges pa'i tshig dang bstan pa dang brjod pa dang dpe sna
25a1(mdo sde): tshogs dang thabs la mkhas pa rnam pa brgya stong dag gis chos rab tu bshad pa ni rtog tu med cing rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir te/shA ri'i bu chos de ni de bzhin gshegs
25a2(mdo sde): pas mkhyen par bya ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu bya ba gcig dang byed pa gcig dang bya ba chen po dang byed pa chen po'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
25a3(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ba'i phyir ro//shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba gcig po dang byed pa gcig po dang bya ba chen po dang byed pa chen po dang bya ba gang dang byed pa gang
25a4(mdo sde): gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ba gang zhe na/de ni sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba yang
25a5(mdo sde): dag par 'dzin du gzud pa'i rgyu'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
25a6(mdo sde): shes mthong ba yang dag par bstan pa'i rgyu'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //sems can rnams de bzhin
25a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba la zhugs pa'i rgyu'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //sems can rnams de
25b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba khong du chud par bya ba'i rgyu'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //sems
25b2(mdo sde): can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i lam du gzud pa'i rgyu'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung
25b3(mdo sde): ste/shA ri'i bu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba gcig po dang byed pa gcig po dang bya ba chen po dang byed pa chen po dang 'jig rten du 'byung ba'i dgongs pa gcig pa'o//shA ri'i bu de
25b4(mdo sde): ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bya ba gcig po dang byed pa gcig po dang bya ba chen po dang byed pa chen po de de bzhin gshegs pas mdzad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu nga ni de bzhin gshegs
25b5(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes mthong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'o//shA ri'i bu nga ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba yang dag par ston pa'o//shA ri'i bu nga ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
25b6(mdo sde): ye shes mthong ba la 'jug par byed pa'o//shA ri'i bu nga ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba khong du chud par byed do//shA ri'i bu nga ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
25b7(mdo sde): mthong ba'i lam la 'dzud pa'o//shA ri'i bu nga'ang theg pa gcig las brtsams te sems can rnams la chos ston pa 'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
26a1(mdo sde): mthar thug pa ste/theg pa gnyis sam gsum zhes bya ba gang yang med do//shA ri'i bu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad na'ang chos nyid ni 'di'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
26a2(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa'i dus na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams su
26a3(mdo sde): byung ste/sems can mos pa tha dad pa dang khams dang bsam pa tha dad pa rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas skye bo mang po la phan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang
26a4(mdo sde): skye bo phal po che dang lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa bstan pa dang rgya dang gzhi dang dpe dang dmigs pa dang nges pa'i tshig dang thabs
26a5(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chos bstan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang /shA ri'i bu theg pa gcig la brtsams nas sems can rnams la chos bstan
26a6(mdo sde): tede'ang 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa ste/gang 'di sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid yang dag par
26a7(mdo sde): 'dzin du 'dzud pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid ston pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid la 'jug par byed pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
26b1(mdo sde): mthong ba nyid khong du chud par byed pa/sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid kyi lam du 'jug par byed pa'i chos ston te/shA ri'i bu 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
26b2(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag las sems can gang dag gis chos de thos pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to//
26b3(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung
26b4(mdo sde): ba/sems can mos pa tha dad pa dang bsam pa tha dad pa dang khams tha dad pa rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas/skye bo mang po la phan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang skye
26b5(mdo sde): bo phal po che dang lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa bstan pa dang rgyu dang gzhi dang dpe dang dmigs pa dang nges pa'i tshig dang thabs mkhas pa rnam pa sna
26b6(mdo sde): tshogs kyis chos ston par 'gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang /shA ri'i bu theg pa gcig las brtsams nas sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur te/de'ang
26b7(mdo sde): 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa ste/gang 'di sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/de
27a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid ston pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid la 'jug par byed pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid khong //
27a2(mdo sde): du chud par byed pa/sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid kyi lam du 'jug par byed pa'i chos ston par 'gyur te/shA ri'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
27a3(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag las sems can gang dag chos nyan pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro///
27a4(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu da ltar byung ba'i dus na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag
27a5(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa/sems can mos pa tha dad pa dang khams dang bsam pa tha dad pa rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas skye bo mang po la phan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten
27a6(mdo sde): la snying brtse ba dang skye bo phal po che dang lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa bstan pa dang rgyu dang gzhi dang dpe dang dmigs pa dang nges pa'i tshig
27a7(mdo sde): dang thabs mkhas pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang /shA ri'i bu theg pa gcig las brtsams nas sems can rnams la chos
27b1(mdo sde): ston te/de'ang 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa ste/gang 'di sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug
27b2(mdo sde): pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid ston pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid la 'jug par byed pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid khong du chud
27b3(mdo sde): par byed pa/sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid kyi lam du 'jug par byed pa'i chos ston te/shA ri'i bu da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
27b4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag las/sems can gang dag chos nyan pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu de ltar
27b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nga'ang sems can mos pa tha dad pa dang khams dang bsam pa tha dad pa rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas skye bo mang po la
27b6(mdo sde): paphan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang skye bo phal po che dang lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa bstan pa dang rgyu dang
27b7(mdo sde): gzhi dang dpe dang dmigs pa dang nges pa'i tshig dang thabs mkhas pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chos ston to//shA ri'i bu nga'ang theg pa gcig las brtsams nas sems can rnams la chos ston te//
28a1(mdo sde): 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa ste/gang 'di'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid yang dag par
28a2(mdo sde): 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid ston pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid la 'jug par byed pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
28a3(mdo sde): shes mthong ba nyid khong du chud par byed pa/sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nyid kyi lam du 'jug par byed pa'i chos ston te/shA ri'i bu sems can gang dag da ltar
28a4(mdo sde): nga la 'di ltar chos nyan pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/'di ltar phyogs
28a5(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gang na'ang theg pa gnyis su gdags pa'ang med na gsum du lta ga la yod/'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam
28a6(mdo sde): bskal pa'i snyigs ma la byung ngam sems can gyi snyigs ma 'am/nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma 'am/lta ba'i snyigs ma 'am/tshe'i snyigs ma la byung na/shA ri'i bu 'di lta bur
28a7(mdo sde): bskal pa dang 'khrul pa'i snyigs ma dang dri ma mang po dang brkam pa'i sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba de'i tshe/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
28b1(mdo sde): sas rgyas rnams thabs mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gcig po de las theg pa gsum du bshad de bstan to//shA ri'i bu de ltar gang nyan thos sam dgra bcom pa 'am rang sangs rgyas rnams
28b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa mi nyan mi 'jug khong du chud par mi byed pa de dag ni/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos ma yin par
28b3(mdo sde): rig par bya'o//dgra bcom pa'ang ma yin rang sangs rgyas kyang ma yin par rig par bya'o//shA ri'i bu yang dge slong ngam dge slong ma la le dgra bcom par khas 'che zhing /bla na med pa
28b4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam yongs su mi 'dzin te/nga ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bcad pa'o zhes zer zhing nga'i lus 'di tha ma mya ngan las 'da' ba'o zhes zer ba ni/shA ri'i bu
28b5(mdo sde): de lhag pa'i nga tshul can du shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa des/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du gyur te/chos 'di thos nas dang
28b6(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ba'i goskabs med cing gnas ma yin te/de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ni ma gtogs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su
28b7(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe/mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa 'am 'chad pa'i nyan thos mi 'byung ste/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
29a1(mdo sde): gzhan dag la chos 'di la the tshom med par 'gyur ro//shA ri'i bu nga la dad par gyis shig yid ches par gyis shig rtogs par gyis shig shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
29a2(mdo sde): la rdzun du smra ba med de/shA ri'i bu theg pa 'di ni gcig tu zad de 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das don de nyid rgyas par ston cing de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
29a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal to//nga rgyal can gyi dge slong dang //dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma rnams ma dad pa//lnga stong las ni mi nyung ba//bslab pa zhig gral ldan pa rnams//
29a4(mdo sde): nyes pa de dag mthong gyur nas//skyon rnams yongs su sbed pa'i phyir//byis pa'i blo can de dag dang //gang gis chos 'di nyan par 'gyur ba yi//de dag la ni dge bde byed de/'khor
29a5(mdo sde): gyi snyigs ma nyid du mkhyen nas su//'jig rten mgon po ngas kyang bstsal pa yin//nga yi 'khor ni legs par 'khod//shin pa med cing dag pa ste//snying po ma yin kun med 'gyur//
29a6(mdo sde): 'di dag snying po rab tu gnas//skyes bu dag pa skyob pa sangs rgyas dag/thabs la mkhas pa brgya phrag du ma yis//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos ni ci gsung ba//ci 'dra nga la nyon cig
29a7(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu//de dag spyod pa bsam pa ci 'dra'ang mkhyen//srog chags bye ba mos pa tha dad pa//de dag sngon chad dge ba ci byas dang //las rnams sna tshogs dag ni mkhyen nas su//
29b1(mdo sde): nges pa'i tshig dang gzhi rnams sna tshogs kyis//srog chags de dag khong du chud par byed//ngas ni rgyu dang dpe yang brgya dag gis//sems can de lta de ltar mgu bar byas//mdo sde de bzhin tshigs
29b2(mdo sde): su bcad pa'ang bshad//de ltar byung dang skyes rabs rmad byung dang //gleng gzhi de bzhin gtan la dbab pa dang //dbyangs snyan dpe brgya sna tshogs rnams kyis bshad//mi mkhas gang dag dman
29b3(mdo sde): la mngon dga' zhing //sangs rgyas bya ba mang la spyod ma spyad//'khor bar chags shing shin tu sdug bsngal ba//de la mya ngan 'da' ba nye bar bstan//sangs rgyas ye shes rab tu rtogs bya'i/
29b4(mdo sde): phyir//da ltar rang byung ba ni thabs mdzad de//khyed cag sangs rgyas su yang 'grub bo zhes//de rnams la ni re zhig mi gsung ngo //ci'i phyir zhe na skyob pa dus la bzhes//dal ba gzigs
29b5(mdo sde): te de nas gdod 'chad do//dal ba de ni brgya la ded thob pas//de phyir yang dag nges pa 'dir bshad do//nga yi bstan pa yan lag dgu po yang //sems can dag gi mthu dang stobs las
29b6(mdo sde): bshad//'di ltar thabs kyis mchog sbyin ye shes la//rab tu gzud pa'i phyir ni ngas bshad do//gang dag rtag tu rnam par dag gyur pa//gsal gtsang rab tu nges pa sangs rgyas sras///
29b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bye ba mang la lhag byas pa//de dag la ni rab rgyas mdo rnams bshad//'di ltar de dag bsam pa rdzogs pa dang //rnam par dag pa'i tshul dang ldan gyur pa//de dag la ni ma
30a1(mdo sde): 'ongs dus na yang //phan zhing brtse ba'i sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes gsung //thos nas 'gro mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur snyam ste//thams cad shin tu dga' bas khyab par
30a2(mdo sde): 'gyur//de dag spyod pa rnams kyang ngas shes nas//shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde rab tu bshad//'di ltar 'dren pa'i nyan thos de dag la//gang dag nga yi bstan pa 'di thos pa//tshigs
30a3(mdo sde): bcad gcig tsam thos sam bzung yang rung //thams cad the tshom med par byang chub 'gyur//theg pa tha dad par ni gang ston pa//skyes mchog rnams kyi thabs mkhas ma gtogs
30a4(mdo sde): par//theg pa gcig ste gnyis su yod ma yin//'jig rten na ni nam yang gsum du med//sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes bstan pa'i phyir//'jig rten du yang 'jig rten mgon
30a5(mdo sde): po byung //bya ba gcig ste gnyis su yod ma yin//sangs rgyas theg pa dman pas mi 'dren to//rang 'byung bdag nyid ci la gnas pa dang //sangs rgyas ji lta bu dang ci 'dra ba//
30a6(mdo sde): stobs dang bsam gtan rnam thar dbang po rnams//de dag nyid la sems can rab tu 'jog/byang chub rdul med dam pa thob nas su//theg pa dman la sems can gcig bkod na/
30a7(mdo sde): 'di ni nga yi legs pa ma yin te//ser sna'i nyes pa'ang nga la yod par 'gyur//nga la ser sna dag ni cung zad med//nga la phrag dog med cing 'dod chags med//sdig pa'i
30b1(mdo sde): chos rnams thams cad ngas bcad de//de phyir 'gro ba rtogs pas nga sangs rgyas//ji ltar mtshan rnams kyis ni nga brgyan te//'jig rten 'di dag thams cad rab snang byed//srog chags
30b2(mdo sde): brgya phrag du mas mdun bltas shing //chos kyi rang bzhin phyag rgya 'di bshad do//nga ni 'di snyam sems te shA ri'i bu//sum du rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi gzugs ldan zhing //bdag 'od rang
30b3(mdo sde): byung 'jig rten rig par yang //de ltar ci nas sems can kun 'gyur snyam//ji ltar mthong zhing ji ltar bsams pa dang //nga yis sngan chad ji ltar brnags pa de//nga yi smon lam
30b4(mdo sde): de dag yongs rdzogs te//byang chub sangs rgyas nas ni ma bstan to//sems can rnams la byang chub 'dun skyed ces//ngas ni de skad smras na shA ri'i bu//mi shes sems can rnams ni 'dir
30b5(mdo sde): myos te//nga yi legs bshad 'dzin par gzhar mi 'gyur//de dag 'di 'dra'i tshul du ngas shes te//tshe rabs snga mar spyod pa rnams ma spyad//'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la chags shing zhen///
30b6(mdo sde): sred pas brgyal zhing gti mug myos pa rnams//de dag 'dod rgyus ngan 'gror rab tu lhung //'gro ba drug tu kun tu nyon mongs te//dur khrod de dag phyi phyir 'phel bar byed//bsod nams
30b7(mdo sde): chungs pas sdug bsngal kun gyis gzir//lta ba'i thibs por rtag tu rnam par chags//yod dang med dang de bzhin yod med pa//ltar gyur drug cu gnyis la brten nas su//dngos po med la
31a1(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin cing gnas//sbyar bar dka' zhing log byed nga rgyal can//byis pa thos nyung yon po g.yo byed rnams//tshe rabs bye ba phrag stong nam du yang //de dag sangs
31a2(mdo sde): rgyas sgra 'di mi thos so//nga yi thabs kyis de la shA ri'i bu//sdug bsngal mthar phyungs shig ces de skad smras//sems can sdug bsngal gzir ba mthong bas na//de dag mya ngan 'das pa
31a3(mdo sde): nye bar bstan//'di ltar ngas ni chos rnams 'di dag kun//gdod nas rab zhi mya ngan rtag 'das bshad//sangs rgyas sras de spyod pa kun rdzogs nas//phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe la rgyal bar 'gyur//
31a4(mdo sde): theg pa gsum du gang rnams bstan pa ni//nga yi thabs mkhas tshul ni de 'dra ste//theg pa gcig ste de bzhin tshul yang gcig/de ltar 'dren pa rnams kyis bshad pa gcig/gang
31a5(mdo sde): 'dir la la the tshom yod pa dag/the tshom za dang de bzhin som nyi spongs//gzhan du mi gsung 'jig rten 'dren pa rnams//theg pa 'di ni gcig ste gnyis su med//sngon gyi de bzhin
31a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa gang 'byung ba//sangs rgyas stong ngam mya ngan yongs 'das shing //'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med la//gang dag tshad ni nam yang yong med pa//skyes bu dam
31a7(mdo sde): pade dag thams cad kyis//dpe dang gzhi dang rgyu dang bcas pa dang //thabs la mkhas pa brgya phrag du ma yis//rnam par dag pa'i chos rnams rab bshad pa//de dag thams cad
31b1(mdo sde): theg pa gcig ston cing //srog chags stong phrag bye ba bsam yas rnams//theg pa gcig po la yang rab 'dzud de//theg pa gcig la yongs su smin par byed//mos dang de bzhin
31b2(mdo sde): bsam pa rnams mkhyen nas//de bzhin gshegs pas lhar bcas 'jig rten du//rgyal ba'i thabs gzhan rnam pa mang po dag/gang gis chos mchog 'di ni rab bstan pa//sems
31b3(mdo sde): can gang gis de las mngon sum der//chos nyan pa dang 'on te thos ldan pa//sbyin pa sbyin zhing tshul khrims spyod pa dang //bzod pas spyod pa thams cad bsgrub pa dang //brtson 'grus
31b4(mdo sde): bsam gtan lhag par byas pa dang //shes rab kyis ni chos 'di rnams bsams te//rnam pa tha dad bsod nams sus byas pa//de dag thams cad byang chub thob par 'gyur//mya ngan
31b5(mdo sde): 'das pa'i rgyal ba de dag gi/bstan pa de la sems can gang zhugs te//de na bzod cing zhi la dul ba ni//de dag thams cad byang chub thob par 'gyur//rgyal ba mya ngan 'das pa de dag
31b6(mdo sde): gi/rgyal ba'i ring bsrel dag la su mchod cing //rin chen mchod rten stong phrag du ma dag/gser dang dngul dang 'on te shel gyi 'am//rdo rje'i snying po'i mchod rten gang gis byas//
31b7(mdo sde): bai DUr+ya mchog de bzhin an+da rnyil//la las mu tig ke ke ru las byas//de dag gis kyang byang chub thob par 'gyur//gang gis mchod rten rdo las byas pa dang //gang gis a ga
32a1(mdo sde): ru dang tsan+dan nam//gang gis thang shing mchod rten byas pa dang //la las shing mang gzhan las byas pa dang //sa dang so phag las ni brtsigs pa yi//rgyal ba'i mchod
32a2(mdo sde): rten dga' zhing byas pa dang //de phyir sa rdul phung po dag las kyang //mya ngam dgon pa gang du byas pa dang //byis pa rtsed mor de dang de dag tu//gang gis rgyal ba de phyir mchod rten dag/bye ma
32a3(mdo sde): las ni phung po byas pa yang //de rnams kyis kyang byang chub thob par gyur//la las de bzhin rin chen gzugs byas pa//sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan pa'i gzugs//gang gis
32a4(mdo sde): de phyir byas pa de dag kyang //de dag thams cad byang chub thob par gyur//la las der ni rin chen sna bdun dang //la las de bzhin zangs dang 'khar ba las//bde bar gshegs pa
