154a6(mdo sde): mI de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba des/byang chub sems dpa' drug
154a7(mdo sde): stong po de dag gcig nas gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pas lung ston par 'gyur ro//de nas sgro gcan zin gyi ma dge
154b1(mdo sde): slong ma grags 'dzin 'di snyam du/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi ming ma smos so snyam du sems so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma grags 'dzin gyi sem
154b2(mdo sde): kyi rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas/dge slong ma grags 'dzin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//grags 'dzin khyod mos par bya'o//khong du chud par bya'o//
154b3(mdo sde): khyod kyang sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag bcu'i thad na byang chub sems dpa' chos smra bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rim gyis yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/
154b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams bzang po zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dong zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/
154b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer brgya stong yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyal
154b6(mdo sde): mtshan zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer brgya stong
154b7(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyal mtshan de'i tshe'i tshad ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro//de nas dge slong ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta ma'i dge slong ma g.yog 'khor dge
155a1(mdo sde): slong ma drug stong dang /dge slong ma grags 'dzin g.yog 'khor dge slong ma bzhi stong dang /bcom ldan 'das las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
155a2(mdo sde): byang chub tu bdug lung bstan pa thob nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du gyur te/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol te//bcom ldan 'dren pa rnam par 'dren pa ste/
155a3(mdo sde): lholtar bcas 'jig rten dag gi ston pa lags//dbugs 'byin lha dang mi yis mchod pa ste//mgon po bdag cag rnams kyang deng tshim bgyis//de nas dge slong ma
155a4(mdo sde): rnams kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang skad ma'i dus slang ma'i tshe na/chos
155a5(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu ston par spro lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa phyir mi ldog
155a6(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bo de dag ga la ba de logs su gzigs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs ma theg
155a7(mdo sde): tu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag stan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di snyam du/chos
155b1(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad par bya ba'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la bskul ba mdzad do snyam du sems so//de dag de snyam du bsams nas kun g.yos te phan tshun
155b2(mdo sde): du smras pa/rigs kyi bu dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad par bya ba'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la bskul ba mdzad na bdag cag gis
155b3(mdo sde): ji ltar bya/de nas rigs kyi bu de dag bcom ldan 'das la gus pa dang bdag nyid kyi sngon gyi spyod pa dang smon lam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar seng ge'i sgra phyung ba//
155b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bdag cag phyogs bcur mchis te/bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems
155b5(mdo sde): can rnams yi ger 'drir stsal bar bgyi klog tu stsol bar bgyi sems su stsal par bgyi 'chad du stsal bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan
155b6(mdo sde): na bzhugs te/bdag cag la bsrung ba dang skyob pa dang sbed pa mdzad do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
155b7(mdo sde): dbyangs mthun par tshigs su bcad pa 'di dgo gsol to//bcom ldan 'das khyod thugs las chung mdzad gsol//khyod ni mya ngan 'das nas bdag cag rnams//
156a1(mdo sde): shin tu ma rungs slang ma'i dus kyi tshe//mdo sde dam pa 'di ni bshad par bgyi//byis pa rnams kyis smyos pa dang //brdeg pa dang ni dbyug thogs te/
156a2(mdo sde): gzas pa rnams ni bzod par bgyi//'dren pa bag la zha bar bgyi//ma rungs slad ma'i dus la ni//log pa'i blo dang yon po ni//byis pa g.yo dang nga rgyal can//ma thob/
156a3(mdo sde): thob par 'du shes pa//dgon pa dgra la rab sems shing //tshim bu dag kyang dgos nas ni//yo byad bsrungs tshul spyod do zhes//blo ngan de skad smra bar 'gyur//
156a4(mdo sde): ro bro chags shing zhen pa rnams//khyim pa dag la chos kyang 'chad//mngon shes drug can ji bzhin du//bsti stang dog kyang bgyid par 'gyur//gtum pa'i
156a5(mdo sde): sems dang sdang sems ldan//khyim dang nor la rnam par sems//dgon pa dben par rab zhugs te//bdag cag rnams la skur pa 'debs//bdag cag la
156a6(mdo sde): ni 'di skad mchi//rnyed dang bkur sti gnas pa ste//dge slong 'di dag mu stegs can//bdag gi rang bzo rab tu 'chad//rnyed pa dang ni bkur sti'i phyir//rang
156a7(mdo sde): gis mdo sde byas nas su//'khor gyi dbus su 'chad byed ces//bdag cag rnams la shin tu 'phya//rgyal po dang ni rgyal bu dang //de bzhin rgyal po'i blon
156b1(mdo sde): po dang //bram ze dang na khyim bdag dang //dge slong gzhan dag drung du ni//bdag cag rnams la mi bsngags brjod//mu stegs can zhes tshig kyang brjod//drang srong tsho la
156b2(mdo sde): gus pas na//thams cad bdag cag bzod par bgyi//de tshe dran pa'i blo gros can//bdag cag rnams la smod par 'gyur//'di dag sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes te/
156b3(mdo sde): rnam pa thams cad bzod par bgyi//'khrug pa'i bskal pa 'jigs pa la//ma rungs 'jigs pa chen po'i tshe//gnod sbyin gzugs can dge slong mang //bdag
156b4(mdo sde): cag la ni mi snyan brjod//'jig rten dbang la gus pa yis//shin tu dga' ba spro bar bgyi//bzod pa'i go cha bgos nas su//mdo 'di rab tu bshad par bgyi//
156b5(mdo sde): 'dren pa bdag cag lus dang ni//srog kyang don du gnyer ma lags//bdag cag byang chub don gnyer bas//khyod kyis btams gtad 'dzin pa lags//ldem por
156b6(mdo sde): dgongs bshad ma 'tshal ba//dge slong sdig can ci 'dra dag/slad ma'i dus na 'byung ba ni//bcom ldan nyid kyis rab tu mkhyen//gtsug lag khang nas bskrad pa dang //
156b7(mdo sde): bcing dang brdeg pa rnam mang dang //phyir zhing bcas pa me lags dang //khro gnyer thams cad bzod par bgyi//'jig rten mgon gyis bka' stsal pa//den par
157a1(mdo sde): bgyid pas slad dus na//'khor gyi dbus su mi 'jigs par//mdo 'di rab tu bshad par bgyi//'dren pa 'di ni 'di tshol ba//grong khyer grong du gang
157a2(mdo sde): byung ba//de dag tu ni mchis nas su//khyod kyis gtams pa skal bar bgyi//'jig rten dbang po thub pa che//khyod kyi mngag gzhug bdag cag 'tshal//mya ngan rab
157a3(mdo sde): 'das zhi rnyed pa//thugs las chung ngur mdzad du gsol//phyogs bcu dag nas gang gshegs pa//'jig rten sgron ma thams cad kyi//mos pa rnam par mkhyen
157a4(mdo sde): pas na//bden pa'i tshig ni smra bar bgyid//dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po las spro bar bya ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gnyis pa'o///
157a5(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po//bam po dgu pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
157a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag bcom ldan 'das la gus par spro ba ni dka' ba bgyid pa shin tu dka' ba bgyid pa lags so//
157a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gis/slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji ltar rab tu bshad par
157b1(mdo sde): bgyi/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'jam dpal chos bzhi la gnas te byang chub sems
157b2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o//bzhi gang zhe na/'jam dpal 'di la byang chub sems
157b3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag/cho ga dang spyod yul la gnas te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o//'jam dpal ji ltar na/byang chub sems
157b4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag/cho ga dang spyod yul la gnas pa yin zhe na/'jam dpal gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa dang dul ba dang
157b5(mdo sde): dul ba'i sa thob cing yid mi sdang la phrag dog med par 'gyur te/'jam dpal gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag/chos gang la'ang mi spyod cing
157b6(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs kyi rang gi mtshan nyid la yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du blta ste/gang chos rnams la rnam par mi dpyod rnam par mi rtog pa de ni 'jam dpal byang chub
157b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i cho ga zhes bya'o//'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod yul gang zhe na/'jam dpal gang gi tshe byang
158a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal po la mi sbyin rgyal bu dang rgyal po'i blon po chen po dang rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring ba la mi sten mi sbyin bsnyen bkur mi byed
158a2(mdo sde): nyebar mi 'gro/gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang kun tu rgyu dang 'tshob pa dang gtsor bu pa rnams dang snyan dngags kyis bstan bcos la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams dang
158a3(mdo sde): memi sbyin mi snyed bkur stir mi byed/'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gsang tshig 'chang ba'i 'jig rten rgyang pan pa la mi sten mi ston bkur stir mI byung /de dag dang lhan cig tu
158a4(mdo sde): 'dris par mi byed/gdol pa dang zol pa rnams dang ma yin/phag 'tshong ba rnams dang ma yin/bya gag 'tshong ba rnams dang ma yin/ri dgas kyi rngon pa rnams
158a5(mdo sde): dang ma yin/nya pa rnams dang ma yin/glu mkhan dang gar mkhan dang lcags kyi sil khrol byed pa rnams dang ma yin/gyad rnams dang ma yin/gzhan dag gi
158a6(mdo sde): dga' ba dang rtse ba'i gnas rnams su mi 'gro/de dag dang lhan cig 'dris par yang mi byed do//drung du lhags pa la dus su chos bshad pa ni ma gtogs te/de'ang
158a7(mdo sde): mi gnas par 'chad pa'o//nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma la mi snyan mi sten bkur sti mi byed de dag dang 'dris
158b1(mdo sde): par mi byed de/'chag sa 'am gnas khang ngam gtsug lag khang na'ang de dag dang 'grogs pa'i spyod yul ba ma yin no//drung du lhags pa la dus su chos 'chad pa ni ma gtogs te
158b2(mdo sde): de'ang mi gnas par 'chad pa'o//'jam dpal de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod yul lo//'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
158b3(mdo sde): chen po bud med la rjes su chags pa gang yang 'du ba mtshan mar bzung nas rtag tu chos 'chad pa mo yin/bud med la rtag tu lta bar 'dod pa ma yin/khyim dag tu song ste bang
158b4(mdo sde): med dam bu mo 'am khyim mi mo la rtag tu chos bshad par sems pa ma yin/yang dag par mgu bar byed pa ma yin/ma ning la chos mi ston de dag dang lhan cig 'dris par mi
158b5(mdo sde): byed yang dag par mgu bar byed pa ma yin/slong ba'i phyir gcig pu khyim du mi 'jug/de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran pa bsgom pa ni ma gtogs so//gal te bung
158b6(mdo sde): med la chos ston na'ang dri tha na chos la 'dod chags pas kyang chos mi ston na de bud med la 'dod chags pas lta ci smos/de chos ston pa na than so'i phreng ba'ang mi ston na bzhin/
158b7(mdo sde): gyi 'gyur ba chen po lta ci smos/dge tshul dang dge tshul ma dang dge slong dang dge slong ma dang gzhon nu dang gzhon nu mi dang mi sten/de dag dang gtam yang mi byed la nang du
159a1(mdo sde): yang dag 'jog la 'jug par dga' zhing nang du yang dag 'jog la rtag tu bsnyen pa yin te/'jam dpal de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
159a2(mdo sde): chen po'i spyod yul dang po'o//'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la stong par blta ste/ji ltar gnas pa bzhin dang ma
159a3(mdo sde): log par gnas pa dang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa dang /mi bskyod pa dang mi g.yo ba mi ldog pa mi 'gyur ba rtag tu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa dang
159a4(mdo sde): nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid lta bu nges pa'i tshig dang tha snyad rnam par spangs pa ma skyes po me byung ba yang dag par ma byung ba med pa 'dus ma byas pa rgyun med pa med pa la tshig gis brjod
159a5(mdo sde): pa mi chags pa'i gnas la 'dug pa 'du shes phyin ci log las byung bar/de ltar 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu chos thams cad la lte
159a6(mdo sde): zhing gnas pa 'dis gnas na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod yul la gnas pa yin te/'jam dpal de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
159a7(mdo sde): chen po'i spyod yul gnyis pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgyas par ston cing de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//phyi dus shin tu
159b1(mdo sde): 'jigs pa la//zlum pa med cing mi 'jigs par//mdo sde 'don bstan par yang //byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dod pa//cho ga spyod yul bsrung bya zhing //'du 'dzi med la gtsang //
159b2(mdo sde): bar bya//rgyal po dang ni rgyal bu dang //'dris byed rtag tu spang bar bya//rgyal po'o zhabs 'bring gang yin dang //gangal pa dang ni zil pa dang //mu stegs can ni de dag dang //
159b3(mdo sde): rnam pa kun tu 'dris me bya//dge slong 'dul dang lung gnas pa//dgra bcom snyam du sems byed cing //nga rgyal can rnams bsten mi bya//tshul khrims 'tshal rnams rnam par
159b4(mdo sde): sresrid//rgod cing smra ba'i spyod yul can//dge slong ma rnams rtag tu spyang //mi brten par ni mngon pa yi//dge bsnyen rnams kyang spang bar bya//dge bsnyen ma gang tshe 'di la//mya
159b5(mdo sde): ngan 'das pa gang tshol ba//de dag dang ni 'dris byed spang //'di ni cho ga yin zhes bya//gang zhig de yi thang 'ongs nas//byang chub mchog phyir chos 'dri na//gnas pa med
159b6(mdo sde): cing mi zhen par//dpa' bo rtag tu de la shod//bud med ma ning sems can gang //de dag 'dris byed rnam par spang //khyim rnams su ni mna' ma dang //gzhon nu ma rnams
159b7(mdo sde): rnam par spang //de la nam du'ang dga' mi byed//mkhas dang rgod pa 'dri ba dang //phag 'tshong ba dang shen pa dang //'dres par byed pa rnam par spang //gang dag srog
160a1(mdo sde): chags rnam ma du//ngas spyod sbyi ni gsod pa dang //bzla' byer sharnams 'tshang byedrug/de dag 'as byung rnam par byung //gang drug dru da/
160a2(mdo sde): byud //gang ma ldan da ma khrul /gang ga nad du 'an pa yang //da garnams dang dis nga//ma'i ga / sa
160a3(mdo sde): tshog gzhan//shin tu dga' ba de dag kyang //rnam pa kun tu yongs su spang //mkhas pabrid med rnams lo yod//glang gi dus chos 'tshed pa//de ni gcig tu
160a4(mdo sde): 'gro ste//rgod ni 'dug par mi bya'o//gang tshe skyes phyir yang dang yang //grong du 'jug par byed phyir//dge slong gnyis pa btsal bar bya//yang ni sangs rgyas
160a5(mdo sde): par bya//gang gis shes rab ldan pa dag/mdo sde 'di 'dra 'dzin gnas pa'i//tshig dang ni spyod yul dag/thog mar ngas bshad 'di yin no//gang tshe 'dus
160a6(mdo sde): byas 'dus ma byas//yang dag ying dgra ma yin dang //rab 'bring tha ma'i chos rnams la//rnam pa kun tu spyod pa med//brtan pa bud med ces mi spyod//skyes pa
160a7(mdo sde): zhes kyang mi rtog ste//chos sa cog ni ma skyes phyir//btsal ba byas kyang mi mthong ba//'di ni byang chub sems dpa' yi//tshig rnam pa kun tu bsten//de dag
160b1(mdo sde): spyod yul ci 'dra ba//de ni rnam par mnyan par gyis//chos 'di dag ni yod pa ma yin bstan//thams cad 'byung ba med cing skye ba med//rtag tu mi g.yo stong pa nyid du gnas///
160b2(mdo sde): de ni mkhas pa rnams kyi spyod yul yin//'di dag 'du shes log par brtags pa ste//yang dag min la yang dag yod la med//ma byung ba dang ma skyes chos rnams la//
160b3(mdo sde): yang dag nyid dang 'byung bar log par brtags//sems ni rtag tu rtse gcig mnyam gzhag ste//ri rab phung po ji bzhin rab tu gnas//de bzhin 'dug nas nam
160b4(mdo sde): mkha' lta bur ni//chos rnams 'di dag kun la brtag par bya//rtag tu nam mkha' mtshungs par snying po med//mi g.yo rlom sems rnam par spangs pa ste//chos
160b5(mdo sde): rnams 'di dag rtag pa'i dus gnas pa//'di ni mkhas po rnams kyi spyod yul yin//nga ni mya ngan 'das nas dge slong gang //nga yi spyod yul 'di ni rab srung zhing //
160b6(mdo sde): de ni nam yang zhum pa med pa yis//'jig rten du'ang mdo 'dir ba shod cig/mkhas pa dus su sems par byed pa na//khang bur zhugs te de bzhin sgo bcad nas//
160b7(mdo sde): chos 'di thams cad la ni tshul bzhin blta//langs nas zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis shod//rgyal po rnams dang rgyal po'i bu gang dag/chos nyan pa rnams 'di ni/
161a1(mdo sde): de la srung //gzhan yang khyim bra dag dag drung bram ze rnams//thams cad de yi g.yog tu 'khod par 'gyur//'jam dpal gzhan yang de bzhin
161a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i ching dam pa'i chos rab tu 'jig par 'gyur byi na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches kyi
161a3(mdo sde): mu gras 'di rab tu sbyin por 'dod pa ni dre ba la gnas pa yin no//bde ba la gnas te chos ldan dang //lus la yod dam glegs ba du byas sam gzhan dag la ston na'ang /
161a4(mdo sde): natu mun kI tshul ba'i dang bzhini na ma yin/dge slong sa spyi ba gzhan dag la sbyar bar mi byed/mi ston pa mi sne/mu~M snyan pa mi /gzhan nyan thos kyi thig pa can
161a5(mdo sde): dge slong dag gi ming smos te mi snyan pa mi smra/mi snyan pa dag mi rjod cing de dag la phyir rgol bar 'du shes pa ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar bde ba'i gnas la gnas
161a6(mdo sde): 'i phyir te/de chos nyan du 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la phan 'dogs pa dang phrag dog med par chos ston to//mi rtsod snod dri ba dris kyang nyan thos kyi theg pas lan mi
161a7(mdo sde): ljon to//ci nas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bur lan ldan no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal
161b1(mdo sde): to//mkhas pa bde la rtag tu gnas par 'gyur//de la 'dug nas de bzhin chos kyang ston//gtsang zhing yid du 'ong ba'i snga phyogs su//yangs pa'i stan ni rab tu bshams
161b2(mdo sde): bting ste//bzang po'i tshon gyis legs par kha bsgyur ba//chos gos gtsang ma de ni rab begs nas//rdul gzan bzang po de bzhin bshams byas la//sham thabs che tshad lags
161b3(mdo sde): par rab bgros nas//bcos pu'i ras rnams sna tshogs legs bting ba//rkang rten bcas pa'i khri la rab 'dug cing //rkang pa legs par bkrus te steng 'dzegs nas//
161b4(mdo sde): mgo dang bzhin gyi mdangs ni rab snum zhing //chos kyi stan de la ni rab 'dug nas//sems can lhags pa rtse gcig gyur rnams la//gtam mang rnam pa sna tshogs
161b5(mdo sde): nye bar ston//dge slong dag dang dge slong ma rnams dang //dge bsnyen rnams dang dge bsnyen ma dag dang //rgyal po dag dang rgyal bu rnams la yang //mkhas te rtag tu
161b6(mdo sde): phrag dog med par ni//sna tshogs don ldan snyan pa'i gtam yang ston//de tshe de la de dag dri dri nas//de la mthun pa'i don rnams rab tu sten//ci nas thos pa byang chub 'thob
161b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba//de ltar don gyi rnam pa rab tu ston//le lo dag kyang rnam par rab spangs nas//skyo ba snyam pa'i 'du shes bskyed mi bya//mkhas pas mi dga' thams cad rnam
162a1(mdo sde): par spang //byams pa'i stobs ni 'khor la bsgom par bya//nyin mtshan du yang chos mchog rab tu bsgom//mkhas pa des ni bye ba khrag khrig
162a2(mdo sde): dpes//'khor rnams mgu zhing de bzhin dga' bar byed//de la nam yang 'dod pa cung zad med//zas dang skom dang bza' dang bca' ba dang //gos dang mal cha chos
162a3(mdo sde): gos rnams dang ni//na ba'i gsos sman dag kyang mi bsam ste//'khor rnams la ni ci yang mi bslang ngo //gzhan du mkhas pa rtag tu bdag nyid dang //sems can 'di
162a4(mdo sde): dag sangs rgyas grub par shog/phan phyir 'jig rten chos gang bstan pa de//bdag gi bde ba'i yo byad kun snyam sems//dge slong gang zhig mya ngan nga 'das nas//
162a5(mdo sde): phrag dog med par 'di ni rab ston pa//de la sdug bsngal med cing bar chad med//nam yang mya ngan rnams kyang 'khrug pa med//de la su yang bsngags par mi byed de//
162a6(mdo sde): brdeg pa med cing mi snyan smra ba'ang med//de ni nam yang bskrad par mi 'gyur te//'di ltar do na bzod pa'i stobs la gnas//rtag tu mkhas pa bdi la gnas pa de/
162a7(mdo sde): ltar nges bshad bzhin du gnas pa ni//yon tan bye ba du ma brgya 'byung ste//de ni bskal pa brgyar yang brjod mi nus//'jam dpal gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa
162b1(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/dam pa'i chos zad pa'i mtha' ma'i dus kyi tshe/mdo sde 'di 'chad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phrag dog dang g.yo dang sgra
162b2(mdo sde): med pa yin/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gyi gang zag gzhan dag la mi snyan pa mi skye/skur ba mi 'debs/brnyes par mi byed do//dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bste/
162b3(mdo sde): dang dge bsnyen mo nyan thos kyi theg pa can nam/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can namaM/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gzhan dag la 'gyod pa skyed par mi byed de/rigs kyi bu
162b4(mdo sde): dag khyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang ring ste khyed de na mi snang ngo //khyed ni rab tu bag med par gnas pa ste/khyed ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
162b5(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i mthu med pa'o zhes byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang la'ang the tshom skye bar mi byed do//chos kyis rtsod pa la dga' ba ma yin te
162b6(mdo sde): chos la rtsod par mi byed do//sems can thams cad la byams pa'i stobs mi mthong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phar 'du shes skyed do//byang chub sems
162b7(mdo sde): dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes skyed do//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rnams na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag la rgyun mi
163a1(mdo sde): chad par lhag pa'i bsam pas gus par phyag 'tshal lo//chos 'chad pa na lhag chad med par chos 'chad do//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu bstan pa na
163a2(mdo sde): chos kyi dga' ba snyoms par byed de/tha na 'ga' tsam la'ang chos kyi dga' bas lhag par phan 'dogs par mi byed do//'jam dpal chos 'di gsum dang ldan pa'i byang chub/
163a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos zad pa'i mtha' ma'i dus kyi tshe/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag
163a4(mdo sde): par ston pa na/bde bar reg pa la gnas shing gtsa ba med par chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu ston te/de'i chos yang dag par 'gro ba'i grogs dag kyang 'byung bar
163a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//gang dag de la chos nyan pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang dad pa dang yid ches pa dang 'dzin pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /yi ger 'dre ba dang //
163a6(mdo sde): yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang glegs bam du byas te bsti stang byed pa dang btsun par byed pa dang /rim gror byed pa dang mchod par byed pa de dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
163a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to/bde bar gshegs pas de skad ces gsungs nas/ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//gang
163b1(mdo sde): zhig mdo 'di 'chad 'dod chos smrabs//g.yo dang nga rgyal de bzhin 'phya ba dag/ma lus par ni yongs su spang bar bya//de bzhin mkhas pas phrag dog gzhar mi bya//
163b2(mdo sde): nam du'ang su la'ang mi snyan brjod mi bya//lta bas rtsod pa nam yang mi bya'o//bla med ye shes khyod thob mi 'gyur zhes//the tshom gnas ni nam yang mi bya'o//de ni rtog tu
163b3(mdo sde): drang zhing mnyen pa ste//bde bar gshegs kyi sras po bzod ldan 'gyur//chos 'di yang dang yang du rab ston kyang //de 'dir skyo bar 'gyur ba cung zad med//byang chub
163b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' gang dag phyogs bcu yi//'jig rten dag na sems can snying brtses rgyu//de kun bdag gi stan ces de dag la//mkhas pa rnams ni bla mar gus pa skyed//
163b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog rnams dran byas la//rgyal ba rnams la rtag tu phar sems bskyed//nga rgyal 'du shes thams cad rnam spangs na//de che de la bar chad 'byung/
163b6(mdo sde): mi 'gyur//rnam pa 'di 'dra'i chos 'di thos nas ni//mkhas pas de tshe legs par bsrung bar bya//bde bar gnas pa'i phyir dang mnyam gzhag na//srog chags bye
163b7(mdo sde): bas rab tu bsrung bar 'gyur//'jam dpal gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/dam pa'i chos spong ba'i dus kyi tshe/byang chub sems
164a1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par 'dod pa'i dge slong des/khyim na gnas pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams las ring ba bas kyang ring
164a2(mdo sde): du gnas par bya'o//byams pa la gnas pas gnas par bya'o//sems can gang dag byang chub tu yang dag par ma zhugs pa de dag thams cad la snying rje bskyed par
164a3(mdo sde): bya'o//des 'di snyam du kye ma gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs mkhas pa/ldem por dgongs te bshad pa mi nyan pa dang mi shes pa dang mi rtogs pa dang mi 'dri ba
164a4(mdo sde): dang ma dad pa dang ma mos pa'i sems can de dag ni shin tu shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can dag go/gzhan yang sems can 'di dag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mi
164a5(mdo sde): 'jug cing khong du mi chud pa dag ste/'di ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gang la gang gnas par
164a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de la rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'dun par bya'o//yid ches par bya'o//'jug par bya'o//yongs su smin par bya'o//snyam du bsdam par bya'o//'jam dpal
164a7(mdo sde): chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par
164b1(mdo sde): ston na gnod pa med par 'gyur ro//dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma dang rgyal po dang rgyal bu dang rgyal po'i blon po chen po dang rgyal po'i sna chen po
164b2(mdo sde): la gtogs pa dang grong rdal gyi mi dang yul gyi mi dang bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams bsti stang du byed btsun par byed ri mo byed mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro//bar snang la
164b3(mdo sde): gnas pa'i lha dang pa dag kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de'i phyi bzhin 'brong bar 'gyur ro//lha'i bu rnams kyang de bsrung ba'i phyir rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro//grong na
164b4(mdo sde): 'dug kyang rung gtsug lag khang na 'dug kyang rung chos yongs su 'dri ba dag nyin mtshan du de'i drung du 'dong bar 'gyur/des lan btab pas dga' mgu rangs par 'gyur
164b5(mdo sde): ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro//'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'das
164b6(mdo sde): pa dang /ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtag tu byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro//
164b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams mang por yang sgra 'am dbyangs sam ming thos par yang rnyed par dka'o//'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na//
165a1(mdo sde): stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni stobs kyis bdag gi rgyal srid thub ste/de la phyir rgol ba rgyal po zla dag dang de 'thab mo byed par gyur na/stobs kyi
165a2(mdo sde): 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po de la dmage mi mang po yod de/de dag dang dgra de dag 'thab bo//rgyal po des dmag mi 'thab pa mthong nas/dmag mi de dag la dga' zhing mgu/
165a3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro//de dga' zhing rangs nas dmag mi de dag la sbyin pa rnam pa du ma sbyin par byed de/'di lta ste grong dang grong gi zhing rnams sbyin no//grong khyer dang grong khyer gyi
165a4(mdo sde): zhing dang gos dang thod dang lag pa'i rgyan dang mgul rgyan dang gser gyi tshong tshong dang rna rgyan dang se mo do dang da shal dang 'gron bu dang gser dang dngul dang nor bu dang mu tig dang
165a5(mdo sde): bai DUr+ya dang dung dang man shel dang byu ru'ang sbyin par byed/glang po che dang rta dang shing rta dang rkang thang dang bran pho dang bran mo'ang sbyin par byed/bzhon pa dang khyogs kyang sbyin par
165a6(mdo sde): byed de/gtsug gi nor bu ni su la'ang sbyin par mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rgyal po'i gtsug tu btags pa'i nor bu de ni gcig pu kho na yin pa'i phyir ro//'jam dpal
165a7(mdo sde): gang gi tshe rgyal pos gtsug gi nor bu de'ang sbyin par byed pa na/rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du 'gyur rmad du 'gyur ro//
165b1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin du/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyi lag stobs kyi bsod nams las byung ba'i khams gsum na/chos
165b2(mdo sde): kyi rgyal po mdzad pa'i khams gsum de dag la bdud sdig can gnon te/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phags pa'i dmag mi rnams dang bdud du 'thab mo byed do//
165b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal des na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal po ches kyi bdag po 'phags pa'i dmag mi 'thab mo byed pa de
165b4(mdo sde): ngag la mdo sde brgya stong rnam pa du ma 'chad do//'khor bzhi yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i phyir de dag la mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer dang chos kyi grong khyer chen
165b5(mdo sde): po'i sbyin pa sbyin te/mya ngan las 'das pas de dag la rjod cing chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di ni mi 'chad do//'jam dpal de la ji ltar stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur
165b6(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po dmag mi de dag 'thab pa na skyes bu'i rtsal chen pos ngo mtshar du gyur nas phyis bdog pa thams cad kyi mchog/gtsug gi nor bu 'jig rten thams cad
165b7(mdo sde): yid mo ches shing ngo mtshar du gyur pa de sbyin par byed do//'jam dpal ji ltar rgyal po de'i gtsug gi nor bu gtsug na 'dug pa de yun ring du bsrungs pa de bzhin du
166a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khams gsum na chos kyi rgyal po chen po chos kyi rgyal po mdzad pa/gang
166a2(mdo sde): gi tshe nyan thos dag dang byang chub sems dpa' dag/phung po'i bdud dam nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang 'thab pa gzigs te/de dag dang lhan cig tu 'thab pa na/gang gi tshe
166a3(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug zad de/khams gsum pa thams cad nas byung zhing bdud thams cad 'joms pa skyes bu'i rtsal chen po byas par gyur pa de'i tshe//
166a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes nas 'phags pa'i dmag mi de dag la 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa/'jig
166a5(mdo sde): rten thams cad la yid mi ches pa/sngon ma bshad sngon ma bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad de/kun gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa/spyi gtsug
166a6(mdo sde): gi nor bu chen po dang 'dra ba/de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos rnams la rab tu sbyin no//'jam dpal 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis chos bston pa'i
166a7(mdo sde): mchog ste/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mthu'o//chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad kyi nang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zab ste/'jig
166b1(mdo sde): rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'o//'jam dpal stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po de nyid kyis ring du bsrungs pa'i gtsug gi nor bu bkrol te/dmag mi mchog rnams la byin pa
166b2(mdo sde): de bzhin du/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gsang ba yun ring por gsungs pa/chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad kyi spyi bo la 'dug pa/de bzhin gshegs pas
166b3(mdo sde): mkhyen pa de/de bzhin gshegs pas de ring yang dag par rab tu ston to//de nas bcom ldan 'das don 'di nyid rgyas par ston cing de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka'
166b4(mdo sde): stsal to//byams pa'i stobs ni rab tu ston par byed//rtag tu sems can kun la snying yang brtse//bde bar gshegs pas bsngags pa'i mdo sde mchog/'di 'dra'o chos 'di
166b5(mdo sde): rab tu ston par byed//gang dag khyim na gnas dang rab byung dang //byang chub sems dpa' ma yin phyi dus der//chos 'di thos nas smod par 'gyur 'ong zhes//thams cad
166b6(mdo sde): la'ang des ni byams stobs bstan//bdag gis byang chub rjes su 'thob 'gyur te//de bzhin gshegs pa 'dug par na ma gyur pa//de tshe thabs la gnas nas khyed la sbyin///
166b7(mdo sde): byang chub mchog 'di kun tu bsgrags par bya'o//dper na stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur rgyal gyis//mgu nas dmag mi rnams la mgron mang byin//glang chen rta dang shing rto
167a1(mdo sde): rkang thang dang //grong rnams dang ni grong khyer rnams kyang byin//dgu' nas kha cig lan lag pa'i rgyun//dngul dang gser gyi tshong tshong rnams kyang byin/
167a2(mdo sde): mu tig nor bu b+ha rA man shel dang //sbyin par bya ba rnam pa mang po byin//gang tshe de na de la gang zhig gis//tsha mtshom med pa'i mchog gis ngo mtshar gyur//de yis nga
167a3(mdo sde): mtshar byas par shes nas su//cod pon las ni nor bu bkrol te byin//bzod pa'i stobs dang shes rab mdzod mang po//sangs rgyas chos rgyal ngas kyang de bzhin du//
167a4(mdo sde): phan zhing snying rje'i rjes su thugs brtse'i phyir//chos kyis 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad bstan//'tsho ba'i sems can dag kyang gzigs nas su//mdo sde bye ba phyag
167a5(mdo sde): stong rnams kyang bshad//sems can gang 'dir nyon mongs 'joms gtsang ba//srog chags de dag rnams kyi mthu mkhyen nas//de nas chos rgyal sman pa chen po
167a6(mdo sde): yang //rnam grangs bye ba phrag brgya 'chad mdzad cing //sems can stobs dang ye shes ldan mkhyen nas//gtsug gi nor bu lta bu'i mdo 'di bshad//mdo sde
167a7(mdo sde): kun gyi mchog gyur 'di yin te//'jig rten du ni mdo sde mtha' 'di bshad//ngas ni nam yang ma bshad rab bsrungs pa//de ni de ring bsgrags kyis thams cad
167b1(mdo sde): nyon//nga ni yongs su mya ngan 'das gyur nas//'di 'dra'i chos bzhi 'di dag bstan par bya//gang zhig byang chub dam pa mchog 'dod dang //de dag nga yi bya ba rnams byed pa//de la//
167b2(mdo sde): mya ngan med cing bar chad med//mdog mi sdug cing na bar mi 'gyur dang //de yi mdog kyang nag por mi 'gyur te//de ni grong khyer ngan par yongs mi gnas//rtog tu mthong
167b3(mdo sde): dga' drang srong chen po de//de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du mchod par 'gyur//lha yi bu pho gzhon nu de dag kyang //rtag tu do yi g.yog kyang byed par 'gyur//de la nam yang
167b4(mdo sde): mtshon dang dug mi tshugs//lus la bong rdo dbyug pas mi phog go/de la gang dag kha ngan zer ba ni//de dag kha yang lkugs shing zlums par 'gyur//mya ngan nga 'das mdo 'di
167b5(mdo sde): gang 'dzin pa//de na srog chags rnams kyi gnyen du 'gyur//snang ba thob cing sa 'di'i steng na rgyu//srog chags bye ba mang po'i rab rib sel//de yis rmi lam bzang po'i dngos
167b6(mdo sde): mthong ste//des ni dge slong dge slong ma yang mthong //de bzhin bdug lus seng ge'i khri la 'dug/rnam pa mang po'i chos rnams ston par byed//de ni rmi lam na yang lta klu dang //
167b7(mdo sde): gnod sbyin lha min gang+gA'i bye ma snyed//thams cad thal mo sbyar ba de dag la//chos kyi dam pa rnam pa mang po 'chad//de ni rmi lam de bzhin gshegs pa mthong //srog chags/
168a1(mdo sde): bye ba mngal chos ston cing //'od zer stong dag rab tu 'gyed mdzad la//mgon po dbyangs skur gser gyi mdog 'dra mthong //de yang de na thal mo sbyar 'dug nas/
168a2(mdo sde): thub pa rkang gnyis mchog la mngon par bstod//rgyal ba sman pa chen po de yang ni//'khor bzhi dag la chos mchog ston pa mdzad//de yis thos nas rab tu dga' bar
168a3(mdo sde): 'gyur//rab tu mgu ba skyes nas mchod pa byed//phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes myur reg nas//rmi lam du ni de yis gzungs thob bo//'jig rten mgon pos de yi bsam
168a4(mdo sde): mkhyen nas//rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'ongs dus na 'dir//ye shes bla med zhi ba reg 'gyur zhes//skyes bu khyu mchog nyid du de lung ston//khyod kyi zhing yang shin tu rgya cher
168a5(mdo sde): 'gyur//'khor bzhi rnams kyang ji ltar nga yi bzhin//gus par gyur cing thal mo rab sbyar te//de dag zag med chos mang nyan par 'gyur//des ni bdag gi lus kyang
168a6(mdo sde): yang mthong ba//ri sul dag na chos ni sgom byed cing //chos la goms par byas pas chos nyid reg/de yis ting nge 'dzin rnyed rgyal ba mthong //gser gyi kha dog bsod
168a7(mdo sde): nams rgyal mtshan ldan//rmi lam dag na mthong nas chos kyang nyan//thos nas de yang 'khor la rab tu ston//de yi rmi lam du ni de 'dra mi//rmi lam na yang rgyal srid
168b1(mdo sde): thams cad dang //btsun mo'i 'khor dang de bzhin gnyen tshogs spangs//'dod pa thams cad spangs te mngon par byung //byang chub snying po ga la yod par song //byang chub
168b2(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i phyir ni shing drung der//de na seng ge'i khri la 'dug nas su//de bzhin du yang zhag bdun 'das nas ni//de bzhin gshegs kyi ye shes rjes su thob//byang chub
168b3(mdo sde): thob ste de nas langs nas su//zag pa med pa'i 'khor lo rab bskor te//bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab bye stong du//'khor bzhi dag la de ni chos ston to//der ni zag pa
168b4(mdo sde): med pa'i chos bstan nas//srog chags bye ba mang po mya ngan bzlas//rgyu zad par me bzhin du mya ngan 'da'o//de ni rmi lam rnam pa de 'dra rmi//nga yis legs bshad nga yis
168b5(mdo sde): chos mdo mchog/gang zhig phyi ma'i dus ni rab ston pa//de yi phan yin mang zhing mtha' yas te//'jam dbyangs de dag 'dra bar de rtag 'gyur//dam pa'i chos pad+ma
168b6(mdo sde): dkar po las bde bar gnas pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gsum pa'o////de nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems
168b7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed/de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nas langs te de dag la thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal
169a1(mdo sde): te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la gnang na/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang de
169a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi'o//klag par
169a3(mdo sde): bgyi'o//yi ger 'dri bar bgyi'o//mchod par bgyi'o//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brtson par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag cag la
169a4(mdo sde): legs par bka' stsal du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag khyed
169a5(mdo sde): kyis 'di bya ci dgos/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na nga'i byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag gang+gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed yod de/byang chub sems dpa'
169a6(mdo sde): de lta bu rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' re re'i g.yog kyang /byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag gang+gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed kho na ste/byang chub sems dpa' de
169a7(mdo sde): dag ri re'i g.yog kyang de snyed do//de dag nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe ni/chos kyi rnam grangs 'dzin te//yang dag par rab tu ston
169b1(mdo sde): to//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di kun tu gas/rnam par gas par gyur to//gas pa de dag gi bar nas gang dag
169b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid la brten cing /sa chen po 'di'i 'og gi nam mkha'i khams la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu/skyes bu
169b3(mdo sde): chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po 'thon te/de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung 'di lta bu 'di thos nas sa rum nas 'thon to//
169b4(mdo sde): de dag la byang chub sems dpa' re re yang /g.yog byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma skyed yod cing /tshogs dang tshogs chen po dang /tshogs kyi slob dpon na//
169b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshogs dang tshigs chen po dang /chags kyi slob dpon 'di lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung
169b6(mdo sde): drug cu'i bye ma snyed de dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i sa rum nas 'thon par gyur na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog byang chub sems dpa'
169b7(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed yod pa rnams lta ci smos/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed yod pa
170a1(mdo sde): rnams lta ci smos/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung sum cu'i bye ma snyed yod pa rnams lta ci smos/byang
170a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung nyi shu'i bye ma snyed yod pa rnams lta ci smos/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
170a3(mdo sde): chen po g.yog byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed yod pa rnams lta ci smos/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i
170a4(mdo sde): klung lnga dang bzhi dang gsum dang gnyis kyi bye ma snyed yod pa rnams lta ci smos/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung
170a5(mdo sde): gcig gi bye ma snyed yod pa rnams lta ci smos/byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po g.yog byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung phyed kyi bye ma snyed yod pa rnams
170a6(mdo sde): lta ci smos/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma'i bzhi cha dang drug cha dang brgyad cha dang nyi shu cha dang lnga bcu cha
170a7(mdo sde): dang brgya'i cha dang stong gi cha dang brgya phrag stong gi cha dang bye ba'i cha dang bye ba brgya'i cha dang bye ba stong gi tshe dang bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi cha
170b1(mdo sde): yod pa rnams lta ci smos/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yod pa rnams lta ci smos/byang chub sems dpa' sems
170b2(mdo sde): dpa' chen po g.yog bye ba yod pa rnams lta ci smos/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog stong phrag brgya yod pa rnams lta ci smos/byang chub sems dpa' sem
170b3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po g.yog stong yod pa rnams lta ci smos/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog lnga brgya yod pa rnams lta ci smos/byang chub sems dpa' sems
170b4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po g.yog bzhi brgya dang sum brgya dang nyis brgya yod pa rnams lta ci smos/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog brgya yod pa rnams lta ci smos//
170b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog byang chub sems dpa' ldi bcu yod pa rnams lta ci smos/de bzhin du sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
170b6(mdo sde): po g.yog byang chub sems dpa' bzhi bcu pa dang sum cu pa dang nyi shu pa dang bcu pa dang lnga pa dang bzhi pa dang gsum pa dang gnyis po rnams lta ci smos/byang chub sems
170b7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag dang gnyis pa rnams lta ci smos/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog med pa de gcig pu gnas pa rnams lta ci smos te/
171a1(mdo sde): de dag gi grangs sam bgrang ba 'am dpe 'am zla'ang mi dmigs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i
171a2(mdo sde): sa ru ma nas 'thon no//de dag 'thon nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
171a3(mdo sde): pa shAkya thub pa dang lhan cig tu seng ge'i khri gang la bzhugs pa'i rin po che'i mchod rten chen po nam mkha' bar snang la gnas pa ga la ba der dang ste lhags nas/de
171a4(mdo sde): bzhini gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de gnyis kyi zhab sA la mgo bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
171a5(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa nyid kyi sprul pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gang dag phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag nas 'dus la/rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing
171a6(mdo sde): ljon pa'i drung dag na seng ge'i khri dag la bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la btud cing phyag btsal te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
171a7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la/lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas/byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa rnam pa du mas mngon par bstod de phyogs gcig tu
171b1(mdo sde): 'khod nas thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
171b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang la mngon du phyag 'tshal lo//de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
171b3(mdo sde): sa rum nas 'thon nas/bar gyi bskal pa lnga bcu rdzogs par 'das kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa rnam
171b4(mdo sde): pa du mas bstod do//bar gyi bskal pa lnga bcu po de dag la/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de cang mi gsung bar gyur to//'khor bzhi po de dag kyang bar gyi bskal pa
171b5(mdo sde): lnga bcu po de dag nyid la cang mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'di lta bu mdzad de/rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par
171b6(mdo sde): 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad pas 'khor bzhi po de dag gis de dag phyi dro gcig kho na snyam du shes so//'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'ang 'jig rten gyi khams
171b7(mdo sde): stong phrag brgya'i nam mkha' tsam du gyur te/byang chub sems dpas yongs su gang bar mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i
172a1(mdo sde): phung po chen po de'i gtso bo//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhi gang dag byung ba 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
172a2(mdo sde): spyod pa khyad par can zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa
172a3(mdo sde): rnam dag ces bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa brtan pa zhes bya ba ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhi po de dag ni
172a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i phung po chen po de'i gtso bor gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhi po de
172a5(mdo sde): dag byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i phung po de'i mdun du 'dug ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan
172a6(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung lags sam skrun nyung lags sam bde bar reg pa lo gnas lags som/bcom ldan
172a7(mdo sde): 'das khyod kyi sems can rnams tshul mdzes lags sam legs par go ba lags sam gdul sla ba lags sam/rnam par sbyang sla ba lags sam bcom ldan
172b1(mdo sde): 'das la skyo ba skyed par mi bgyid lags sam/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhi po de dag gis/bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
172b2(mdo sde): gsol to//'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa//bde bar reg la gnas lags sam//gnod las rnam par rab grol lam//sdig pa mi mnga' sku bde 'am//khyod
172b3(mdo sde): kyi sems can tshul mdzes sam//gdul sla sbyang bar sla lags sam//'jig rten mgon gyis bshad pa na//skyo ba skyod par mi bgyid dam//de nas bcom ldan 'das
172b4(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i phung po de'i gtso bo//byang chub sems dpa' bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu
172b5(mdo sde): dag de bzhin te bde bar reg pa la gnas so//gnod pa chung ngo snyun nyung ngo //nga'i sems can 'di dag tshul mdzes so//go sla'i gdul sla'o//rnam par sbyang sla'o//rnam
172b6(mdo sde): par sbyong ba na ngal skyo ba mi skye'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu dag de nyid kyis sems can 'di dag sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshe yongs su sbyang
172b7(mdo sde): ba byas pa'i phyir te/rigs kyi bu dag nga mthong ba dang thos pa tsam gyis kyang mos par 'gyur la/sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la 'bab cing 'jug ste/gang dag nyan thos
173a1(mdo sde): kyis la yongs su 'dris par byas pa rnams ni ma gtogs so//de dag kyang dus da ltar sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la btsud do don dam pa zos par byas so//
173a2(mdo sde): de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to//dpa' bo chen po legs so legs//khyod kyi sems kyi
173a3(mdo sde): tshul mdzes shing //gdul sla rnam pa srung sla dang //'dren pa gang dag khyod kyi ni//ye shes zab mo 'di nyan cing //thos nas mos par 'gyur ba dang //'dren par/
173a4(mdo sde): 'jug par 'gyur ba la//bdag cag rjes su yi rang ngo //de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang byang chub
173a5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i phung po chen po de'i gtso bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhi po de dag la/rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so//rigs kyi bu dag
173a6(mdo sde): khyed de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod pa'ang legs so legs so zhes bya bu byin no//de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang
173a7(mdo sde): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed dag 'di snyam du sems te/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen
173b1(mdo sde): po dang byang chub sems dpa'i phung po chen po grang sa rum nas 'thon te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la bsti stang du byed/btsun par byed//
173b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la dgyes par byed pa 'di dag/bdag cag gis sngon ma mthong sngon ma thos ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ga las lhagaso snyam/
173b3(mdo sde): sems so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bdag nyid the tshom dang som nyir gyur pa'ang shes/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/
173b4(mdo sde): po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'ang sems kyis rig nas de'i tshe thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la
173b5(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis don de zhus pa/byang chub sems dpa' sngon ma byung //brgya stong phrag ni mang po dang //bye ba phrag ni mtha' yas pa//rkang gnyis mchog
173b6(mdo sde): gis bstan du gsol//rdzu 'phrul chen po 'di dag rnams//gang nas ji ltar lhags par gyur//rab tu che ba'i lus kyi gzugs//'di dag gang nas ji ltar lhags//'di/
173b7(mdo sde): dag thams cad brtan ldan zhing //dran dang ldan la drang srong che//shin tu lta na sdug pa'i gzugs//'di dag gang nas lhags par gyur//byang chub sems dpa' mkhas
174a1(mdo sde): gyur pa//re re'i g.yog kyang dpag mi lang //gang+gA'i bye ma ji snyed pa//de snyed mchis so 'jig rten dbang //byang chub sems dpa'i g.yog rnams ni//
174a2(mdo sde): grangs ldan drug cur yongs tshang ba//gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed//kun kyang byang chub zhugs pa lags//dpa' bo g.yog dang ldan gyur pa//rnam pa 'di 'dra'i skyo ba rnams kyi//
174a3(mdo sde): 'di dag tshed ni gang+gA'i klung //drug cu kho na'i bye ma snyed//gzhan dag de bas ches mang ste//g.yog rnams mtha' yas ldan pa lags//gang+gA phrag ni lnga bcu dang //bzhi
174a4(mdo sde): bcu dang ni sum cu dang //gang+gA nyi shu'i bye snyed de//g.yog 'khor de dag de snyed lags//gzhan dag de bas ches mang ste//de dag rnams kyi bcu dang lnga//skyob pa sangs
174a5(mdo sde): rgyas sras rnams kyi//so so re re'i g.yog gyur pa//gang nas 'di 'dra'i 'khor 'di rnams//rnam par 'dren pa de ring lhags//sa so re re'i g.yog gyur pa//rjes su slob/
174a6(mdo sde): pa'i grogs po dag/gang+gA bzhi dang gsum rnams dang //gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyang mchis//gzhan yang de bas ches meng ba//de yi grangs ni mtha' yas te//bskal
174a7(mdo sde): pa bye ba stong du yang //de dag dpag par nus ma lags//byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo pa//skyob pa dag gi g.yog rnams ni//gang+gA phyed dang sum cha dang //bcu dang
174b1(mdo sde): nyi shu'i cha yang mchis//gzhan yang de bas ches mang ste//bskal pa bye ba brgya rnams su//re re bgrang bar bgyis na ni//de dag rnams la chad ma mchis//gzhan yang de bas/
174b2(mdo sde): ches mang ste//g.yog rnams nyung ba ma lags pa//bye ba bye phrag bye ba dang //de bzhin bye ba phyed pa'ing mchis//gzhan yang drang srong che rnams kyi//byang chub sems dpa
174b3(mdo sde): shes rab tshe//bgrang ba las ni 'das pa rnams//thams cad gus dang bcas par gnas//g.yog 'khor stobs dang ldan pa dang //de bzhin brgya dang lnga bcu pa//
174b4(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyar yang //de dag bgrang bar nus ma lags//dpa' bo dag gi g.yog rnams ni//nyi shu dag dang bcu dang lnga//de bzhin bzhi gsum gnyis pa
174b5(mdo sde): yang //de dag la ni grangs ma mchis//gang dag bdag nyid gcig rgyu zhing //gcig pu zhi ba myong bgyid pa//gang dag de ring 'dir lhags pa//de dag la yang grangs
174b6(mdo sde): ma mchis//grangs shing lag na thogs nas su//gang+gA'i bye ma snyed rnams kyi//bskal par gal to mis bgrangs kyang //des ni mtha' ma rnyed ma lags//kun kyang tsho ba'i
174b7(mdo sde): bdag nyid can//skyob pa brtson 'grus ldan pa ste//byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo pa//'di rnams gang las byung ba lags//gang gis 'di dag chos rnams bstan//
175a1(mdo sde): byang chub la ni su yis bkod//'di dag su yi bstan la mos//gang gis bstan pa 'dzin pa lags//sa 'di thams cad brtol nas su//phyogs bzhi
175a2(mdo sde): dag ni kun nas kyang //mkhas shing rdzu 'phrul ldan pa dang //shes rab chen po rnams kyang 'thon//byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs bral ba//de ltar 'thon po 'di dag
175a3(mdo sde): gis//thub pa 'jig rten khams 'di yang //kun tu sang seng bgyis lags so//'di dag nam yang bdag cag gis//sngon chad ye yong ma mthong na//de yi zhing gri mi
175a4(mdo sde): rnams ni//'jig rten 'dren pa bstan du gsol//phyogs bcu drug tu bdag cag rnams//'di ltar yang dang yang mchis na//byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag
175a5(mdo sde): ni//bdag cag rnams kyis yod ma mthong //khyod kyi spos rnams gcig kyang ni//bdag cag nam yang ma mthong ba//'di dag de ring 'phral la mthong //thub pa de yi
175a6(mdo sde): spyod pa gsungs//byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag/stong gi phrag ni brgya rnams kyang //thams cad ngo mtshar ltad mor gyur//rkang gnyis mchog la de dag
175a7(mdo sde): lho//byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs bral ba//dpa' bo 'di dag ga las mchis//phung po mi mnga' dpag yas pa//dpa' bo chen po lung bstan gsol//
175b1(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sprul pa gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na sems can rnams la chos ston pa'i de bzhin
175b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nus gshegs nas/bcom ldan 'das de
175b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i phyogs brgyad kun nas rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i drung dag na rin po che'i seng ge'i khri chen
175b4(mdo sde): po la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi so so'i zhabs 'bring ba de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpe'i tshogs chen po dang /byang chub
175b5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i phung po chen po sa rum nas 'thon te nam mkha' la 'khod pa de dag mthong nas/ngo mtshar dang rmad du gyur/so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces
175b6(mdo sde): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa 'dri snyed gang nas lhags/de skad ces gsol ba
175b7(mdo sde): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis/rang rang gi zhabs 'bring ba de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
176a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag khyad yud tsam zhig sdod cig/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i 'og tu bla na med
176a2(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la don 'di 'dri ste/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
176a3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas de'i ldan ldon par 'gyur gyis de las khyed nyin cig/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
176a4(mdo sde): po byams pA la bka' stsal po/mA pham pa gang khyod kyis de la gnas rgya chen po 'di dris pa ma pham pa legs si legs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad
176a5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog
176a6(mdo sde): tu gyur pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par rol pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu bgyings pa dang /de bzhin
176a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i pha rol gnon pa/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de yang dag par rab tu ston gyis/rigs kyi bu
176b1(mdo sde): dag de'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'di thams cad sgrims shig/shin tu go gyon la mthu brtan par gyis shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs
176b2(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//gzhan ma yin pa'i tshig rnams ngas bshad kyis//rigs kyi bu dag thams cad rab tu bsgrims//de bzhin gshegs kyi ye
176b3(mdo sde): shes bsam mi khyab//'di la mkhas rnams zhum par ma byed cig/kun kyang brtan dang ldan zhing dran ldan byos//kun kyang mnyam par bzhag cing gnas par gyis///
176b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ngo mtshar ba//sngon chud ma byung chus ni mnyan par byos//ngas ni khyed cag legs par yongs dgod kyis//thams cad the tshom nam yang
176b5(mdo sde): ma byed cig/rnam par 'dren nga gzhan du gsung me yin//nga yi ye shes nams kyang grangs yod min//bde bar gshegs pas chos zab thugs chud de//brtag
176b6(mdo sde): mi nus shing de la tshad kyang med//ngas ni chos de rab tu bstan par byas//de dag ci 'dra ci lta nga las nyon//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag bka'
176b7(mdo sde): stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ma pham pa khyod mos par bya/khyed khong du chud par bya'o//ma pham pa byang
177a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu med/grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du med/bgrang du med pa gang dag khyod kyis sngon ma mthong
177a2(mdo sde): bas rum nas gdod 'thon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag thams cad ni/ma pham pa nga 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bla na med pa yang
177a3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/nga nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la btsud de yongs su bsngos so//
177a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni nges byang chub sems dpa'i chos 'di la yongs su smin par byas pa/rab tu bkod pa bzhag pa yongs su gnas par byas pa/btsud pa khong
177a5(mdo sde): du chud par byas pa dag go/ma pham pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i 'og gi nam mkha'i khams
177a6(mdo sde): kyi yongs su zin pa na gnas te/kha ton dang lung nod pa dang tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la zhugs pa dag go/rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni 'du 'dzi la mi dga' zhing
177a7(mdo sde): 'du 'dzi med pa la dga' ba brtson pa mi 'dor zhing brtson 'grus brtsams pa dag gi/ma pham pa rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni bden pa la mngon par dga' zhing
177b1(mdo sde): bden pa la mos pa ste/rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni lha dang mi la brten cing mi gnas so//rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni 'du 'dzi med pa'i spyod pa la dga' ba chos kyi kun dga' ba
177b2(mdo sde): la mos pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la brtson pa dag go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsol to//byang chub sems dpa' 'di
177b3(mdo sde): dag dpag med pa//'di dag bsam gyis mi khyab chad kyang med//rdzu 'phrul shes rab thos pa rnams dang ldan//bskal pa bye ba mang por ye shes spyad//nga yis 'di/
177b4(mdo sde): dag thams cad byang chub la//yongs su smin byas nga yi zhing na 'khod//'di dag thams cad nga yis smin byas te//byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag nga yi bu//
177b5(mdo sde): 'di dag thams cad mgon dang sbyangs la mos//'du 'dzis ni rtag tu spong bar byed//nga yi spyod pa mchog gi rjes slob cing //nga bu 'di dag 'du 'dzi med par
177b6(mdo sde): spyod//nam mkhas yongs su 'dzin pa der gnas te//zhing 'di'i 'og na dpa'o rnams yongs su spyod//byang chub dam pa 'di ni kun sgrub cing //nyin mtshan
177b7(mdo sde): du ni bag yod shin tu brtson//thams cad brtson 'grus brtsams pa dran dang ldan//dpag tu med pa'i shes rab stobs la gnas//'di dag mi 'jigs
178a1(mdo sde): par yang chos 'chad pa'i//'od gsal 'di dag thams cad nga yi bu//byang chub dam pa 'di ni ngas thob nas//grong khyer ga ya de yi shing drung de /
178a2(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor lo bra na med pa bskor//thams cad byang chub mchog 'dir smin par byas//zag med yang dag nga yi tshig 'di ni//thos nas thams cad nga la dad par gyis
178a3(mdo sde): nga yis de ltar byang chub mchog thob ring //ngas ni 'di dag thams cad yongs smon byaso//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang byang chub sems
178a4(mdo sde): dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po de dag ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur nas/ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das skad cig bzhugs nas/yun ring po ma lon por byang chub
178a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' grangs med pa 'di snyed 'di dag bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par btsud de yongs su smin par mdzad snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan
178a6(mdo sde): 'das la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhi ni gshegs pa gzhon nur gyur pa na/ser
178a7(mdo sde): skya'i gnas kyi shAkya'i grong khyer nas mngon par byung ste/ga yA'i grong khyer nas shin tu mi ring ba byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par gshegs te/bla na med pa
178b1(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas nas/bcom ldan 'das deng du de'i dus nas lo bzhi bcu lhag tsam lags na/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin
178b2(mdo sde): gshegs pas dus 'di tsam gyis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa dpag tu ma mchis pa 'di dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa dang /de bzhin
178b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i pha rol gnon pa mdzad cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang byang chub sems dpa'i phung po 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis dus ri tsam gyis/bla na med pa
178b4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu btsud cing yongs su smin par mdzad/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang /byang chub sems dpa'i phung po 'dre
178b5(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba khrig khrig brgya stong du bgrangs kyang mi rnyed pa de tsam du/bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis pa/de ltar grangs ma mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di
178b6(mdo sde): dag ni/yun ring por tshangs par spyod pa spyod pa sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtse ba bskrun pa/bskal pa brgya snying mang por yongs su grub po lags so//bcom ldan
178b7(mdo sde): 'das 'di lta ste dper na/mi gzhon zhig btsas nas lo nyi shu rtsa lnga lon pa gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho skra nag po thog mi'i na tshod dang ldan pa 'ga' zhig mchis la/des bul
179a1(mdo sde): brgya lon pa dag ston cing rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni nga'i bu'o zhes de skad smras la/mi lo brgya lon pa de dag kyang 'di skad du/'di ni bdag gi pha ste spyad pa yin
179a2(mdo sde): no zhes mchi na/bcom ldan 'das me de'i tshig la 'jig rten yid ches par mi 'gyur te yid ches par dka' ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/de bzhin
179a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ring po ma lags par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
179a4(mdo sde): chen po dpag tu ma mchis pa mang po bskal pa bye ba khrog khrig brgya stong mang por tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa/yun ring por sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la nges par bgyis
179a5(mdo sde): pa/ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong la mnyam par bzhag pa dang ldan pa la mkhas pa/mngon por shes pa chen po yongs su spyad pa bgyis pa/sangs rgyas kyi sa la
179a6(mdo sde): mkhas pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams yang dag par rjod pa la mkhas pa/'jig rten na ngo mtshar dang rmad du gyur pa brtson 'grus dang stobs dang mthu
179a7(mdo sde): chen po thob pa de dag la/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/ngas 'di dag thog ma nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di la yang dag par btsud de/yongs su
179b1(mdo sde): smin par byas shing yongs su bsngos te/de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/nga nyid kyis brtson 'grus drang pha rol
179b2(mdo sde): gnon pa 'di dag thams cad byas so zhes gsung ba la/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan mo lags par gsung ba ste/don 'di de bzhin
179b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la yid ches lags mod kyi/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' theg pa la gsar du yang dag par
179b4(mdo sde): zhugs pa rnams gnas 'di la the tshom 'tshal bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos n+ya yid mi ches
179b5(mdo sde): mi dang mi mos par 'gyur te/bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du de dag ni chos kyis phongs par 'gyur po'i las mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro//ci nas
179b6(mdo sde): bdag cag kyang chos 'di la the tshom 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ba dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can dag
179b7(mdo sde): gis thos na'ang the tshom 'tshal bar mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di legs par bshad du gsol/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
180a1(mdo sde): po byams pas/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to//gang tshe ser skya'i gnas su bltam gyur cing //shAkya'i gnas
180a2(mdo sde): nas mngon par byung nas su//grong khyer ga yAr byang chub brnyes gyur pa//'jig rten mgon po de nas yun mi ring //'jigs bral 'di dag dang ni gzhan mang ba//tshogs
180a3(mdo sde): che bskal pa bye bar spyad pa ste//rdzu 'phrul stobs la gnas shing mi g.yo ba//legs bslabs shes rab stobs kyang rtogs par rig/chu yi pad+ma lta bur ma gos
180a4(mdo sde): pa//de dag so 'di brtol nas deng 'dir lhags//'jig rten bdag po dran ldan slob ma sras//thams cad thal sbyar gus dang bcas te mchis//khyod kyi rmad byung
180a5(mdo sde): 'di 'dra de dag la//byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar yid tshes 'gyur//the tshom gzhom pa'i slad du bka' stsal te//don 'di ci bzhin khyod kyis 'dir bshad gsol///
180a6(mdo sde): dper na 'di na skyes bu la la zhig/btsas nas lo ni nyi shu lhag lon pa//gzhon nu thor bu lang tshe skra gnag des//btsas nas lo brgya lon la bur ston cing //
180a7(mdo sde): skra skya gnyer ma can dag 'di skad du//'di ni bdag cag lus bskyed yin mtshan//thor bu'i bu ni 'di 'dra 'di dag la//'jig rten mgon po shin tu yid ches dka'//
180b1(mdo sde): de bzhin bcom ldan 'das kyang sku gzhon la//byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa mang po 'di//dran dang ldan zhing myi 'jigs shes rab can//bsgral ba bye ba stong du logs/
180b2(mdo sde): par bslabs//brtan dang ldan zhing shes rab mokhas gyur pa//thams cad byad bzhin bzang zhing blta na sdug/chos rnams gtan la dbab cing mi 'jigs pa//'jig
180b3(mdo sde): rten rnam par 'dren pas yongs su bstod//rlung ltar chags pa ma mchis rgyu ba ste//nam mkha'i khams la rtag tu gnas ma lags//sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni yongs
180b4(mdo sde): tshal zhing //bde bar gshegs kyi sgras rnams brtson 'grus skyed//'jig rten mgron po'i mngon sum thos pas na//bdag cag la ni the tshom gzhar ma mchis//'jig
180b5(mdo sde): rten rnam 'dren mya ngan 'das pa na//'di la ji lta bur ni yid che so 'gyur//gnas 'di la ni the tshom 'tshal ba yis//byang chub sems dpa' ngan 'gror mchis sa re//
180b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams//smin mdzad ji bzhin de ni lung bstan gsol//dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po las/byang chub sems dpa' sa rum
180b7(mdo sde): nas 'thon pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bzhi pa'o////dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po//bam po bcu pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad
181a1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa ngas yang dag pa'i tshig smras pa la dad cing yod//
181a2(mdo sde): ches par gyis shig/lan gnyis ldan gsum du'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa
181a3(mdo sde): ngas yang dag pa'i tshig smras pa la dad cing yid ches par gyis/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems
181a4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po byams pa mdun du bzhag nas thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di bshad du gsol/
181a5(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa la bdag cag yid ches par bgyid do//lan gnyis su'ang thams cad dang
181a6(mdo sde): ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di bshad du gsol/bde bar gshegs
181a7(mdo sde): pas bshad du gsol/de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa la bdag cag yid ches par bgyid do//lan gsum du'ang thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
181b1(mdo sde): dpa'i tshogs kyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di bshad du gsol/bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/
181b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa la bdag cag yid ches par bgyid do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyisku lan gsum gyi bar
181b3(mdo sde): du gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag de'i phyi ro ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa 'di lta bu 'di nyon cig/
181b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dis ni/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa shAkya'i khyim nas mngon par byung ste/grong khyer ga yA zhes
181b5(mdo sde): bya bar byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par gshegs nas da gdod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so snyam du de ltar shes
181b6(mdo sde): mod kyi/rigs kyi bu dag nga ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//rigs kyi
181b7(mdo sde): bu dag 'di lta ste dper na/mi la la zhig byung la des 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag lnga bcu'i sa'i khams kyi rdul phra rab dag las
182a1(mdo sde): rdul phra rab gcig khyer te/shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag lnga bcu kho na 'das nas rdul phra rab kyi rdul
182a2(mdo sde): de bzhag la/mi dris rnam grangs 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi sa'o khams rnams zad par byas nas/sa'i khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag thams
182a3(mdo sde): cad rnam grangs 'di dang bzhag pa'i tshul 'dis shar phyogs su bzhag na/rigs kyi bu dag 'di ji snyam du sems/'jig rten gyi khams de dag la la zhig gis bsam
182a4(mdo sde): pa 'am dpag pa 'am bgrang ba 'am brtag par nus sam/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang thams cad dang ldan
182a5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs des/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ni grangs ma mchis pa bgrang
182a6(mdo sde): du ma mchis pa sems kyis las yang dag par 'das pa ste/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang /'phags pa'i ye shes kyi bsam
182a7(mdo sde): pa 'am dpag pa 'am bgrang ba 'am brtag par mi nus so//bcom ldan 'das gnas 'di ni/bdag cag phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
182b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi bsam pa'i spyod yul du'ang mi 'gyur te/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams de dag de tsam du tshad ma mchis pa lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom
182b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dag khyed mos par bya'o//khyed kyi khong du chud par
182b3(mdo sde): bya'o//rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag las/mi des gang dag tu rdul phra rab de dag bzhag pa dang /rigs kyi bu dag gang dag tu ma bzhag pa'i 'jig
182b4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag thams cad na rdul phra rab kyi rdul yod pa dag ni/rigs kyi bu dag ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
182b5(mdo sde): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bskal pa bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag ji snyed pa de snyed du med do//rigs kyi bu dag gang tshun chad nges 'jig rten gyi khoms mi mjed
182b6(mdo sde): 'di dang /'jig rten gyi khams gzhan bye bo khrag khrig brgya stong dag tu sems can rnams la chos bstan pa de'i bar du/rigs kyi bu dag ngas de bzhin gshegs pa mar
182b7(mdo sde): me mdzad la sogs pa/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag yongs su brjod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
183a1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/rigs kyi bu dag ngas thabs mkhas pas chos bstan pa mngon par
183a2(mdo sde): bsgrub pa de dag sprul to//rigs kyi bu dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni/sems can 'ongs shing lhags pa/rnams kyi dbang po dang brtson 'grus kyi rim pa la
183a3(mdo sde): gzigs nas/de dang de dag tu bdag gi ming brjod cing de dang de dag tu bdag nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das par brjod de/chos kyi rnam grangs rnam pa mang pos de lta de lta
183a4(mdo sde): bur sems can rnams yongs su tshim par mdzad do//rigs kyi bu dag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa tha dad pa'i sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba/nye ba'i nyon
183a5(mdo sde): mongs pa mang ba rnams la 'di skad du/dge slong dag nga ni na gzhon te/mngon par byung ba dang dge slong dag nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
183a6(mdo sde): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon no zhes gsung ngo //rigs kyi bu dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas yun ring mod kyi//
183a7(mdo sde): nga mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon no zhes gsungs te/sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dang gzud pa'i don ma gtogs par chos kyi
183b1(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di dag ma bshad do//rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnam grangs de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams gdul ba'i phyir gsungs so//rigs
183b2(mdo sde): kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams gdul ba'i phyir tshig gang gsungs pa/bdag las smos kyang rung gzhan las smos kyang rung /bdag la dmigs kyang
183b3(mdo sde): rung gzhan la dmigs kyang rung ste/de bzhin gshegs pas grong ci bshad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de dag thams cad ni bden pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ste//
183b4(mdo sde): 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa la brdzun du smra ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pas khams gsum pa skye ba med pa dang 'chi ba med pa dang 'chi 'pho med
183b5(mdo sde): pa dang 'byung ba med pa dang 'khor ba med pa dang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba med pa dang byung ba ma yin pa dang ma byung ba ma yin pa dang yod pa ma yin pa dang med pa ma
183b6(mdo sde): yin pa dang de bzhin du ma yin pa dang gzhan du ma yin pa dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ma yin pa dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
183b7(mdo sde): du gzigs shing /ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bos mthong ba de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas khams gsum pa gzigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin
184a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni gnas 'di la mngon sum gyi chos dang ldan te bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos can no//de la de bzhin gshegs pas gang ci gsungs pa de
184a2(mdo sde): dag thams cad bden te mi brdzun no//yang sems can spyod pa tha dad pa dang bsam pa tha dad pa dang 'du shes dang rnam par rtog pa spyod pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa
184a3(mdo sde): phyir/chos kyi rnam grangs rnam pa mang po dmigs pa rnam pa mang pos bshad do//rigs kyi bu dge de bzhin gshegs pas mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs
184a4(mdo sde): po mdzad do//yun ring po de srid nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad ni dpag tu med do//de bzhin gshegs pa ni yongs su
184a5(mdo sde): mya ngan las mi 'dre' ste rtag tu bzhugs mod kyi/'dul ba'i dbang gis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ston to//rigs kyi bu dag ngas dadung yang sngon gyi byang
184a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i tshe'i tshad du'ang la phyir te/rigs kyi bu drug ngas da dung yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de nyis
184a7(mdo sde): gyur gyis nga'i tshe'i tshod tshang bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dag 'di ltar yongs su mya ngan las ni mi bda' mod kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar smras so//
184b1(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu dag ngas rnam grangs 'dis sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir te/nga yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar ha cang yang yun ring du
184b2(mdo sde): 'dug cing rgyun du mthong na sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma byas pa/bsod nams dang bral ba dbul por gyur pa 'dod pa la brkamo pa/ldongs pa/lta ba mang po'i dra bas khebs
184b3(mdo sde): pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs so snyam ste/slebs par 'dzin pa'i 'du shes can du 'gyur zhing rnyed dka' ba'i 'du shes mi skyed de/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag/
184b4(mdo sde): cag dang nye'o zhes khams gsum nas 'byung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus mi brtsom zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa dkon par 'du shes mi skyed por 'gyur ro snyam ste/rigs kyi
184b5(mdo sde): bu dag de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thabs mkhas pas/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dag 'byung ba ni shin tu rnyed par dka'o zhes tshig de skad gsung ngo //
184b6(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar sems can de dag gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos/de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur yang srid mi 'gyur yang srid de//
184b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag de'i phyir/ngas de dag la dmigs pa byas te/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ba ni rnyed par dka' zhes smras pas/de dag gis de bzhin
185a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dag 'byung ba rab tu rnyed par dka' bar rig nas ngo mtshar du 'du shes skyed par 'gyur/mya ngan gyi 'du shes skyed par 'gyur ro//de bzhin
185a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa mi mthong na'ang /de bzhin gshegs pa la lta bas sgom par 'gyur ro//de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa yid la byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
185a3(mdo sde): de dag yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar gyur pa'i don du rig nas/de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' mod kyi sems can rnams 'dul
185a4(mdo sde): ba'i dbang gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gsungs so//rigs kyi bu dag gang 'di skad du gsungs pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs te/de la de
185a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa brdzun du smra ba med do//rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste dper na/skyes bu sman pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa gsal ba yid gzhungs
185a6(mdo sde): pa shin tu byang ba 'ga' zhig yod la/skyes bu de la'ang bu mang po bcu 'am nyi shu 'am sum cu 'am bzhi bcu'am lnga bcu 'am brgya'am stong yod par gyur la/sman pa
185a7(mdo sde): de logs shig tu song ste de'i bu de dag thams cad nga byig dug 'thungs sam mnga' dug 'thungs nas/de rnams dbyig dug dang mda' dug de dag gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba
185b1(mdo sde): dag gis nyon mongs shing gdungs te sa la 'gre ldog la/de nas de dag gi pha sman pa logs shig nas 'ongs nas/bu de rnams dbyig dug gam mda' rug de'i sdug bsngal gyis
185b2(mdo sde): nyam thag ste/kha cig ni 'du shes log par gyur/kha cig ni 'du shes ma log ste de dag thams cad sdug bsngal de nyid kyis nyam thag la pha de mthong nas mngon par dga'
185b3(mdo sde): ste/de la 'di skad ces yab bde zhing gnod pa mi mnga' ste legs par byon nam/bdag cag gi lus 'jig par byed pa dbyig dug gam mda' dug 'di las yongs su dgrol
185b4(mdo sde): par gsol/yab kyis bdag cag la srog stsal du gsol zhes smras pa dang /de nas sman pa des bu de dag sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag ste/na bas nyon mongs shing gdungs
185b5(mdo sde): te sa la 'gre ldog pa mthong nas/des sman chen po kha dog dang ldan pa dri dang ldan pa ro dang ldan pa bsdus nas rdo la btags te/bu de dag 'thung du bcug nas 'di skad ces bu
185b6(mdo sde): khyod rnams sman chen po kha dog dang ldan pa dri dang ldan pa ro dang ldan pa 'di 'thung zhig rigs kyi bu dag khyed sman bzang po 'di 'thungs na/myur du dbyig dug gam mda'
185b7(mdo sde): dug las thar te/bde zhing nad med par 'gyur ro zhes smras na/de nas sman pa de'i bu gang dag 'du shes ma log pa de dag ni sman de'i kha dog mthong dri bsnams ro myangs
186a1(mdo sde): nas myur du 'thungs pa dang /de dag nad thams cad las thams cad kyi thams cad du thar par gyur to//de'i bu gang dag 'du shes log par gyur pa de dag gis
186a2(mdo sde): pa de la mngon par bstod de/'di skad du yab bde zhing gnod pa mi mnga' ste legs par byon tam/bdag cag gsor gsol zhes tshig de skad smras te sman byin pa mi
186a3(mdo sde): 'thung ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de dag 'du shes log par gyur pa des sman de'i kha dog kyang mi 'dod dri'ang mi 'dod ro'ang mi 'dod do//de nas skyes bu sman pa
186a4(mdo sde): des 'di snyam du bsams te/bdag gi bu 'di dag dbyig dug gam mda' dug des 'du shes log par gyur pas sman 'di'ang 'thung du ma rung ste nga la ni mngon par bstod
186a5(mdo sde): na/bdag gis bu 'di dag la thabs mkhas pas sman 'di glung snyam mo//de nas sman pa de bu de dag la thabs mkhas pas sman glud par 'dod nas 'di skad ces
186a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag nga ni rgas 'khogs gtugs te/nga'i 'chi ba'i dus nye bar gnas kyis bu khyed rnams mya ngan ma byed cig/mi bde bar ma gyur cig/sman chen po
186a7(mdo sde): byin pa 'di khyed 'dod na sman 'di 'thung zhig ces smras te/bu de dag la thabs mkhas pas de skad bsgo nas/yul gzhan du song ste phyin nas bdag shi'o zhes bu
186b1(mdo sde): nad pa de dag thos par byas pa dang /de dag de'i tshe shin tu mya ngan du gyur/shin tu smre sngags 'don par gyur te/bdag cag gi pha mgon po skyed pa/rjes su snying brtse ba
186b2(mdo sde): gcig pu de'ang shi bas/de'i phyir da bdag cag mgon med par gyur to snyam mo//de dag bdag nyid mgon med par mthong bdag nyid skyabs med par mthong nas phyir zhing mya ngan
