218a3(mdo sde): bar gnas pa'i tshe bar snang gi sgra las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so//sus kyang ma smras par nges par snang las sgra thos te/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung nas mig
218a4(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa dang rna ba rnam par dag pa dang sna rnam par dag pa dang lce rnam par dag pa dang lus rnam par rig pa dang yid rnam par dag pa de lta bu thob bo//rnam par dag
218a5(mdo sde): pade dag thob ma thag tu phyir yang lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu ru bdag gi srog gi 'du byed byin gyis brlabs te/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par
218a6(mdo sde): bsgrags so//dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma nga rgyal can gang dag la sngon khyed la kho bos brnyas par mi byed do zhes bsgrags pa
218a7(mdo sde): gang dag gis/de'i ming rtag tu brnyas par btags pa de dag gis/de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi mthu dang dom bcas pa'i stobs kyi mthu dang spobs pa'i stobs
218b1(mdo sde): kyi mthu dang shes rab kyi mthu rgya chen po mthong nas/thams cad kyang chos mnyan pa'i phyir phyi na 'khod par gyur to//des gzhan yang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po
218b2(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par btsud do//mthu chen thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/de nas shi
218b3(mdo sde): 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar mtshan mthun pa bye ba brgya phrag nyi shu mnyes par byas
218b4(mdo sde): te/thams cad du'ang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu bstan to//de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba des rim gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
218b5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnga sgra rgyal po zhes bya bar mtshan mthun pa bye ba brgya phrag nyi shu mthar gyis mnyes par byas nas de thams cad du'ang /dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i
218b6(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ste/'khor bzhi la yang dag par rab tu bshad do//de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba des mthar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
218b7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin sgra rgyal po zhes bya bar mtshan mthun pa bye ba brgya phrag nyi shu mnyes par byas nas/thams cad du'ang dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i
219a1(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid bzung ste/'khor bzhi la yang dag par rab tu bshad do//thams cad na'ang mig yongs su dag pa dang ldan par
219a2(mdo sde): gyur to//rna ba yongs su dag pa dang sna yongs su dag pa dang lce yongs su dag pa dang lus yongs su dag pa dang yid yongs su dag pa de lta bu dang ldan par gyur to//mthu
219a3(mdo sde): chen thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brnyas pa des/de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de skad la bsti stang byas bla mar byas
219a4(mdo sde): ri mo dang mchod pa dang gsal ba dang dbul ba byas te/gzhan yang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig bergya stong mang po la bsti steng du bya ba dang bla mar bya ba dang ri mo dang
219a5(mdo sde): mchod pa dang gsol ba byas nas/de dag thams cad du'ang dam pa'i chos pad+ma da kar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ste/sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid yongs
219a6(mdo sde): su smin pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mthu chen thob de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
219a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i bstan pa la/'khor bzhi rnams kyis rtag tu brnyas
219b1(mdo sde): par grags shing /gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de snyed mnyes par byas pa/byang chub sems dpa' sems
219b2(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rtag tu brnyas pa de/gzhan zhig yin snyam du som nyi'am yid gnyis sem tha tshom za bar gyur na/mthu chen thob khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i
219b3(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brnyas pa zhes bya bar gyur to//mthu chen thob gal te ngas sngon chos kyi
219b4(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di ma blangs ma bzung bar gyur na/nga 'di ltar myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mi 'gyur te/
219b5(mdo sde): mthu chen thob de ltar ngas sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gan nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ste//
219b6(mdo sde): bklags pa dang bstan pas de'i phyir nga 'di ltar myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon por rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mthu chen thob byang chub sems
219b7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brnyas pa des dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma brgya phrag mang po dag la/bcom ldan 'das de'i bston pa la chos kyi
220a1(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di yang dag par bsgrags shing /kho bo khyed la brnyas par mi byed do//khyed thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod cig dang /khyed
220a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes byas pa dang /gang gis byang chub sems dpa' de la gnod sems bskyed
220a3(mdo sde): par gyur pa de dag gis bskul pa bye ba brgya phrag nyi shur nam yang de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong chos kyi sgra'ang ma thos/dge 'dun gyi sgra'ang ma thos so bskal pa stong
220a4(mdo sde): phrag bcur mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong ngo /de dag thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa de las yongs su thur nas/byang chub
220a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so//mthu chen thob de'i tshe de'i dus ni sems
220a6(mdo sde): can du gyur pa/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bsting ba dang /'phyo ba byas pa de dag gang yin snyam du som nyi'am yid gnyis sam the tshom za bar
220a7(mdo sde): gyur na/mthu chen thob 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang na/bzang skyong la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya dang seng ge'i zla ba la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya dang
220b1(mdo sde): bde gshegs sems pa la sogs pa dge bsnyen ma lnga brgya ste/thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par byas so//mthu chen thob
220b2(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang ston pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de ltar don che ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bla na med pa yang
220b3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par byed par 'gyur ro//mthu chen thob de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/byang chub sems dpa'
220b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyun mi 'chad par gzung bar bya'o//bstan par bya'o//klag par bya'o//bshad par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
220b5(mdo sde): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//'das pa'i dus rnams rjes su dran pa ni//'jigs bsgrags dbyangs rgyal rgyal ba gang byung ba//lha mi gnod sbyin srin
220b6(mdo sde): po'i 'dren pa ste//mthu chen de la lha dang mi yis mchod//rgyal ba de ni mya ngan yongs 'das nas//dam chos 'khrugs par gyur pa tha ma la//de na byang chub sems dpa'
220b7(mdo sde): dge slong byung //de yi ming ni rtag tu brnyas zhes bya//de na dge slong gzhan dang de bzhin du//dmigs par lta ba'i dge slong de gan song //kho bos khyed la nam yang brnyas
221a1(mdo sde): pa med//khyed kyis byang chub mchog phyir spyad pa spyod//de bzhin rtag tu yang dgra bsgrags pa na//gshe zhing brgyad pa de dag bzod par byed//'chi ba'i
221a2(mdo sde): dus byed nye bar gnas pa dang //de yis mdo sde 'di ni thos gyur naso//de tshe mkhas pas 'chi ba'i dus ma byas//tshe yang shin tu ring por byin brlabs te//rnam par 'dren
221a3(mdo sde): pa de yi bstan pa la//de tshe mdo 'di yang ni rab tu bshad//dmigs can mang po de dag thams cad kyang //de yis byang chub tu ni yongs smin byas//de nas byang chub
221a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' shi 'phos nas//sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong mnyes byas te//mthar gyis bsod nams byas pa de dag gis//mdo 'di yang ni rtog par rab tu bshad//
221a5(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras des byang chub yang dag thob//shAkya thub pa nga nyid do yin no//de tshe gang dag dmigs can dge slong dang //dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen gang rnams
221a6(mdo sde): dang //de ni dge bsnyen ma rnams gang byung ba//mkhas pas de tshe byang chub bsgrags gyur pa//de dag rnams kyi sangs rgyas bye mang mthong //de dag lnga brgya mi nyung
221a7(mdo sde): 'di rnams dang //de bzhin dge slong pha dang dge slong ma//nga yi mngon sum dge bsnyen 'di dag ste//thams cad nga yis chos mchog thos byas nas//ngas ni 'di
221b1(mdo sde): dag thams cad yongs smin byas//mya ngan nga 'das dpa' bo 'di kun ni//'di na mdo sde mchog 'di 'dzin par 'gyur//bskal pa mtha' yas bye ba mang por yang //'di
221b2(mdo sde): 'dra'i chos ni nam yang mi thos te//sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya 'byung na yang //de dag kyang ni mdo 'di mi 'chad do//de phyir rang byung nyid kyis brjod pa'i chos//'di lta bu yi//
221b3(mdo sde): rnam pa thos nas su//yang dang yang ni rab tu 'di zung lo//mya ngan nga 'das mdo 'di rab shod cig/dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po las rtag tu brnyas pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa'o///
221b4(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed gang dag/sa ru ma nas 'thon pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan
221b5(mdo sde): 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/bdag cag gis
221b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na/bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag legs pa gang du/bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur
221b7(mdo sde): ba de dang der chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu bshad par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos kyi rnam grangs rgya chen po 'di lta bu bzung ba dang klag pa dang bstan pa
222a1(mdo sde): da r+yab rgyu bshad pa dang sag 'dra bar 'tshal ba lags so//de nas 'jam dpal la sogs pa byung chub sems dpa' bye ba zhun /khrig brgya skyong mang ba
222a2(mdo sde): glang dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na gnas pa dag dang dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma dang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang l+h+wam
222a3(mdo sde): yin dang nam mkha'i lding dang mi 'am ci dang sgo 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang po gang+gA'i klung gi
222a4(mdo sde): bye ma snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/bdag cag gis kyang
222a5(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu bshad par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das lus mi gda' bar byar snang la gnas te dbyangs kyis yang dag par bsgrag par
222a6(mdo sde): bgyi'o//dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa'i sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba bsnyen par bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
222a7(mdo sde): chen po//snga mtshogs dang tshogs chen po dang tshogs kyi slob dpon de dag gi gtso bo gcig po/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa khyad par can/
222b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba/tshogs dang tshogs chen po dang tshogs kyi slob dpon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//spyod pa khyad par can legs so legs so//khyod kyis de ltar gyis
222b2(mdo sde): shig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir khyed de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su smin par byas so//do nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang /
222b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya dran las 'das pa/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsamo pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang de mchod rten gyi dbus na
222b4(mdo sde): seng ge'i khre la bzhugs pa gnyis ka 'dzum pa mdzad nas/gnyis ka zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/ljags kyi dbang po de nyid kyis tshungs pa'i 'jig
222b5(mdo sde): rten gyi bar du phyin nas/lcags kyi dbang po de gnyis las 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po byung ngo //'ad zer de dag las 'od zer re re las kyang byung
222b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpo'i bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/pad+ma'i snying po'i
222b7(mdo sde): seng ge'i khri la 'khod pa dag byung ngo //byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong dag tu dong ste phyogs
223a1(mdo sde): dang phyogs mtshams de dag thams cad na bar snang la 'khod nas chos ston to//ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
223a2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang gi ljags kyi dbang
223a3(mdo sde): pos rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul mdzad pa de bzhin du/'jig rten gyi khyams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gzhan dag nas/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
223a4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag gshegs pa'i rin po che'i shing ljon pa'o drung dag na/seng ge'i khri la so sor bzhugs pa de dag kyang ljags kyi dbang pos rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe
223a5(mdo sde): 'phrul mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
223a6(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis lo 'bum tshang gi bar du rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa mdzad do//de nas lo 'bum 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
223a7(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis ljags kyi dbang po de dag bsdus te/dus gcig tu skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la/thams cad
223b1(mdo sde): kyi mgur gsal ba'i sgra chen po phyung ste se grol gtogs pa'i sgra gcig mdzad do//mgur gsal ba'i sgra chen po de dang se gol gtogs pa'i sgra chen po des/phyogs bcu'i
223b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ji snyed pa de dag thams cad g.yos par gyur te/g.yos rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos/'gul rab tu 'gul kun tu rab
223b3(mdo sde): tu 'gul/ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg go//sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lho//
223b4(mdo sde): 'phye chen po dang me dang mi ma yin pa sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag de na 'dug bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di mthong
223b5(mdo sde): ste/de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i drung na seng ge'i khri so so la bzhugs pa de dag dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
223b6(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang /bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
223b7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang rin po che'i mchod rten chen po de'i dbus na seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
224a1(mdo sde): pa dang lhan cig tu bzhugs pa dang /'khor bzhi po de dag kyang mthong ngo //de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur shin tu dga' ba thob par gyur te/
224a2(mdo sde): bar snang las sgra 'di skad ces thos te/kye grogs po dag 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'dris pa na 'jig rten gyi khams
224a3(mdo sde): mi mdzod ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de/de ltar dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po zhes///
224a4(mdo sde): bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sde/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams pa/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba/byang chub/
224a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la yang dag par rab tu 'chad kyis/de la khyed kyang lhag pa'i bsam pas rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig/bcom ldan
224a6(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la phyag tshol cig/mchod pa gyis shig ces thos so//de nas
224a7(mdo sde): sems can de dag thams cad kyis bar snang las de lta bu'i sgra thos nas de na 'khod bzhin du/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la phyag
224b1(mdo sde): 'tshal lo zhes tshig de skad smras so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir
224b2(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar te/me tog dang bdug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang lha'i ba dan dang rnam par rgyal ba'i bya dan mong
224b3(mdo sde): bo//'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'dag la bde logs su 'thor ro//phyang phrul dang bgo ba dang sa mo do dang do shal dang nor bu rin po che rnam pa mang po'ang gtor to//me tog
224b4(mdo sde): dang bdug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang chos gos drang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang lha'i ba dan dang rnam par rgyal ba'i ba den dang se mo do dang do shal dang nor
224b5(mdo sde): bu dang rin po che gtor ba de dag thams cad la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/me tog dang bdug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang
224b6(mdo sde): gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang lha'i ba dan dang rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan gyi phung po dang se mo do dang do shul dang nor bu dang rin po che de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i
224b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di khebs par gyur te/'jig rten gyi khams gzhan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag dang lhan cig tu khebs par gyur nas gcig tu
225a1(mdo sde): gyur te/gang dag na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag bzhugs pa/'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag thams cad kyi steng gi nam mkha' bar
225a2(mdo sde): snang la me tog gi bla bre chen pos kun tu khebs par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis spyod pa khyad par can la sogs pa/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
225a3(mdo sde): rnams la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa ro rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/rigs kyi bu
225a4(mdo sde): dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtad pa'i phyir/ngas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por chos kyi sgo rnam pa tha dad pa dag gis phan yon gyi rnam grangs mang
225a5(mdo sde): po bshad mod kyi/ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan bshad kyang yon tan gyi pha rol tu mi phyin to//rigs kyi bu dag mdor na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang //
225a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog tu gyur pa thams cad dang /sangs rgyas kyi gsang chen thams cad dang /sangs rgyas kyi zab mo'i gnas thams cad ngas chos kyi rnam grangs
225a7(mdo sde): 'dir bshad do//rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na khyed kyis kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gus par
225b1(mdo sde): gzung bar bya'o//bstan par bya'o//yi ger 'dri bar bya'o//klag par bya'o//rab tu bshad par bya'o//bsgom par bya'o//mchod par bya'o//rigs kyi bu dag sa
225b2(mdo sde): phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di klog gam ston tam rab tu 'chad dom yi ger 'dri 'am sems sam 'don tam kho ton byed dam glegs bam du byas pa/kun dga'
225b3(mdo sde): ra ba 'am gtsug lag khang ngam khyim mam gnas sam shing drung ngam khang pa 'am gnas khang ngam phug na 'dug kyang rung ste/sa phyogs der de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir
225b4(mdo sde): mchod rten bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sa phyogs de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying por rig par bya ba dang /sa phyogs der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
225b5(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par rig par bya ba dang /sa phyogs
225b6(mdo sde): der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang /sa phyogs der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das por
225b7(mdo sde): rig par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//mngon shes ye shes rab tu gnas rnams
226a1(mdo sde): kyi//'jig rten phan pa'i chos ni bsam mi khyab//lus can 'di kun mchog tu dga' ba'i phyir//mtha' yas spyan gyis rdzu 'phrul rab tu bstan//'od zer
226a2(mdo sde): stong rnams rab tu kun 'gyed cing //ljags kyi dbang pos tshangs pa'i 'jig rten phyin//byang chub mchog la zhugs pa de dag phyir//ngo mtshar gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul de dag
226a3(mdo sde): bstan//sangs rgyas rnams kyi mgur sel sgra mdzad cing //se gol gcig gi sgo dag gang phyung ba//de dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten ji tsam pa//'jig rten khams de
226a4(mdo sde): thams cad go bor byas//ci nas de dag dga' nas phyi dus na//bde gshegs mya ngan 'das nas mdo 'dzin par//de dag dang ni cho 'phrul gzhan rnams dang //yon tan
226a5(mdo sde): rnams ni phan zhing thugs brtse bstan//'jig rten rnam 'dren mya ngan 'das pa na//mdo sde mchog 'di gang dag 'dzin pa yi//bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi
226a6(mdo sde): bsngags pa ni//bskal pa bye ba stong phrag mang brjod kyang //de dag gi ni yon tan mtha' yas te//ji ltar phyogs rnams su ni nam mkha' bzhin//gang dag rtag tu
226a7(mdo sde): mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa//de dag yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur//'jig rten 'dren pa mya ngan 'das 'di dang //nga dang 'dren pa 'di dag thams cad mthong //byang
226b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mang po 'di kun dang //'khor bzhi rnams dang de yis mthong ba yin//de yis deng 'dirang ni mnyes par byas//rgyal ba'i dbang po mya ngan 'das 'di dang ///
226b2(mdo sde): phyogs bcu rnams dang nga dag gzhan bzhugs pa//'dren pa de dag thams cad mnyes par byas//gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin byed pa//'das dong da ltar ma byon
226b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang //phyogs bcu dag na gang dag bzhugs pa yang //de kun mthong zhing shin tu mchod par 'gyur//mdo sde yang dag chos 'di gang 'dzin pas//byang
226b4(mdo sde): chub snying po rnam par gang dgongs pa//skyes mchog rnams kyi gsang chen shes par 'gyur//de ni de yang myur du rjes su sems//gang zhig mdo sde dam pa 'di
226b5(mdo sde): 'dzin pa//de yi spobs pa dag ni mtha' yas 'gyur//ji ltar rlung ni gang du'ang thogs med bzhin//chos dang dron dang nges pa'i tshig kyang shes//'dren pa rnams kyis
226b6(mdo sde): dgongs te gang gsungs pa//mdo sde rnams kyi mchims sbyar rtag tu shes//rnam par 'dren pa mya ngan 'das pa yi//mdo sde rnams kyi yang dag don des shes//zla
226b7(mdo sde): ba nyi ma 'dra bar de 'gyur te//de ni shin tu snang zhing gsalo byed 'gyur//de ni sa la rgyu zhing de dang dor//byang chub sems dpa' mang po yang dag 'dzud//de bas byang
227a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yang dag kyang //'di 'dra ba yi phan yon 'di thos nas//mya ngan nga 'das mdo 'di gzung zhig dang //de dag the tshom med par byang chub
227a2(mdo sde): 'gyur//dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po las de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu pa'o////ngom pa'i
227a3(mdo sde): chos pad+ma dkar po//bam po bcu gnyis pa//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
227a4(mdo sde): nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
227a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/lus la thogs sam glegs bom du bgyis te 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod
227a6(mdo sde): nams ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyur/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces
227a7(mdo sde): bka' stsal to//smon gyi rgyal po rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la le de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed
227b1(mdo sde): la bsti stang du byed btsun par byed ri mor byed mchod pa byed na/sman gyi rgyal po 'di ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed ngam//
227b2(mdo sde): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang legs so//bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa sman gyi rgyal po khyod mos par bya'o//khong du chud
227b3(mdo sde): par bya'o//sman gyi rgyal po rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig
227b4(mdo sde): tsam yang 'dzin pa dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang nan tan gyis sgrub na/sman gyi rgyal po rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las de bas ches bsod nams mang
227b5(mdo sde): du skyed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang dam pa'i chos kyi
227b6(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di lus la thogs sam glegs bam du bgyis te/'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bdag gis bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba ba'i slad du gzungs
227b7(mdo sde): sngags kyi tshig rnams stsal bar bgyi'o//tad+ya thA/a n+ye/man+ye/ma ne ma ma ne/tsit+taM tsi ra te/sha me sha me yi tA bi/shAn+te/muk+te/muk+ta to me sa me/a bi sha maM sa ma
228a1(mdo sde): sa me/dza ye/k+Sha ye ak+Sha ye/ak+Shi No/shAn+te/sha mi te d+hA ra NI/A lo kra b+hA se/pra t+yA bek+ShA NI/bi bI ru a b+h+yan+ta/rA ni biSh+TaM/a d+h+yAn+ta ra ni biSh+Ti a t+yAn+na pA
228a2(mdo sde): ri shud+d+hi/ut+pa le/mut+pu le/a ra Te/me ra Te/shru k+ShA k+ShI aM sa ma sa me/bud+d+ha bi lo ki te/d+harma pa rI k+Shi ti/sad+g+ha nir+g+ho Sha NAM/nir+g+ho Sha NI/b+ha yAM b+hA ya/sho d+ha nI man+te
228a3(mdo sde): /man+ta/k+Sha ya te ru ta kau shre le/ak+Sha ye ak+Sha ba ra hA yA pI l-i//a man+ya na tA yA/bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+ga'i
228a4(mdo sde): klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed kyis bshad pa ste/gang gis mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa chos smra ba 'di lta bu de dag dang 'gal bar bgyis na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams
228a5(mdo sde): cad la de 'khus pa lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sman gyi
228a6(mdo sde): rgyal po khyod kyis gzungs sngags kyi tshig rnams smras pas/sems can mang po'i don byas shing sman gyi rgyal po sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir bsrung ba dang
228a7(mdo sde): bskyab pa dang sba ba byas pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu sbyin pas 'di
228b1(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang /chos smra ba 'di lta bu dag gi ched du gzungs sngags kyi tshig rnams stsal bar bgyi ste/des chos smra ba 'di lta bu
228b2(mdo sde): de dag la glags lta ba gang gis kyang glags mi rnyed pa 'di lta ste/gnod sbyin nam srin po 'am srul po 'am gshed byed dam grul bum mam yi dgas glags lta ba rnams kyis
228b3(mdo sde): glags mi rnyed do//de nas byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po rlob tu sbyin pas de'i tshe gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras so//tad+ya thA/dz+wa le ma hA dzA le/uk+te/
228b4(mdo sde): muk+ke/a ti a tA ba ti/nr-i n+yo nr-i nA ba ti/in+di ni/biT+Ti tsin+d+ri ni/nr-i Ta Ti ni/nIn+d+ho ba ti swA hA/bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag na de bzhin gshegs pa
228b5(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas geng+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba ste/gang gis chos smra ba 'di lta bu 'di dag dang 'gal
228b6(mdo sde): bar bgyis na/de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'khus pa legs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol
228b7(mdo sde): to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos smra ba de dag la glo ba brtse bas sman pa dang bde ba dang bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba ba'i slad du gzungs sngags kyi tshig
229a1(mdo sde): rnams brjod par bgyi'o//tad+ya thA/an+da/nan+te ta nan+te/a nA te nA ti/ku na Ti swA hA/bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gis chos smra
229a2(mdo sde): ba de dag la dpag tshad brgya tshun chad bsrung bar bgyi'o//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo me sde 'di lta bu 'dzin cing /chos smre ba de dag la'ang bsrung ba bgyis
229a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur/bde legs su bgyis par 'gyur ro//de nas rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdang
229a4(mdo sde): nas/'khor der 'dus par gyur te/'dug pa de stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom
229a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin
229a6(mdo sde): pa/chos smra ba 'di lta bu de dag bsrung po dang bskyab pa dang /sba ba'i slad du gzungs sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o//tad+ya thA/a ga No ga No//
229a7(mdo sde): gau ri gan+d+ha ri/tsaN+Da liM/mA ting+ga/puk+ka si/ku lo/bru hi swA hA/bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi bcu rtsa
229b1(mdo sde): gnyis kyis gsungs te/gang zhig chos smra ba 'di lta bu 'di dag dang 'gal bar bgyid na/de dag thams cad la 'khus pa lags so//de nas srin mo 'phyang ma zhes bya ba dang srin mo
229b2(mdo sde): rnam par 'phyang ma zhes bya ba dang srin mo so brtsegs zhes bya ba dang srin mo me tog so zhes bya ba dang srin mo cod pan so zhes bya ba dang srin mo sgra can zhes bya ba dang srin mo me zhes bya ba
229b3(mdo sde): dang srin mo phreng ba 'chang zhes bya ba dang srin mo mdung can zhes bya ba dang srin mo sems can thams cad kyi mdangs 'phrog ces bya ba dang 'phrog ma bu dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang srin
229b4(mdo sde): mo de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga lwa ba dar dong ste phyin nas/srin mo de dag thams cad kyis sgra skad gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
229b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa chos smra ba 'di lta bu de dag bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang slu ba bgyi'o//bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o//ci nas chos
229b6(mdo sde): smra ba de dag la glags lta ba dang skabs 'tshol ba dag gis kyang glags mi rnyed par bgyi'o//de nas srin mo de dag thams cad kyis sgra skad gcig tu tshig mthun par bcom
229b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag phul lo//tad+ya thA/i ti me/i ti me/i ti maM/i ti maM/i ti me/ni me ni me/ni me/ni me/ni me/ru he/ru he/
230a1(mdo sde): ru he/ru he/ru he/haste/ha ste/ha ste/haste/ha ste swA hA/'di spyi bor bzhag nas chos smra ba rnams la su'ang la bu bar ma gyur cig/gnod sbyin nam/
230a2(mdo sde): srin po 'am yi dgas sa ma sha za 'am srul pa 'am gshed byed dam ro langs sam rengs pa 'am gnon po 'am brjed byed kyi gzugs sam gnod sbyin gyis byas pa 'am
230a3(mdo sde): mis byas pa 'am mi ma yin pas byas pa 'am rims nad nyin gcig pa 'am nyin gnyis pa 'am nyin gsum pa 'am nyin bzhi pa 'am rtag pa'i rims sam/tha na rmi lam
230a4(mdo sde): na'ang bud med kyi gzugs sam skyes pa'i gzugs sam khye'u'i gzugs sam bu mo'i gzugs kyis mtho 'tsham par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma mchis so//de nas srin
230a5(mdo sde): mo de dag gis sgra skad gcig tu tshig mthun par bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to//gang gis gsang sngags 'di thos nas//chos smra ba dang
230a6(mdo sde): 'gal bgyid pa//de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'grus//ar+tha ka yi dog pa bzhin//gang zhig chos smra 'gal bgyid pa//ma bsad pa yi 'gro gang dang //pa bsad
230a7(mdo sde): 'gro ba gang legs pa'i//'gro ba de ni der mchi'o//gang zhig chos smra 'gal bgyid pa//til 'chir dag gi 'gro gang dang //til rdung 'gro ba gang lags
230b1(mdo sde): pa'i//'gro ba der ni de mchi'o//gang zhig chos smra 'gal bgyid pa//srang la g.yo bgyid 'gro gang dang //bre 'chos 'gro ba gang lags pa'i//'gro ba der ni de mchi'o//
230b2(mdo sde): deskad ces gsol nas/mdung can la sogs pa srin mo de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang chos smra ba 'di
230b3(mdo sde): lta bu de dag la bsrung bar bgyi'o//bde legs su 'gyur bya dang chad pa spang ba dang drug gzhil bar bgyi'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis srin mo de
230b4(mdo sde): dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kye srin mo dag legs so legs so//khyed kyis chos smra ba de dag la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba ba gyis shig/gang dag tha na chos kyi rnam
230b5(mdo sde): grangs 'di'i ming tsam 'dzin pa de dag la'ang /mdung can khyod 'khor dang bcas pas bsrung bar bya na/gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mtha' dag chub par 'dzin pa dang
230b6(mdo sde): glegs bam du byas te/rim 'gro byed pa dang me tog dang bdug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang lha'i ba dan dang
230b7(mdo sde): 'bru mar gyi mar me 'am mar gyi mar me 'am/spos mar gyi mar me 'am tsam+ba ka'i mar gyi mar me 'am par sha ka'i mar gyi mar me 'am ut+pa la'i mar gyi mar me 'am sna
231a1(mdo sde): ma'i mar gyi mar me 'am/de lta bu'i mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa mang po brgya stong gis rim gro byed pa lta ci smos te/mdung can khyod g.yog dang bcas pas bsrung bar
231a2(mdo sde): bya'o//gzungs sngags kyi le'u 'di bshad pa na srog chags drug khri brgyad stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po las gzungs
231a3(mdo sde): sngags kyi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma'i rgyal po me tog
231a4(mdo sde): kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po 'jig rten gyi
231a5(mdo sde): khams mi mjed 'di na chu ba dang /bcom ldan 'das 'di dka' ba bgyid pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag gda'/bcom ldan 'das gang thos pas lha dang klu dang
231a6(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po drang mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams dang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas lhags
231a7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /nyan thos chen po 'di dag gis thos nas thams cad dga' mgu rangs shing yid bde bar 'gyur ba/
231b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po'i spyod pa gang ci lags pa'i phyogs tsam zhig/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
231b2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par bshad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa
231b3(mdo sde): mngon par shes pas gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa
231b4(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
231b5(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na
231b6(mdo sde): med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa
231b7(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal de'i/byang chub sems
232a1(mdo sde): dpa' bye ba brgyad cu'i 'dus pa chen po byung ngo //gang+gA'i klung bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi nyan thos 'dus pa byung ngo //de'i bstan pa la bud med med par
232a2(mdo sde): gyur to//sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang yi dgas dang lha ma yin gyi ris med do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang lag mthil ltar mnyam la nyams dga'
232a3(mdo sde): bar gyur to//lha'i bai DUr+ya las grub pa'i sa phyogs rin po che dang tsan+dan gyi shing ljon pas brgyan cing /rin po che'i dra bas bres pa drar gyi lde ldi mngon par rab tu sbyangs
232a4(mdo sde): pa rin po che'i pog phor nas bdug pas bdugs pa rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i drung thams cad na rin po che'i mkha' rten mda' rgyang gang gi tshad ci ma byas pa yod pa/rin po
232a5(mdo sde): che'i mkha' rten thams cad kyi steng na lha'i bu bye ba brgya dag/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma
232a6(mdo sde): med pa'i 'od dpal la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/sil snyan byed cing pheg rdob pa dang rol mo'i sgra 'byin cing 'khod do//bcom ldan 'das de'ang byang chub sems dpa'
232a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba la brtsams te/dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/nyan thos chen po de dag
232b1(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la rgyas par rab tu ston to//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
232b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bzhi khri nyis stong du gyur to//byang chub sems
232b3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang nyan thos chen po de dag gi tshe'i tshad kyang de tsam du gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis
232b4(mdo sde): mthong na dga' ba de'ang /bcom ldan 'das de'i gsung rab la dka' ba byed pa la brtson par gyur te/de lo khri nyis stong du 'chag pa la zhugs shing brtson 'grus chen
232b5(mdo sde): po brtsams pas rnal 'byor la brtson par gyur to//de lo khri nyis stong 'das nas gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ting nge 'dzin
232b6(mdo sde): de thob ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de tshim zhing mgu stau yi rangs nas rab tu dga' zhing dga'
232b7(mdo sde): ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/de'i tshe 'di snyam du sems te/dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brten nas gzugs thams cad yang dag par
233a1(mdo sde): ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin bdag gis thob bo snyam mo//de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba/
233a2(mdo sde): de'ang 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal dang dam pa'i chos
233a3(mdo sde): pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod par bya'o snyam nas/de'i tshe de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems
233a4(mdo sde): cani thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/de'i mod la steng gI bar snang las me tog man+da ra dang man+da rA chen po'i lha'i me
233a5(mdo sde): tog gi char chen po mngon par bab bo//dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan+dan gyis sprin byas te/tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i cher mngon par bab ste/skar me'i rgyal po me tog
233a6(mdo sde): kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/de lta bu'i spos kyi rnam pa zho gnyis kyi rin du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dis mi chog go/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas
233a7(mdo sde): pa mngon par shes pa/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du ting nge
233b1(mdo sde): 'dzin de las langs so//langs nas 'di snyam du sems te ji ltar lus yongs su btang ba ltar ni rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dag gis/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas pa ma
233b2(mdo sde): yin no snyam mo//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga'
233b3(mdo sde): ba de de'i tshe/a ga ru dang du ru ka dang pog gi khro ba za zhing tsam+ba ka'i mAr yang 'thung ngo //skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/rnam grangs 'dis
233b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba/rtag tu spros za zhing tsam+ba ka'i mar 'thung bas lo bcu gnyis 'das par
233b5(mdo sde): gyur to//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga'
233b6(mdo sde): ba/lo bcu gnyis po de 'das nas rang gi lus lha'i ras kyis kun tu dkris nas 'bru mar gyis zhen par byas te bdag gi byin gyi rlabs byas so//bdag gis byin gyi rlabs
233b7(mdo sde): byas nas/de bzhin gshegs pa dang dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bdag gi lus la me 'bar bar byas so//skar ma'i
234a1(mdo sde): rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga'
234a2(mdo sde): ba'i lus kyi mar me 'bar ba de'i 'od kyis/'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed khyab par gyur te/'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom
234a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/legs so legs so//rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
234a4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rnams kyi brtson 'grus rtsom pa yang dag pa'o//'di ni de bzhino gshegs pa la mchod pa dang chos la mchod pa yang dag pa ste/me tog dang bdug pa
234a5(mdo sde): dang spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang lha'i ba dan gyis mchod pa dang zang zing gis mchod pa dang tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying pos
234a6(mdo sde): mchod pa ni de lta ma yin no//rigs kyi bu sbyin pa 'di ni mchog ste/rgyal srid yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa ni de lta ma yin no//bu dang chung ma phangs pa yongs su
234a7(mdo sde): gtong ba'i sbyin pa'ang de lta ma yin no//rigos kyi bu gang bdag gi lus gtong ba'i chos kyi mchod pa 'di ni mchod pa khyad par can no//dam pa'o//mchog go//
234b1(mdo sde): phul lo/gya nom pa'o//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis tshig de skad ces gsungs nas de nas cang
234b2(mdo sde): mi gsung bar gyur to//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba'i lus
234b3(mdo sde): la 'bar ba lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi bar ma song ngo //de phyis lo bcu gnyis 'das nas zhi bar gyur to//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/byang
234b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba des/de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di lta bu'i mchod pa dang chos kyi mchod pa bas
234b5(mdo sde): de nas shi 'phos nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal gyi gsung rab la rgyal po dri ma
234b6(mdo sde): med pas byin pa'i khyim du skyes te skyil mo krung bcas bzhin du bang par brdzus te byung bar gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis
234b7(mdo sde): mthong na dga' ba skyes mo thag tu/de'i tshe rang gi pha ma la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/rgyal mchog 'di na bdag 'chag cing //der gnas bdag gis ting 'dzin thob//
235a1(mdo sde): bdag gi lus phangs yongs btang ste//brtson 'grus sra brtsams brtul zhugs che//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/
235a2(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas tshigs su bcad pa de smras nas/rang gi pha ma la 'di skad ces/
235a3(mdo sde): yab yum bcom ldan 'das gang la bdag gis mchod nas/sgra thams cad la mkhas pa'i gzungs thob cing /dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs
235a4(mdo sde): 'di'ang tshigs su bcad pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gtams pa dang /dkrigs pa dang mi 'khrugs pa phrag brgyad cus/bcom lda ni 'das de las thos par gyur pa'i
235a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal de da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho gzhes kyis//
235a6(mdo sde): yab yum bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du mchis na legs so//der mchis nas yang bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa bgyi'o zhes smras so//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun
235a7(mdo sde): tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de'i tshe/nam mkha' la shing ta
235b1(mdo sde): la bdun tsam du mngon par 'phags te/rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs par skyil mo krung bcas nas bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan
235b2(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das de la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das g+ha la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/
235b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod do//dpa' bo mi dbang shin tu dri med zhal//phyogs bcu 'dir ni khyod kyis 'od zer mdzes//
235b4(mdo sde): bde gshegs khyod la bdag gis mchod mchog bgyis//mgon po lta ba'i slad du bdag 'dir mchis//skar mo'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/de'i
235b5(mdo sde): tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
235b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das khyod da dung bzhugs
235b7(mdo sde): sam/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
236a1(mdo sde): rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba la 'di skad ces
236a2(mdo sde): bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab ste/rigs kyi bu da tshe zad pa'i dus la bab kyis rigs kyi bu khyod song la/nga'i khri shoms
236a3(mdo sde): shig dang nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
236a4(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na
236a5(mdo sde): dga' ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu bstan pa 'di ngas khyod la yongs su gtad do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag dang /nyan
236a6(mdo sde): thos chen po 'di dag dang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di dag dang /'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag dang /rin po che'i mkha' rten 'di dag dang /rin po che'i shing ljon
236a7(mdo sde): pa 'di dag dang nga'i bsnyen bkur byed pa'i lha'i bu 'di rnams kyang yongs su gtang ngo //rigs kyi bu nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel gang yin pa
236b1(mdo sde): de dag kyang yongs su gtad do//rigs kyi bu nga'i ring bsrel la khyod dag gis kyang khyed mchod pa rgya cher gyis shig/ring bsrel de dag kyang rgyas par gyis shig mchod rten stong
236b2(mdo sde): phrag mang po gyis shig/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes la/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
236b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dge' ba de la de ltar rjes su bstan nas//
236b4(mdo sde): de'i nub mo nam gyi cha smad la phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par
236b5(mdo sde): shes pa/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla dri ma med
236b6(mdo sde): pa'i 'od dpal de yongs su mya ngan las 'das par rig ste/tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po spungs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsregs te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshig pa zhi
236b7(mdo sde): bar rig nas ring bsrel bsdus te ngu zhing cho nges btab nas smre sngags 'don to//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/de nas byang chub sems dpa'
237a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba dus tI cho ngas btab nas smre sngags 'don no//rin po che sna bdun gyi bum pa brgyad khwa
237a2(mdo sde): bzhi stong byed du bcug nas/de dag gi nang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel bcug ste/rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'phang du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug pa
237a3(mdo sde): gdugs kyi phreng bas legs par brgyan pa dar dang dril bu legs par sbyangs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong byas te/des mchod rten de dag byas nas 'di snyam du bsams te
237a4(mdo sde): bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyizla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal/de bzhin gshegs po'i sku gdung la mchod pa ni byas na de bas kyang lhag pa ches khyad par du 'phags pa
237a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel la mchod pa bya'o snyam mo//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
237a6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba des thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dang /nyon thos chen po de dag dang lha dang
237a7(mdo sde): klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i tshogs de dag la smras pa/rigs kyi bu
237b1(mdo sde): ngag khyed thams cad kyis/bcom ldan 'das de'i ring bsrel rnams la mchod pa bya bar soms shig skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/de nas byang
237b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba des/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten brgyad khri bzhi stong gi mdun du//
237b3(mdo sde): rang gi lag pa bsod nams brgyas brgyan pa 'bar bar byas te/'bar bar byas pas lo bdun khri nyis stong gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag la mchod
237b4(mdo sde): pa byas so//des mchod pa de byas pas 'khor de las nyan thos grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong btul to//byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis kyang
237b5(mdo sde): gzungs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang
237b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dang nyan thos chen po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de yan lag mchong
237b7(mdo sde): bar mthong nas ngus te cho nges btab nas smre sngags 'don cing gcig la gcig 'di skad smras te bdag cag gi slob dpon rjes su ston pa byang chub sems dpa'
238a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba 'di da ltar yan lag ma tshang zhing lag pa med par gyur to zhes zer ro//skar ma'i rgyal po
238a2(mdo sde): me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba des/byang chub sems dpa' sems
238a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po de dag dang nyan thos de dag dang lha'i bu de dag la smras pa rigs kyi bu dag kho bo'i yan lag nyams par mthong bas ma ngu zhig/cho nges ma 'debs shig/smre sngags
238a4(mdo sde): ma 'don cig/rigs kyi bu dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs shing 'tsha zhing gzhes
238a5(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kho bos dbang du bzhugs te/de dag gi spyan sngar bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs so//bden pa dang bden pa'i
238a6(mdo sde): tshig gang gis bdag gi lag pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir yongs su btang bso/bdag gi lus gser gyi kha dog tu 'gyur pa'i bden pa dang bden
238a7(mdo sde): pa'i tshig des/bdag gi lag pa 'di sngon gyi bzhin du gyur cig/sa chen po 'di lan drug tu g.yos par gyur cig/bar snang la gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis
238b1(mdo sde): me tog gi char chen po phob cig ces byas so//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can
238b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba des/bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs de byas ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so//steng
238b3(mdo sde): gri bar snang las kyang me tog gi char chen po mngon par bab bo//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de'i lag pa
238b4(mdo sde): de'ang /'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyid kyi bsod nams kyi stobs bskyed pa dang /ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa des sngon gyi bzhin du gyur
238b5(mdo sde): to//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub semaso dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga'
238b6(mdo sde): pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi 'am yid gnyis sam the tshom za bar gyur na skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa khyod
238b7(mdo sde): kyis de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po
239a1(mdo sde): 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba zhes bya bar gyur to//skar ma'i rgyal
239a2(mdo sde): po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po bya dka' ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de snyed byed do lus yongs
239a3(mdo sde): su gtong ba'ang byed do//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa lo yang dag par
239a4(mdo sde): zhugs pa/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di 'dod pas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag la rkang pa'i mthe bo 'bar bar bya'o//lag
239a5(mdo sde): pa'i sor mo 'am rkang pa'i sor mo gcig gam yan log gcig gam lag pa 'bar bar bya'o//byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs
239a6(mdo sde): kyi bu mo de ni bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa ches mang du skyed do//rgyal srid yongs su btang bas ni de lta ma yin no//chung ma dang bu pho dang bu mo phangs pa yongs
239a7(mdo sde): su btang bas ni de lta ma yin no//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na nags tshal dang bcas pa rgya mtsho dang bcas pa ri dang bcas pa 'bab chu'i ngos
239b1(mdo sde): dang mtsho dang mtshe'u dang khron pa dang kun dga'i ra ba dang bcas pa yongs su btang bas ni de lta ma yin no//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa rigs kyi bu/
239b2(mdo sde): 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis rab
239b3(mdo sde): tu gang bar byas te/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la sbyin pa byin na/skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa
239b4(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa/rigs kyi bu 'amo rigs kyi bu mo de ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/dam po'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di los/tha na
239b5(mdo sde): tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam 'dzin pa de bsod nams ji snyed cig skyed pa de snyed du mi skyed de/de'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di ni de bas ches
239b6(mdo sde): mang bar bshad kyi/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
239b7(mdo sde): dang /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la sbyin pa byin pa ni de lta ma yin no//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa 'di lta ste dper
240a1(mdo sde): na 'brab chu'i ngos dang mtsho dang mtshe'u thams cad kyi nang na rgya mtsho ni mchog tu gyur pa yin no//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes
240a2(mdo sde): pa/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyi nang na dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grongs 'di mchog tu gyur pa yin no//skar
240a3(mdo sde): rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/'di lta ste dper na ri nag po dang khor yug dang khor yug chen po thams cad kyi nang na ri rab ra ni ri'i rgyal po ste mchog
240a4(mdo sde): tu gyur pa yin no//skur mu'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa de bzhin du/de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyi nang na/dam
240a5(mdo sde): po'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyal po ste mchog tu gyur pa yin no//skor ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/'di lta ste dper
240a6(mdo sde): na skar ma thams cad kyi nang na zla ba ni 'od byed pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin no//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/de bzhin du de bzhin
240a7(mdo sde): gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyi nang na/dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni zla ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong pas lhag par
240b1(mdo sde): 'od byed pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin no//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/'di lta ste dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mun pa mun gnag thams
240b2(mdo sde): cad sel bar byed do//skur ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/de bzhin du dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang mi dge ba'i mun
240b3(mdo sde): pa mun gnag thams cad sel bar byed do//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/'di lta ste dper na/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang na
240b4(mdo sde): brgya byin ni lha rnams kyi dbang po yin no skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas po mngon par shes pa/de bzhin du dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang
240b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyi nang na dbang po yin no//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa 'di lta ste dper na//
240b6(mdo sde): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa ni tshangs ris kyi lha thams cad kyi rgyal po ste tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na pa'i bya ba byed do//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon
240b7(mdo sde): par shes pa/de bzhin du dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang sems can slob pa dang mi slob pa thams cad dang nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i
241a1(mdo sde): theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad la pha'i bya ba byed do//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/'di lta ste dper na/rgyun du zhugs
241a2(mdo sde): pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byis pa so so'i skye ba thams cad las 'das pa'o//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu
241a3(mdo sde): rgyas pa mngon par shes pa de bzhin du dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde thams cad las 'das shing mngon
241a4(mdo sde): par 'phags te mchog tu gyur par rig par bya'o//skar ma'i rgyal po mye tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa gang dgra mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa de dag kyang sems
241a5(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur par rig par bya'o//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/'di lta ste dper na/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
241a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi nang na byang chub sems dpa' ni mchog ces bya'o//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/de bzhin du dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i
241a7(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyi nang na mchog ces bya'o//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes
241b1(mdo sde): pa/'di lta ste dper na/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi nang na de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi rgyal por thabs gsol pa yin no//skar
241b2(mdo sde): ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/de bzhin du dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par
241b3(mdo sde): zhugs pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba yin no//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam
241b4(mdo sde): grangs 'di ni sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad las skyob pa/sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar byed pa ste/skom pa rnams la mtshi'u dang 'dra'o//grang bas
241b5(mdo sde): nyin pa rnams la me dang 'dra'o//gcer bu rnams la gos dang 'dra'o//tshong pa rnams la ded dpon dang 'dra'o//buM rnams la ma dang 'dra'o//pha rol tu 'gro ba rnams la gru
241b6(mdo sde): dang 'dra'o//nad pa rnams la sman pa dang 'dra'o//mun pa mun gnag gis bsgribs pa rnams la mar me dang 'dra'o//nor 'dod pa rnams la rin po che dang 'dra'o//khams
241b7(mdo sde): kyi rgyal po thams cad la 'khor lo sgyur ba dang 'dra'o//'bab chu rnams la rgya mtsho dang 'dra'o//mun pa mun gnag thams cad sel ba'i phyir sgron ma dang 'dra'o//skar
242a1(mdo sde): ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/de bzhin du dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang sdug bsngal thams cad las
242a2(mdo sde): rab tu thar bar byed pa'o//nad thams cad gcod pa'o//'khor ba'i bcing ba nyam nga ba thams cad las rab tu thur bar byed pa'o//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas
242a3(mdo sde): pa mngon par shes pa/gang gis dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang gang yi ger 'dri ba dang gang yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang skar mo'i rgyal po
242a4(mdo sde): me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ngam bstan tam thos sam yi ger bris sam yi ger 'drir 'jug gam glegs bam
242a5(mdo sde): du byas te bsti stang du byed pa dang btsun par byed pa dang bkur stir byed pa dang mchod pa dang me tog dang bdug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang gos dang
242a6(mdo sde): gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang rol mo'i sgra dang na bza' dong thal mo sbyar ba'i las dang mar gyi mar me 'am 'bru mar gyi mar mye 'am smros mar gyi mar mi
242a7(mdo sde): 'am tsam+ba ka'i mar gyi mar me 'am/sna ma dang skye nar dang par sha ka dang na bo ma li ka'i mar gyi mar me 'am mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bsti stang du byed
242b1(mdo sde): btsun par byed rim grong byed mchod par byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa ji snyed cig 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de dag gi mtha' ni//
242b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis kyang rtogs par mi nus so//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/gang zhig sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i
242b3(mdo sde): le'u 'di 'dzin pa dang ston pa dang nyan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa de bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur/
242b4(mdo sde): ro//gal te bud med gcig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin na/de nyid bud med kyi lus kyi tha mar 'gyur ro//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon
242b5(mdo sde): par shes pa/bud med gang la las sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di lnga brgya pa tha ma la thos nas nan tan byed pa de/'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi
242b6(mdo sde): khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med byang chub
242b7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa der/de pad+ma'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug bzhin du skye bar 'gyur ro//de 'dod chags
243a1(mdo sde): kyis gzir bar mi 'gyur ro//zhe sdang gis ma yin gti mug gis ma yin nga rgyal gyis ma yin ser snas ma yin khro bas ma yin gnod sems kyis
243a2(mdo sde): ma yin te/de skyes ma thag tu mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro//mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'ang thob par 'gyur ro//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa
243a3(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas/de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung bdun curtsa
243a4(mdo sde): gnyis kyi bye ma snyed mthong bar 'gyur ro//mig gi dbang po yongs su dag po gang gis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong bar 'gyur ba de 'dra bar
243a5(mdo sde): mig gi dbang po yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang de la legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur te/gang khyod kyis dam pa'i
243a6(mdo sde): chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub
243a7(mdo sde): pa de'i gsung rab la lung mnos pa dang kha ton byas pa dang bsgoms pa dang bsams pa dang yid la byas pa dang sems can gzhan dag la'ang rab tu bstan pa/rigs
243b1(mdo sde): kyi bu legs so legs so//rigs kyi bu khyod kyi bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di ni mes tshig pa'am rgyas khyer bar mi nus so//rigs kyi bu khyod kyi bsod nams mngon
243b2(mdo sde): par 'du byed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas brgya stong gis kyang bshad par mi nus so//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdud phyir rgol ba bcom mo//skyid pa'i rgya mtsho las rgal to//dragra'i
243b3(mdo sde): tsher ma dkrugs so//sangs rgyas stong gis byin gyis brlabs so//rigs kyi bu lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na khyod 'dra ba med do//de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu
243b4(mdo sde): ma gtogs par gzhan nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas sngam byang chub sems dpa' gang gis kyang /khyod la bsod nams kyis kyang rung ye shes kyis kyang rung shes rab kyis
243b5(mdo sde): kyang rung ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang rung ste zil gyis gnon par mi nu so so skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
243b6(mdo sde): chen po de ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa 'di lta bu thob par 'gyur ro//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/gang la las sman gyi rgyal po'i
243b7(mdo sde): sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di bshod pa thos nas/legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin pa de'i kha nas ut+pa la'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur/de'i lus las kyang tsan+dan
244a1(mdo sde): gyi dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro//gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa na legs so zhes bya ba byin pa de'i chos can gyi yon tan gyi phan yon de dag
244a2(mdo sde): ni/ngas da ltar gang dag bshad pa de 'dra bar 'gyur ro//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems
244a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di tso nas/phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma l-i dzam+bu'i gling 'di na spyod cing nub
244a4(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ba dang /bdud sdig can gyis glags mi rnyed pa dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang grul bum rnams kyis glags mi rnyed par bya ba'i
244a5(mdo sde): phyir ngas khyod la yongs su gtad do//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dzam+bu'i gling 'dir
244a6(mdo sde): sems can nad pa nad kyis btab pa rnams la sman lta bur 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab par byas te/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas lus la nid kyis mi zug
244a7(mdo sde): go/rga bas ma yin dus ma yin par 'chi ba so ma yin no//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg
244b1(mdo sde): pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang la las mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong de lta bu de mthong na/de la tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang ut+pa lA sngon pos mngon par gtor bar bya'o//
244b2(mdo sde): mngon par gtor nas kyang 'di snyam du rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/'di ni rtswa len por 'gyur/'di ni byang chub kyi snying por d+hU 'ding byor
244b3(mdo sde): 'gyur/'di ni bdud kyi phyogs pham par byed par 'gyur/'di ni chos kyi dung 'bud par 'gyur/'di ni chos kyi rdu rdung bar 'gyur/'di ni 'khor ba'i rgyu mtsho
244b4(mdo sde): rgal bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o//skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems
244b5(mdo sde): dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pas/mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong mthong nas de ltar sems bskyed par byas te/de ltar na nga'i yon tan ngag ni
244b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas ci 'dra ba dag bshad pa de 'dra ba dag tu 'gyur ro//sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/byang chub sems dpa'
244b7(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi stong gis sgra thams cad la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba tsam pa yang dag
245a1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang des kyang /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/de ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bsam
245a2(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan gyi chos dris pa legs so legs so zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no//sman gyi rgyal po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o///
245a3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas de'i tshe/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan smin mtshams kyi
245a4(mdo sde): mdzad spu nas 'od phyung ste/'od des shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gAng+gA'i klung bco brgyad kyi bye ma snyed dag khyab par byas so//sangs
245a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung bco brgyad kyi bye ma snyed de dag 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa
245a6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba de ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa
245a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rgya chen po tshad med pas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to//
245b1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des mdzod spunas 'od gang btang ba des/de'i tshe 'jig rten
245b2(mdo sde): gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyun pa de snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to//'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa de na/byang chub
245b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyang srang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bstod pa sngon yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
245b4(mdo sde): rgyurgyas mang po'i 'od zer de lta bu mthong zhing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis ting nge 'dzin mang po thob pa 'di lta ste/rgyal mtshan
245b5(mdo sde): gyi rtse mo'i dpung brgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin thob/dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i ting nge 'dzin thob/dri ma med pas byin pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob/skar mi'i rgyal po rnam par
245b6(mdo sde): rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob/rlung lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob/ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob/zlo ba sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin thog/sgra thams cad la mkhas
245b7(mdo sde): pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob/bsod nams thams cad kun las bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob/dad pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin thob/rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rol pa'i ting
246a1(mdo sde): nge 'dzin thob/ye shes ta la la'i ting nge 'dzin thob/bkod pa'i rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob/dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin thob/dra
246a2(mdo sde): ma med pa'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin thob/zad par chu'i ting nge 'dzin thob/nyi ma 'khor ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob/de bzhin du sbyar te/byang chub sems dpa'
246a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar du thob par 'dug ste/byang chub
246a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po song sang po'i dbyangs de'i lus la 'od des phog par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
246a5(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i 'dob ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
246a6(mdo sde): po srang sang po'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdog bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshogs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs//
246a7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de'ang blta ba dang /byang chub sems
246b1(mdo sde): dpa' sman gyi rgyal po de'ang blta ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' rab tu sbyin pa de'ang blta ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon
246b2(mdo sde): par shes pa de'ang blta ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa khyad pa ro can de'ang blta ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa'i rgyal po de'ang blta ba dang /byang chub
246b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sman yang dag 'phags de'ang blta ba'i slad du/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du mchi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
246b4(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sa
246b5(mdo sde): po'i dbyangs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu khyod 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song ste phyin nas ngan pa'i 'du shes bskyed par mi bya'o//rigs
246b6(mdo sde): kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad de ni mtho dman can dang sa las grub pa dang rI nag pos gang ba dang 'jim ngan gyis yongs su gang po'o//bcom ldan 'das de
246b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub po de'ang sku thung ngo //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang lus
247a1(mdo sde): thung ngo //rigs kyi bu khyod kyi lus thob pa ni dpag tshad bzhi khri nyis stong ngo //rigs kyi bu nga'i lus ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad yod do//
247a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu khyod ni mdzes pa lta na sdug pa gzugs bzang ba kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/bsod nams brgya stong pas shin tu lhag pa'i dpal dang ldan

247b1(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang pa'i dbyangs kyis de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas ma g.yos shing /stan de las ma langs par 'di lta bu'i ting /
247b2(mdo sde): denge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang srung po'i dbyangs de ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/de'i mod la
247b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du/bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi gdon gyi drung du/pad+ma chu ba ni gser 'dab ma ni dngul snying po ni pad+ma dang na
247b4(mdo sde): tso'am ci las grub pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi byung bar gyur to//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/pad+ma bkod pa byung ba de mthong nas/
247b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasra shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar
247b6(mdo sde): chub ni gser 'dab ma ni dngul snying po ni pad+ma dang ne tse 'am ci las grub pa'i pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gda' ba 'dri su'i sgra ltas lcags
247b7(mdo sde): de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'jam dpal 'di ni shar phyogs logs nas
248a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
248a2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang
248a3(mdo sde): bopo'i dbyangs byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/nga la blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang dam
248a4(mdo sde): pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ong ba de'i sde ltas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam
248a5(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu des dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs ci bgyis na/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa
248a6(mdo sde): des 'di lta bu'i khyad par 'di thob/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de ting nge 'dzin gang la spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin de bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mnyan
248a7(mdo sde): par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ting nge 'dzin de la spyad par bgyi'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ci 'dra ba dang kha dog ci 'dra ba
248b1(mdo sde): dang gzugs ci 'dra ba dang rtags ci 'dra ba dang dbyibs ci 'dra ba dang de'i spyod pa ci lags pa/bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de blta bar bgyi'o//
248b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das brda ltas gang gis bskul mo thag tu/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir mchi bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i//
248b3(mdo sde): brda ltas shig de bzhin gshegs pas legs par mdzad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
248b4(mdo sde): rgyus shAkya thub pas/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rin chen mang la 'di skad ces gsungs
248b5(mdo sde): so//ci nas brda ltas gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyings 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'dir mchi ba de lta bu'i brda ltas bcom
248b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis mdzod cig/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rin

249a1(mdo sde): dga' bras rims na khyod 'jig rten gyi khamamam me du 'angagagags sang /na ba badzad do//denas byung chubs dus dra ma

249a3(mdo sde): mye tog kun tu rgyu sa pa de'i nabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nus lan gas ma bskor ba byas te/byang chub snyams dpa' bya ba khrig khrig brgya stong phrag bad+hAd
249a4(mdo sde): pa dag gos yongs su bsgyur byung mdun du ba rlonas ldan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par spong ba'i 'dra zer gyis bod+d+hAn pa de nas mi snong byer gyur nas/

249a7(mdo sde): dpal gyis ni rab tu 'bar/gzi brjid kyis ni shin tu lhag gir gyur/lus ni mtshan rnams kyis rnam par sbas/lus srid med kyi bu'i lus ltar ni ma khregaso pa
249b1(mdo sde): rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs par zhugs te/nam mkha' la ta la bdun tsam nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdur nas 'ongs te/
249b2(mdo sde): de 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ga la ba dang bya rgod phung po'i rig la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/khang pa brtsegs pa de nas babs te/brgya stong ri ba'i mu tig gi phreng ba
249b3(mdo sde): thogs shing /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/lan bdun skor ba byas nas bcom ldan
249b4(mdo sde): 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mu tig gi phreng ba phul lo//phul nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
249b5(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa nyung ngam nyam nga ba
249b6(mdo sde): nyung nga ma bskyod pa yang ngam/stobs dang bde bar grinas sam zhes snyun gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de 'di skad ces kyang gsung ste/bcom ldan 'das khyod bzod
249b7(mdo sde): dam gzhes sam khams rnams mthun nam khyod kyi sems can rnams go sla 'am gdul sla 'am gso' sla 'am gtsang ma 'dod da ma ha cang 'dod chags me spyod dam ha
250a1(mdo sde): cang zhe sdang mi spyod dam ha cang gti mug mi spyod dam/bcom ldan 'das khyod kyi sems can dag shin tu phrag dog can ma yin nam ser sna can ma yin
250a2(mdo sde): nam mar mi 'dzin pa ma yin nam par mi 'dzin pa ma yin nam dge slong du mi 'dzin pa ma yin nam bram zer mi 'dzin pa ma yin nam log par lta ba ma yin nam sems
250a3(mdo sde): ma dul ba ma yin nam dbang po ma bsrungs pa ma yin nam bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis sems can de dag gis bdud phyir rgol ba bcom mas bcom ldan 'das de
250a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rin chen ma de/rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten gyi nang
250a5(mdo sde): na bzhugs pa chos gsan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du gshegs sa mo/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang la'ang bcom ldan
250a6(mdo sde): 'das de 'dri ba/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang de bzod dam gshegs sam/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang
250a7(mdo sde): ring du gzhes sam zhes gsung ngo //bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
250b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rin chen mang de'i ring bsrel gyi sku blta bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang
