251a3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyings kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi drung du sngo ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu zhig bskru na/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
251a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal la 'di skad ces bka'

251a6(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha la sgyur ba//
251a7(mdo sde): bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sprin dang rnga sgra rgyal po zhes bya ba 'di 'jig rten du byung ste/rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de
251b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa sprin dang rnga sgra rgyal po de la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis sil snyan brgya stong rab tu blangs te/lo khI nyis stong du
251b2(mdo sde): mchod pa byas so//rin po che sna bdun gyi snod brgyad khri bzhi stong phul lo//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dang rnga sgra rgyal po'i gsung rab de la byang chub sems dpa'
251b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis de lta bu'i dad pa thob bo//de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
251b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas sprin dang rnga sgra rgyal po la mchod pa byas shing snod brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag phul ba de/gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi'am yid gnyis sam the tshom za bar
251b5(mdo sde): gyur na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu gang gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
251b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas sprin dang rnga sgra rgyal po de la mchod pa byas pa dang /snod de dag kyang phul ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'di nyid yin
251b7(mdo sde): te/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng sang po'i dbyangs de ni/sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la
252a1(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/yongs su sbyang ba byas pa ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'dis sngon yang sangs rgyas bcom
252a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ngo //pad+ma'i dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'di mthong ngam/pad+ma'i dpal
252a3(mdo sde): gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/pad+ma'i dpal bying chub
252a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'di ni/gzugs mang pos dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston te/'di lnga ste/la
252a5(mdo sde): lar ni tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis/la lar ni brgya byin gyi gzugs kyis la lar ni dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis/la lar ni dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis/la
252a6(mdo sde): lar ni dmag dpon gyi gzugs kyis/la lar ni mchog gi gzugs kyis/la lar ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs kyis/la lar ni khams kyi rgyal po'i gzugs
252a7(mdo sde): kyis/la lar ni tshong dpon gyi gzugs kyis/la lar ni khyim bdag gi gzugs kyis/la lar ni grong mi'i gzugs kyis/la lar ni bram ze'i gzugs kyis
252b1(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston to//lA lar ni dge slong gi gzugs kyis la lar ni dge slong ma'i gzugs kyis/lA lang ni dge bsnyen gyi gzugs kyis//
252b2(mdo sde): la lar ni dge bsnyen ma'i gzugs kyis/la lar ni tshing dpon gyi chung ma'i gzugs kyis/la lar ni khyim bdag gi chung ma'i gzugs kyis/la lar ni grong mi'i chung ma'i
252b3(mdo sde): gzugs kyis/la lar ni khye'u'i gzugs kyis/la lar ni bu mo'i gzugs kyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa sang sang po'i dbyangs dam pa'i chos

252b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang seng po'i dbyangs kyis dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la ston to//kha cig la lha ma
252b7(mdo sde): yin gyi gzugs kyis/kha cig la nam mkha' lding gi gzugs kyis/kha cig la mi 'am ci'i gzugs kyis/kha cig la lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs kyis byang chub sems
253a1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la ston to//sems can dmyal ba dang /
253a2(mdo sde): dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang mi khom par skyes pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams la'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs
253a3(mdo sde): skyob par 'gyur ro//btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa'i bor gyi sems can rnams la'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyang so bud
253a4(mdo sde): mod kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul te/dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir sems can rnams la chos ston to//
253a5(mdo sde): pad+ma'i dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs ni/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du skyes pa'i sems can rnams la skyob pa ste/'jig
253a6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'di na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'di de snyed kyi gzugs su sprul pas dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i
253a7(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la ston te/skyes bu dam pa 'di rdzu 'phrul yang nyams pa med/shes rab kyang nyams pa med do//rigs kyi bu byang chub
253b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs ni ye shes kyi snang ba 'di snyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na snang ngo //'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gang+gA'i klung
253b2(mdo sde): gi bye ma snyed dag na'ang /byang chub sems dpas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la 'di byang chub sems pa'i gzugs kyis chos ston to//nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can
253b3(mdo sde): rnams la nyan thos kyi gzugs kyis chos ston to//rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis chos ston to//de bzhin gshegs
253b4(mdo sde): pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyis chos ston to//de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi bar gyis 'dul ba'i sems
253b5(mdo sde): can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel ston to//yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das
253b6(mdo sde): bar ston to//pad+ma'i dpal de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sang sang po'i dbyangs ni ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa thob pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das
253b7(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i
254a1(mdo sde): dbyangs dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa 'di/bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po
254a2(mdo sde): dbyangs kyis sems can 'di snyed btul ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang lags/de skad ces gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
254a3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin
254a4(mdo sde): gang la gnas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis 'di ltar sems can dpag tu med pa'i don byas pa ni/gzugs thams cad
254a5(mdo sde): yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di yin no//sang sang po'i dbyangs kyi le'u 'di bshad pa na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang
254a6(mdo sde): po'i dbyangs dang lhan cig tu/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags pa de dag
254a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyis gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to//'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
254b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa de dag gis kyang /gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa'
254b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po seng sang po'i dbyangs kyis/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang /bcom
254b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen meng gi ring bsrel gyi mchod rten la yangs shing rgya che ba'i mchod pa byas
254b4(mdo sde): nas/rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs par zhugs te/zhing rnams ni rab tu g.yo bar byed/pad+ma'i char ni rab tu 'bebs/sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni len
254b5(mdo sde): cing /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas/lhan cig tu slar rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song
254b6(mdo sde): ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'ongs de bzhin gshegs pa dgro bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun
254b7(mdo sde): tu rgyas pa la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du bdag gis sems can gyi don byas so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
255a1(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang gi ring bsrel gyi mchod rten yang mthong phyag kyang bgyis so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
255a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'ang mthong ste phyag bgyis so//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de'ang mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po
255a3(mdo sde): brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi shugs thob pa de dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu sbyin pa de'ang mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig
255a4(mdo sde): brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag thams cad kyis kyang gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' sems
255a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur
255a6(mdo sde): to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyis kyang dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to//sang sang po'i dbyangs
255a7(mdo sde): kyi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o////dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po//bam po bcu gsum pa ste tha ma//de nas byang chub semos
255b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la
255b2(mdo sde): pa de logs su thul mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to///bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs
255b3(mdo sde): kyi dbang phyug ci'i slad du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ces pargya/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
255b4(mdo sde): po blo gros mi zad pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu 'di la sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gang dag myong bar gyur pa de
255b5(mdo sde): dag gis/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming thos na/de dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po de las
255b6(mdo sde): yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming 'dzin pa de dag/
255b7(mdo sde): gal te me'i phung po chen por lhung na'ang /de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis/me'i
256a1(mdo sde): phung po rab tu 'bar ba las thar bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu gal te chu klung gis khyer la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs
256a2(mdo sde): kyi dbang phyug la bos na/chu klung de dag thams cad kyis sems can de dag thams cad gting tshugs par byed do//rigs kyi bu gal te sems can bye bo khrag khrig brgya
256a3(mdo sde): stong rgya mtsho'i nang du grur zhugs te/'gron bu dang gser dang nor bu dang mu tig dang bai DUr+ya dang dung dang man shel dang rdo'i snying po dang byu ru dang spug dang mu tI ga
256a4(mdo sde): dmar po la sogs pa'i phyir dong ba de rnams/rlung nag pos srin mo'i gling du 'phangs par gyur la/de na sems can gcig 'ga' zhig gis spyan ras gzigs
256a5(mdo sde): dbang phyug la bos na/de dag thams cad srin mo'i gling de nas thar bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan
256a6(mdo sde): ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug cesra btags so//rigs kyi bu gal te bsad par dak+Shi ba las spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bos na//
256a7(mdo sde): gshed ma de dag gi mtshan de dag dum bu dum bur chag cing grugs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
256b1(mdo sde): 'di gnod sbyin dang srin pos gang bar gyur kyang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming 'dzin pa la de dag thams cad kyi sdang ba'i
256b2(mdo sde): sems kyis lta'ang mi phod do//rigs kyi bu sems can la la lcags sgrog dang /shing sgrog tu bcug par gyur na nyis yod kyang rung nyes med kyang rung na/byang chub
256b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming nas phyung bas lcags sgrog dang shing skrag tu bcug pa dag gi bu ga bye bar 'gyur ro//rigs
256b4(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthu ni de 'dra'o//rigs kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
256b5(mdo sde): khams 'di g.yon can dang chom rkun dang dgra lug ni mtshon thogs pas gang bar gyur te/der ded dpon gcig gis 'gron po mang po phal po che rin po ches phyug pa
256b6(mdo sde): da de dong ba las/'dod pa de dag gis g.yon can chom rkun dang dgra lag na mtshon thogs pa de dgra mthong skye/mthong nas kyang 'jigs shing skrag ste bdag cag
256b7(mdo sde): skyabs med par shes pa las ded dpon des 'gron po mang po la 'di skad ces ma 'jigs shig/rigs kyi bu dag ma 'jigs shig mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/byang
257a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sgra skad gcig tu bos shig dang /des khyed chom rkun gyis 'jigs pa
257a2(mdo sde): dang dgra'i 'jigs pa 'di las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo la/de nas 'gron po mang po thams cad kyis sgra skad gcig tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
257a3(mdo sde): la bos te/'jigs pa med pa'i sbyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs de la phyag 'tshal lo phyag 'tshal lo zhes ming nas phyung ma thag
257a4(mdo sde): tu/'gron po phal po che de dag thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bor 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan
257a5(mdo sde): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthu ni de 'dra'o//rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag 'dod chags spyod pa de dag gis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
257a6(mdo sde): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la phyag byas na 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro//semaso can gang dag zhe sdang spyod pa de dag gis/byang chub sems dpa'
257a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag byas na zhe sdang dang bral bar 'gyur ro//sems can gang dag gti mug spyod pa de dag gis/byang
257b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag byas na gti mug dang bral bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
257b2(mdo sde): chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o//rigs kyi bu bud med bu pho 'dod pa gang la la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs
257b3(mdo sde): dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal na de las bu pho 'byung ste/gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa lta na sdug pa khye'u'i mtshan dang ldan pa/skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong zhong sdug pa dge
257b4(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'byung ngo //gang bu mo 'dod pa de'ang bu mo 'byung ste/gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa lta na sdug pa bu mo'i motshan dang ldan pa/skye bo mang po'i yid
257b5(mdo sde): du 'ong zhing ldog pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'byung ngo //rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi mthu ni de 'dra'o///
257b6(mdo sde): gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigros kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal ba de dag don yod pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu
257b7(mdo sde): gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal zhing ming 'dzin la/gang zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
258a1(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag la phyag 'tshal zhing ming 'dzin pa dang /yang gang zhig gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung drug
258a2(mdo sde): cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag la na bza' dang bsod snyoms dang gzims cha dang snyun gyi gsos sman dang yo byad kyis mchod pa byed
258a3(mdo sde): na/rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsod nams mngon par 'du byed po de tsam zhig skyed/de skad ces bka' stsal nas//
258a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//rig kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gzhi de
258a5(mdo sde): las bsod nams skyed pa ni bcom ldan 'das mang lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu
258a6(mdo sde): gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de snyed la bkur sti byas pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang /gang gis tha na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
258a7(mdo sde): chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la phyag lan cig byas pa dang /ming 'dzin pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa gnyis ka mnyam ste lhag pa'ang med
258b1(mdo sde): 'phags pa'ang med do//gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal zhing ming 'dzin pa dang /gang byang chub sems dpa'

258b4(mdo sde): tu med do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros ma zad pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang
258b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjedzad 'di na rnam par rgyu/ji ltar sems can rnams la chos

258b7(mdo sde): dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu gang dag na byang chub
259a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams la chos ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
259a2(mdo sde): dag yod do//gang dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzugs kyis
259a3(mdo sde): chos ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag kyang yod do//sems can kha cig la ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug rang
259a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis chos ston to//kha cig la nyan thos kyi gzugs kyis/kha cig la tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis/kha cig la brgya byin gyi gzugs kyis/

259a6(mdo sde): ba'i sems can rnams la ni gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis chos ston to//dbang phyug gis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis chos ston
259a7(mdo sde): to//dbang phyug chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis chos ston to//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos 'dul ba'i
259b1(mdo sde): sems can rnams la ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i gzugs kyis chos ston to//sha zas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni sha za'i gzugs kyis chos ston to//mchog

259b6(mdo sde): gzigs kyi dbang phyug 'di 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa ste/de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes
259b7(mdo sde): kun gyis shes so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la blo gos mi zad pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
260a1(mdo sde): chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la chos kyi dgab pa stsal bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes
260a2(mdo sde): na byin cig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo glos mi zad pas bdag gi mgul nas brgya stong ri ba'i mu tig gi do shal bkrol nas/byang chub sems
260a3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la chos kyi dgab par byin te/skyes bu dam pa bdag las chos kyi dgab pa 'di long zhig/des ma blangs nas de
260a4(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras
260a5(mdo sde): so//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mu tig gi do shal 'di bdeg la snying brtse ba'i phyir long zhig/de nas byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
260a6(mdo sde): byug gis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa la snying brtse ba dang /'khor bzhi po de dag dang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha
260a7(mdo sde): ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi yin pa la snying brtse ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros
260b1(mdo sde): mi zad pa lus mu tig gi do shal blangs so//blangs nas cha gnyis su bgoswA tre bgos nas cha gcig ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phul lo//cha gcig ni de bzhin gshegs
260b2(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang gi rin po che'i mchod rten la phul lo//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan

260b4(mdo sde): blo gros mi zad la//de yi don gyi rgyu ni kun dris pa//rgyal ba'i sras po 'di ltar ci yi phyir//spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhes 'di bgyi//de nas de yis phyogs rnams kun
260b5(mdo sde): bltas te//smon lam rgya mtsho blo gros mi zad pas//rgyal mtshan khra bo de la 'di skad smros//skyon ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spyod pa nyon//bskal pa ba sa ma yas bye ba du ma
260b6(mdo sde): brgyar//sangs rgyas stong phrag byi ba mang po la//smon lam ji ltar rab tu rnam par sbyangs//de dag kho bos rab tu bshad kyis nyon//mnyan par byed cing lta bar byed pa dang //
260b7(mdo sde): rim gyis de ltar rjes su dran pa yang //srog chags rnams ni 'bras bu yod par 'gyur//sdug bsngal dang ni mya ngan thams cad sel//gal te gsod pas me yi dong du
261a1(mdo sde): yang //bsad par bya ba'i phyir ni bor ba'i mis//spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni//chus btab bzhin du me dag zhi bar 'gyur//rgya mtsho dang ni mya ngam
261a2(mdo sde): rgal na yang //klu dang 'byung po lha ma yin gnas su//spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni//chu yi nang du nam yang mi nub bo//rab tu sdang ba'i yid kyis bsad pa'i phyir//ri
261a3(mdo sde): rab lhun po'i rtse nas bor na yang //spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni//nyi ma lta bur nam mkhar gnas par 'gyur//gal te rdo rje yi ni ri dag kyang //bsad pa'i
261a4(mdo sde): phyir ni skye bor 'ongs na yang //spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni//ba spu'i khud tsam gces par mi nus so//bsad pa'i sems kyis lag na mtshon thogs te/
261a5(mdo sde): dgra tsho gos mang pos kun tu bskor na yang //spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni//de ma thag tu byams pa'i sems su 'gyur//gal te gsod pa nye bar 'ongs
261a6(mdo sde): nas su//gshed ma mi yi dbang du gyur na yang //spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni//de yo mtshon cha dum bu dum bur 'gyur//de ste shing ngam lcags
261a7(mdo sde): las byas pa yi//khong sgril dang ni gdos kyis bcings na yang //spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni//bcings pa myur du rnam par bcad par 'gyur//sngags
261b1(mdo sde): drung stobs dang sman dang rig sngags dang //ro langs pa dang 'byung po lus 'jigs pa//spyan rAs gzigs kyi dbang po d+han na ni//gang nas rab tu btang ba de slar 'gro//gnod
261b2(mdo sde): sbyin lha min 'byung po klu 'bar ba//mdangs 'phrog pa yis yongs su bskor na yang //spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na nI//ba spu'i khung tsam gtses par yong mi nus//mchi
261b3(mdo sde): blo sen rnon rab tu 'jigs pa yi//gcan gzan ma rungs pa yis bskor na yang //spyon ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni//myur bar phyogs kun tu yang 'gro bar 'gyur//
261b4(mdo sde): mig 'jigs me lce lta bur 'od 'phro ba//mig dug can gyis yongs su bskor na yang //spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni//shin tu myur bar gdug pa med par 'gyur//
261b5(mdo sde): bzang po'i klog kyang 'byung zhing sdug pa yi//sprin las lce dang ser ba chur 'bab pa//spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni//de ma thag tu myur bar rab tu zhi//sdug bsngal
261b6(mdo sde): mang po brgya yis gtses pa dang //sdug bsngal mang pos gzir ba'i sems can mthong //ye shes dge ba'i stobs kyis spyan ras gzigs//de bas lhar bcas 'gro
261b7(mdo sde): bskyob pa'o//rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis pha rol song ba ste//thabs dang ye shes yangs pa bslabs pas na//phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba mang po thams cad dang //ma lus zhing
262a1(mdo sde): kun tu yang rab tu snang //srog chags rnams kyi ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa dang //mi khom pa dang sems can dmyal ba dang //byol song dang ni gshin rjes bskor/
262a2(mdo sde): ba yang //skye rgan pas gzir ba mthar zhi byed//shin tu dge ba'i spyan de byams pa'i spyan//thabs dang shes rab khyad par yod pa'i spyan//snying rje'i spyan dang byams pa'i
262a3(mdo sde): spyan pas na//zhal bzang spyan bzang shin tu lta 'dod pa//dri ma mod pa dri ma bral ba'i 'od//rab rib med pa ye shes nyi ma'i 'od//sprin gyis chod por gyur pa med pa'i
262a4(mdo sde): 'od//'jig rten dag na lhag ge lhang nger mdzes//snying rje las byung tshul khrims grags pa ste//dge ba'i yon tan byams yid sprin chen po//srog chags rnams kyi nyon
262a5(mdo sde): mongs me zhi byed//chos kyi char pa bdud rtsi rab tu 'bebs//thab mo dang ni rtsod cing 'gyed pa yi//'jigs chen g.yul ngor skyes bu song na yang //spyan ras gzigs
262a6(mdo sde): kyi dbang po dran na ni//de ma thag tu dgra rnams rab tu zhi//sprin gyi sgra dang rnga bo che yi sgra//'brug gi sgra dang tshangs pa'i dbyangs snyan pa//dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor pha
262a7(mdo sde): rol phyin pa ste//spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran par bya//dag pa'i sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang po//the tshom ma za dran byos dran par gyis//'chi
262b1(mdo sde): ba'i tshe dang nyon mongs gtses pa'i tshe//mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen du yang 'gyur//yon tan thams cad kyi ni pha rol phyin//sems can kun la snying rje byams pa'i spyan//
262b2(mdo sde): yang dag yon tan yon tan rgya mtsho tsha//spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang por phyag byar 'os//'di ltar 'gro ba rnams la snying brtse ba//phyi ma'i dus na sangs rgyas su yang 'gyur//
262b3(mdo sde): 'jigs dang mya ngan thams cad 'jig byed pa//spyan ras gzigs dbang de ni dran par bya//'jig rten dbang gi rgyal po gtso bo ste//dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas
262b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten mchod//bskal pa brgya phrag mang po spyad nas su//rdul bral bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob//'dren pa snang ba mtha' yas g.yas g.yon nas//bsil
262b5(mdo sde): yab thogs te de bzhin g.yob cing 'dug/sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang //zhing rnams kun tu song nas rgyal ba mchod//nub kyi phyogs na bde ba'i 'byung gnas
262b6(mdo sde): te//rdul bral 'jig rten khams 'o bde bo can//de na sems can kha lo sgyur ba yi//'dren pa che mtha' yas pa'ang da ltar bzhugs//der ni bud med rnams
262b7(mdo sde): kyang mi 'byung ste//rnam pa kun tu g.yem pa'i chos med do//rgyal ba'i sras po de dag rdzus te skye//dri ma med pa'i pad+ma'i snying por 'dug/'dren pa che mtha' yas
263a1(mdo sde): pa de nyid kyang //pad+ma'i snying po dri med dga' ba la//seng ge'i khri la rab tu bzhugs pa yang //sa la'i rgyal po lta bur rnam par mdzes//'jig rten
263a2(mdo sde): 'dren pa 'di yang de bzhin te//srid pa gsum na de yang yong med do//gang gis spyan ras gzigs dbang ming thos pa//de yi bsod nams dag ni zad me 'gyur//
263a3(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa 'dzin stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
263a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das su dag byang chub sems dpa'
263a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi le'u byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa
263a6(mdo sde): bstan pa kun nas sgo'i le'u/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di thos pa'i sems can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa
263a7(mdo sde): ma lags so//kun nas sgo'i le'u bstan pa 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa na/'khor de las srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis mi mnyam pa dang
263b1(mdo sde): mnyam pa/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro//dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po las spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul/
263b2(mdo sde): pa bstan pa kun nas sgo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal
263b3(mdo sde): pa/rigs kyi bu dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/bskal pa mthong na dga' bo la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i
263b4(mdo sde): 'od zer gyis brgyan par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen
263b5(mdo sde): pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'brug sgra dbyings snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas
263b6(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i gsung rab la/rgyal po dge ba bkod pa zhes bya ba
263b7(mdo sde): byung ste/rigs kyi bu dge rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pa zhes bya ba zhig yod do//rigs kyi bu dag rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de la bu gnyis shig yod
264a1(mdo sde): de/gcig gi ming ni dri ma med pa'i snying po/gcig gi ming ni dri ma med pa'i mig ste/khye'u de gnyis rdzu 'phrul dang ldan shes rab dang ldan bsod
264a2(mdo sde): nams dang ldan ye shes dang ldan te/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brtson par gyur to//'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
264a3(mdo sde): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol
264a4(mdo sde): tu phyin pa dang byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag la brtson por gyur te/thams cad kyi pha rol tu ston
264a5(mdo sde): par gyur to//dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu song ngo //rgyu skar dang skar ma dang nyi ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu song ngo //dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin
264a6(mdo sde): gyi pha rol tu song ngo //dri ma med pa'i 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu stong ngo //dpa' rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu stong ngo //gzi brjid chen po'i ting nge
264a7(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi pha rol tu song bar gyur to//bcom ldan 'das de'ang de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can de dag la thugs brtse ba dang /rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de la thugs brtse
264b1(mdo sde): ba'i phyir/dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston to//rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u dri ma med pa'i snying po dang khye'u dri ma med pa'i mig/bdag cag skyed pa'i
264b2(mdo sde): mgo la ba der song ste phyin nas sor mo bcu las thal mo sbyar te/bdag cag skyed pa'i ma la 'di skad ces smras so//yum tshur spyon/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
264b3(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brog sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad
264b4(mdo sde): du/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i
264b5(mdo sde): drung du bzhud de/ci'i slad du zhe na yum de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sengs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog
264b6(mdo sde): kun tu rgyas pa de/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgyas par rab tu 'chud kyis de mnyan pa'i phyir bzhud do//
264b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag la de skad ces smras nas/rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pas/khye'u dri ma med pa'i snying po dang dri ma med pa'i mig la 'di skad ces smras so//
265a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyi pha rgyal po dge ba bkod pa 'di bram ze la drad pas/de bzhin gshegs pa de la blta ba'i phyir 'gror mi ster ro//rigs kyi bu dag
265a2(mdo sde): nas/khye'u dri ma med pa'i snying po dang khye'u dri ma med pa'i mig gis ser mo bcu'i thul mo sbyar nas/bdag cag skyed pa'i ma la 'di skad ces smras so//bdag cag log par
265a3(mdo sde): lta ba'i khyim du skyes te/bdag cag chos kyi rgyal po'i bu ma lags pa ste/rigs kyi bu dgi de nas rgyal ba'i chung myi dri ma med pas byin pas/khye'u de dag la 'di skad ces
265a4(mdo sde): smras so//rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis bdag cag gi pha rgyal po dge ba bkod pa la snying brtse ba'i phyir/cho 'phrul ci zhig legs par ston cig dang khyed la dad par 'gyur yang sbying
265a5(mdo sde): kyis/sems dad par gyur na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po
265a6(mdo sde): me tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i gan du 'dod du gnang ngo //rigs kyi bu dag dri nas khye'u dri ma med pa'i snying po dang khye'u dri ma med pa'i mig gis/de'i tshe ta la bdun tsam du nanum
265a7(mdo sde): mkha' la 'phags nas/pha rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de la snying brtse ba'i phyir/sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i cho 'phrul zung du byed de/de dag nam mkha' bar snang de la dong
265b1(mdo sde): nas nyal bar byed do//bar snang de la 'chag go/bar snang de la rdul spug go/bar snang de nyid la lus kyi spyad nas chu'i rgyun gtong zhing /lus kyi stong nas me'i phung po rab tu 'bar
265b2(mdo sde): bar byed do//lus kyi stod nas chu'i rgyun gtong zhing /lus kyi smad nas me'i phung po rab tu 'bar bar byed do//de dag nam mkha' de nyid la chen por gyur nas chung ngur gyur//
265b3(mdo sde): chung ngur gyur nas chen por gyur to//bar snang de nyid la mi snang bar gyur te sa las byung ngo //saM las byung nas nam mkha' la 'phags so//rigs kyi bu dgra khye'u de gnyis
265b4(mdo sde): kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de snyed kyis/rang gi pha rgyal po dge ba bkod pa btul lo//rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pas/khye'u de gnyis kyi rdzu 'phrul
265b5(mdo sde): gyi cho 'phrul de dag mthong nas/de'i tshe tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' zhing bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te/khye'u de dag la 'di skad
265b6(mdo sde): ces/rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyi ston pa su/khyed su'i slob ma zhes smras so//rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u de gnyis kyis rgyal po dge bo bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras
265b7(mdo sde): so//rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog
266a1(mdo sde): kun tu rgyas pa de bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la rin po che'i shing byang chub kyi shing drung na chos kyi gdan la bzhugs te/lha dang bcas bdud dang
266a2(mdo sde): bcas tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i mdun nu dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgyas par rab tu 'chad pa'i bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag cag gi ston pa
266a3(mdo sde): skye/rgyal po chen po bdag cag ni de'i slob ma'o//rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pas khye'u de gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu dag khyed
266a4(mdo sde): kyi ston pa lta zhing bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du bdag kyang 'gro'o//rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u de gnyis par snang de las babs nas/bdag cag skyed pa'i mgo la
266a5(mdo sde): ba der song ste phyin nas sor me bcu thal mo sbyar te/bdag cag skyed pa'i ma la 'di skad ces smras so//yum bdag cag gi yab 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
266a6(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu btul lags so//bdag cag gis yab kyi ston pa'i bgyi ba bgyis so//bdag cag bcom ldan 'das de las rab tu 'byung na yum da ni bdag cag
266a7(mdo sde): gtang ba'i rigs so//rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u dri ma med pa'i snying po dang khye'u dri ma med pa'i mig gis/de'i tshe bdag cag skyed pa'i ma la tshigs su bcad pa
266b1(mdo sde): 'di dag smras so//khyim med rab tu 'byung bar ni//yum gyis bdag cag gnang bar mdzod//de bzhin gshegs pa rnyed par dka'//bdag cag rab tu 'byung bar bgyi//
266b2(mdo sde): u dum+ba ra'i me tog bzhin//rgyal ba shin tu rnyed par dka'//dal ba 'byor pa'ang rnyed dka' bas//rab tu 'byung gis gtang du gsol//rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med
266b3(mdo sde): pas smras pa//de ring khyed gnyis gtang bar bya//byis pa bdag dang legs par deng //de bzhin gshegs pa rnyed dka' bas//bdag kyang rab tu byung bar bya//rigs kyi
266b4(mdo sde): bu dag khye'u de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas/bdag gi pha dang ma la 'di skad ces smras so//yab yum legs so tshur spyon//khyed dang thams cad
266b5(mdo sde): lhan cig bzhud do//bcom ldan 'das de la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag
266b6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyun skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i drung du bzhud do//de ci'i slad du zhe na/yab yum sangs rgyas 'byung ba
266b7(mdo sde): rnyed par dka' ste/u du m+ba ra'i mi tog dang 'dra zhing gnya' shing gi bu gar rus sbal gyi mgrin pa chung ba dang 'dra ba'i slad du'o//yab yum sangs rgyas bcom ldan
267a1(mdo sde): 'das dag 'byung ba rnyed par dka' ste/de bas na yab yum bdag cag bsod nams mchog gis brtan pas gsung rab 'di lta bu la skyes te/yab yum
267a2(mdo sde): bdag cag btang na legs te bdag cag mchi zhing /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyaso 'brug sgra dbyangs
267a3(mdo sde): snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo //de ci'i slad du zhe na/yab yum de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnyed par dka' ba dang //
267a4(mdo sde): da ltar gyi dus na 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi rgyal po rnyed par dka' ba dang /'di lta bu'i dal ba 'byor pa shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'i slad du'o//rigs kyi bu dag de'i tshe na/
267a5(mdo sde): rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de'i btsun mo'i 'khor las slas brgyad khri bzhi stong dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i snod du gyur to//khye'u dri
267a6(mdo sde): ma med pa'i snying po dang dri ma med pa'i mig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la spyad de/bskal pa byi ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ngan song thams cad ji ltar bsil
267a7(mdo sde): snyam nas/sems can thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la spyad par gyur to//khye'u de dag gi ma dri ma med pas byin pa rgyal po'i chung ma
267b1(mdo sde): de'ang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kun bstan pa/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos gsang ba'i gnas shes so//rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u de gnyis kyis rgyal po dge ba bkod
267b2(mdo sde): pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la btul te bzhugs par byas nas yongs su smin par byas te/gnyen 'dab dang rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pa de dang gnyen
267b3(mdo sde): 'dab dang rgyal po dge ba bkod pa'i khye'u de gnyis kyang /srog chags bzhi khri nyis stong dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas blon po dang bcas te thams cad 'grogs nas lhan
267b4(mdo sde): cig tu/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa ga la
267b5(mdo sde): ba der dong ste/lhags nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
267b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skor ma'i rgyal po me tog kun
267b7(mdo sde): tu rgyas pa des/rgyal po dge ba bkod pa 'khor dang bcas te lhags par mkhyen nas/chos kyi gtam gyis shin tu legs por yang dag par bstan/yang dag par
268a1(mdo sde): 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzengs bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do//rigs kyi bu dag de nas bcom ldan 'das des rgyal po dge ba
268a2(mdo sde): bkod pa la/chos kyi gtam gyis shin tu legs par yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzengs bstid/yang dag par rab tu dga'
268a3(mdo sde): bar mdzad pas/de'i tshe tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/nu bo cod pan gyis bcings te/rgyal por bcug nas bu dang
268a4(mdo sde): gnyen 'dab dang 'khor dang bcas pa dang /rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pa de'ang /bud med kyi tshogs thams cad dang 'khor dang khye'u de gnyis dang lhan
268a5(mdo sde): cig tu/srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig 'grogs te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
268a6(mdo sde): 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i gsung rab la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/rab tu byung nas rgyal po dge ba bkod
268a7(mdo sde): pa 'khor dang bcas pas/lo brgyad khri bzhi stong du dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bsam pa dang bsgom pa dang kun chub par bya ba la brtson
268b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pa lo brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das nas/yon tan gyi brgyan thams cad bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob
268b2(mdo sde): ste/ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu de'i tshe nam mkha' la ta la bdun tsam du 'phags so//de nas rigs kyi bu dag rgyal po dge ba bkod pa nam mkha'i dkyil du 'dug nas
268b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brag sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di
268b4(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bu 'di gnyis ston pa lags te/gang 'di dag gis rdzu 'phrul gyis lta bar gyur pa chen po de las bzlog ste/de
268b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu bzhag go//yongs su smin par bgyis/zhugs par bgyis so//de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang /phyag bgyi
268b6(mdo sde): ba'i slad du'ang bskul lo//bcom ldan 'das khye'u 'di gnyis bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba dran par bgyi ba'i slad du/bu'i
268b7(mdo sde): gzugs kyis bdag gi khyim du skyes so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
269a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pas rgyal po dge ba bkod pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rgyal po de de bzhin
269a2(mdo sde): te/ji skad smras pa bzhin no//dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams ni srid pa'i 'gro ba dang 'chi ba'i gnas thams cad du skyes pa na'ang /
269a3(mdo sde): gang dag ston pa'i byed pas nye bar gnas pa dang /gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa dang /'dzud pa dang yongs su smin par
269a4(mdo sde): byed pa'i dge ba'i bo shes gnyen rnams rnyed par sla bar 'gyur ro//rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa/de bzhin gshegs pa
269a5(mdo sde): ltor 'dzud pa gnas 'di ni rgya che ba'o//rgyal po chen po khye'u 'di gnyis mthong ngam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mthong
269a6(mdo sde): legs so//bcom ldan 'odas kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po khye'u 'di gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
269a7(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung drug cu rtsa lnga'i bye ma snyed la mchod pa byed do//sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir/log par lta ba'i sems can rnams yang dag pa'i lta ba la
269b1(mdo sde): brtson 'grus bskyed pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'didri 'dzin par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pa nam mkha'i dkyil
269b2(mdo sde): de nas babs te/sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brugs sgra dbyangs snyan skar
269b3(mdo sde): ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
269b4(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gi slad du/dbu'i gtsug tor rnam par mdzes spyan dri ma ma mchis pa lags/smin mtshams kyi mdzad spu mdzes
269b5(mdo sde): shing /zla ba dung ltar dkar la mdzes/mnyam zhing thags bzang ba'i tshems kyi phreng ba zhal gyi nang nas mdzes/bcom ldan 'das kyi sgros me tog bim+ba ltar dmar ba dang /
269b6(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa'i spyan mdzes pa/de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bshad du gsol/rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pas yon tan de snyed
269b7(mdo sde): kyis/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa
270a1(mdo sde): de la mngon par bstod nas/yon tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gzhan dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das de la bstod do//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
270a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
270a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di don che zhing /yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dul ba gsungs te/ji tsam du de bzhin
270a4(mdo sde): gshegs pas bslab pa legs par bcas pa ni ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad bdag slar sems kyi dbang du mchi bar mi bgyi'o//slar log par lta/
270a5(mdo sde): ba'i dbang du mchi bar mi bgyi'o//slar khro ba'i dbang du mchi bar mi bgyi'o//slar sdig pa'i sems bskyed pa'i dbang du mchi bar mi bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag
270a6(mdo sde): mi dge ba'i chos 'di snyed dang ldan na/bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du mchi bar mi 'tshal lo zhes smras te/de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
270a7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgre dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas par snang la song
270b1(mdo sde): ste 'chag go//de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pa dang /rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pa des/brgya stong ri ba'i mu tig gi rgyan phreng bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi bar snang
270b2(mdo sde): la gtor ro//mu tig gi rgyan phreng de gtor ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi steng na/mu tig gi rgyan phreng gi khang pa brtsegs pa gru bzhi lham pa ka ba bzhi zug pa ngos mnyam
270b3(mdo sde): pa shin tu rnam par phye ba lta na sdug pa gnas par gyur te/khang pa brtsegs pa der ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba'i khri byung ngo //khri de dag la de bzhin gshegs
270b4(mdo sde): pa'i sku skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs par snang ngo //de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pa 'di snyam du sems te/sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di ni mthu che zhing /de bzhin
270b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pas 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbus na mdzes shing lta na sdug pa/kha dog
270b6(mdo sde): bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par gda'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyus pas 'khor
270b7(mdo sde): bzhi po de dag la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag rgyal po dge ba bkod pa nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'dug cing seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa mthong ngam/gsol pa mthong
271a1(mdo sde): lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag rgyal po dge ba bkod pas nga'i bstan pa la dge slong gi tshul du byas nas/bskal
271a2(mdo sde): pa mngon 'phags rgyal po zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams yangs ldan du/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig
271a3(mdo sde): pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas
271a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ste/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
271a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang /nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med par 'gyur ro//'jig
271a6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams yangs ldan yang /lag mthil ltar mnyam par 'gyur ro//de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
271a7(mdo sde): de yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu dag de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dge ba bkod pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de/gzhan zhig yin snyam du
271b1(mdo sde): khyod som nyi 'am yid gnyis sum the tshom za bar gyur na/rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
271b2(mdo sde): pad+ma'i dpal 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dge ba bkod pa zhes bya bar gyur to//rigs kyi bu dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pa zhes bya bar
271b3(mdo sde): gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi ma yid gnyis sna ma the tshom za bar gyur na/rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyiraro zhe na/byang chub
271b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin
271b5(mdo sde): pa zhes bya bar gyur te/rgyal po dge ba bkod pa dang sems can de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir/rgyal po dge ba bkod pa'i chung mar khas blangs par gyur to//rigs kyi
271b6(mdo sde): bu dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/khye'u de gnyis su gyur pa de/gzhan dag zhig yin pa snyam du khyed som nyi 'am yid gnyis sam the tshom za bar gyur na/rigs kyi bu dag
271b7(mdo sde): khyed kyis de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sman gyi rgyal po dang sman yang dag 'phags 'di gnyis de'i tshe de'i dus na/rgyal po dge ba bkod pa'i bur gyur
272a1(mdo sde): to//rigs kyi bu ngas de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po dang /sman yang dag 'phags yon tan bsam gyis
272a2(mdo sde): mi khyab pa dang ldan te/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o//skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ka'ang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
272a3(mdo sde): chos kyis yang dag par 'phags so//gang dag skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyi ming 'dzin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag byas
272a4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di bshad po na/srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dog go//
272a5(mdo sde): 'phags pa dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po las rgyal po dge ba bkod pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o///de nas byang chub sems
272a6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po bgrang po las 'odas pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar//
272a7(mdo sde): lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis kyang yongs su bskor cing
272b1(mdo sde): mdun du bdar te/lhan cig tu shar phyogs nas zhing dag ni rab tu g.yo bar byed/pad+ma'i char ni rab tu 'bebs/sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni rab tu len cing /byang
272b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i che ba nyid
272b3(mdo sde): dang /byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid chen po 'bar ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /lha dang klu dang
272b4(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang /de ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi
272b5(mdo sde): cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'dir phyin nas/de ra'i rgyal
272b6(mdo sde): po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la bo dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la
272b7(mdo sde): lan bdun skor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog gzi
273a1(mdo sde): brjid mngon 'phags rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'dir mchis te/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na dam pa'i chos pad+ma
273a2(mdo sde): dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa de mnyan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i drung du bdag mchis so//bcom ldan 'das
273a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong 'di snyed 'di dag kyang /dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i slad du mchis so//de'i slad du bcom ldan
273a4(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'
273a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po 'di rnams la rgya cher legs par bshad du gsol/de skad ces gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
273a6(mdo sde): chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni mgo smos pa tsam gyis khong du chud pa sha
273a7(mdo sde): stag go/dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'di lta ste/de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med pa'o//byang
273b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so//bde bar gshegs pa de de lta lags so//de nas 'khor der dge slong dang dge slong ma
273b2(mdo sde): dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma 'dus pa de dag dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byung
273b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i bud med kyis dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar
273b4(mdo sde): po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lag tu thob par 'gyur ro//bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba dang //
273b5(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur pa dang /nges pa'i phung po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir/bla na med pa yang dag par/
273b6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba ste/rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i bud med kyis dam pa'i chos pad+mo dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs
273b7(mdo sde): 'di lag tu thob par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
274a1(mdo sde): 'das skud ma'i tshe slang ma'i dus lnga brgyu'i bla ma la/mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la bsrung bar bgyi'o//bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o//
274a2(mdo sde): chad pa spang bar bgyi'o//dug gzhil bar bgyi'o//ci nas chos smra ba de dag la glags lta ba dang /skabs 'tshal ba grang gis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba
274a3(mdo sde): dang /bdud sdig can dang bdud kyi bu rnams dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang bdud kyi bu mo rnams dang bdud kyi 'khor glags lta ba dang /skabs 'tshal
274a4(mdo sde): ba rnams kyis glags mi rnyed par 'gyur bas ni/bdud kyi kun nas ldang ba'i bar du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang lha'i bu dang gnod sbyin dang yi dgas dang srul po
274a5(mdo sde): dang gshed byed dang ro langs dag/chos smra ba de la glags lte ba dang skabs 'chol ba na'adi skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur bar/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos smra
274a6(mdo sde): ba de la rtag par rgyun du dus thams cad du bsrung bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe chos smra ba de/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la sems shing /rnal 'byor
274a7(mdo sde): la brtson pa dang /'chag pa la zhugs par gyur pa de'i tshe chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba'i slad du bdag glang po che'i rgyal po thal kar mche ba drug pa la 'tshal
274b1(mdo sde): te/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas/chos smra ba de'i 'chag pa'i gnas su chos smra ba de'i drung du mchi bar bgyi'o//gang gi tshe chos smra/
274b2(mdo sde): ba de chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la sems shing rnal 'byor gyi rjes su zhugs pa des/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig dang yi ge gcig tsam yang lan
274b3(mdo sde): 'ga' nor bar gyur pa de'i tshe/bdag glang po che'i rgyal po thal kar mche ba drug pa la 'tshal nas/chos smra ba de la bdag gi ngo bstan te/chos kyi rnam grangs
274b4(mdo sde): 'di ma nyams par zlos su stsal to//chos smra ba des bdag gi lus mthong zhing chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma nyams par bdag la thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi/
274b5(mdo sde): rangs te/rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brtson 'grus rtsom mo//bdag mthong ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin thob par
274b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//gzungs 'khyil ba zhes bgye ba'i gzung so thob par 'gyur ro//bye ba brgya stong du 'khyil ba zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro//sgra
274b7(mdo sde): thams cad la mkhas po zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro//bcomo ldan 'das slad mo'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la/dge slong ngam
275a1(mdo sde): dge slong ma 'am dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa dang mdo sde 'di lta bu yi ger 'dri ba dang mdo sde 'di lta bu 'chol ba
275a2(mdo sde): dang mdo sde 'di lta bu klog pa dang gang dag slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ched du/gdugs bdun gsume nyi shu gcig tu
275a3(mdo sde): 'chag cing brtson par gyur na/de dag la bdag gis sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba'i lus bstan par bgyi'o//glang po che'i rgyal po thal kar mchi
275a4(mdo sde): ba drug pa la 'tshal te/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas/gdugs nyi shu rtsa gcig pa la chos smra ba de dag 'chag pa'i thad du mchi'o//
275a5(mdo sde): mchis nas chos smra ba de dag la yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o//yang dag par 'dzin du stsal bar bgyi'o//yang dag par gzengs bstod par bgyi'o//yang
275a6(mdo sde): dag par rab tu dga' bar bgyi'o//de dag la gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi'o//ci nas chos smra ba de dag la sus kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang de dag la mi
275a7(mdo sde): 'am mi ma lags pas glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /bud med kyis 'phrogs par mi 'gyur bar de dag la bsrung bar bgyi'o//bde legs su 'gyur bar
275b1(mdo sde): bgyi'o//chad pa spang bar bgyi'o//dug gzhil bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba de dag la bdag gis gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag stsal bar bgyi'o//bcom
275b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gsan du gsol//tad+yA thA/su daN+Da/dar+t+ti pa ti dar+N+Na brta ni/daN+Da ku sha la/det+tA su d+hA ri/su d+hA ra ba taM bud+d+ha pA sh+ya ne/d+hA rA Ni/
275b3(mdo sde): A brta ni/A bar+t+ta ni/sad+d+ha pa rI k+Shi te/sad+d+ha nI ra ga sa te/d+harma pa rI k+Shi te/sar+b+ba sat+kA r+yA ta/ko shai g+ha/ko sha l+yA nu ga taM/sid+d+ha bikr-I Di te/a nu brte/bar+d+ha ni/bat+tA li swAH/
275b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gzungs sdigs kyi tshig 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' gang gi rna ba'i dbang po la grags pa da ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu
275b5(mdo sde): bzang po'i byin gyis brlabs su rig par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i ches pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang dzam+bu'i gling 'di na spyod pa na/byang chub
275b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' gang dag gi lag tu thob par gyur pa na/bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i mthu dang /byang chub sems
275b7(mdo sde): dpa' kun tu bzang po'i gzi brjid kyis dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag cag gi lag tu thob bo snyam du de ltar rig par bgyi'o//bcom
276a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang dag mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang 'dzin pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa thob par 'gyur ro//
276a2(mdo sde): sems can de dag gis sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gis spyi
276a3(mdo sde): bo la byugs par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bdag kyang dga' bar bgyis par 'gyur ro//gang dag mdo 'di yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang /gang
276a4(mdo sde): dag 'di'i don khong du chud par bgyid pa dang /bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di yi ger bris pa de dag/'di nas shi 'phos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang
276a5(mdo sde): skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur te/skyes ma thag tu de'i drung du lha'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong mchi bar 'gyur/lha'i bu mo de dag rnga bo che tsam gyi cod pan can lha'i bu
276a6(mdo sde): mo de dag gi nang na gnas par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger bris pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'ang 'di 'dra lags na/gang
276a7(mdo sde): dag lung nod pa dang kha ton bgyid pa dang sems pa dang yid la bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar
276b1(mdo sde): po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems kyis kun bsams te yi ger 'dri bar bgyi'o//gang mi g.yeng bar yid la bgyid pas yi ger briswA na/de la sangs rgyas brgya stong
276b2(mdo sde): phyag rkyong bar 'gyur ro//'chi ba'i tshe'ang sangs rgyas stong gi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro//ngan 'gro log par ltung bar mchi bar mi 'gyur ro//'di nos shi 'phos
276b3(mdo sde): nas kyang dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur te/gang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa mtshan bzang po sum
276b4(mdo sde): cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa de/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis mdun gyis bltas te chos
276b5(mdo sde): 'chad pa der skye'o//de lta logs pas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo mkhas pas/dam pa'i chos pad+mo dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gus par yi ger 'dri bar
276b6(mdo sde): bgyi'o//gus par lung nod par bgyi'o//gus par kha ton du bgyi'o//gus par yid la bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger bris
276b7(mdo sde): pa dang lung mnos pa dang kha ton bgyis pa dang bsgoms pa dang yid la bgyis pa ni/de ltar yon tan dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das de
277a1(mdo sde): lta lags pas/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo mkhas pas dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung bar bgyis te/de dag gi
277a2(mdo sde): yon tan gyi phan yin 'di snyed du 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ci nas bdag gi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dzam+bu'i gling 'di na spyod par
277a3(mdo sde): 'gyur bar bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
277a4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la kun tu bzang po khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang //
277a5(mdo sde): 'di ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos dang ldan zhing snying rje chen pos thim pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pas zin pa'i sems bskyed pas//
277a6(mdo sde): khyod kyis chos smra ba de dag la byin gyis rlob pa byed pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no//rigs kyi bu gang la la dag byang chub sems dpa' se mos dpa'
277a7(mdo sde): chen po kun tu bzang po'i ming 'dzin pa de dag gis/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa mthong ba dang /
277b1(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gan nas thos pa dang /de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa mchod pa
277b2(mdo sde): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas chos bstan pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin pa dang /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rjes su yi rang ba dang /de bzhin gshegs
277b3(mdo sde): pa shAkya thub pas de dag gi spyi bor phyag bzhag pa dang /de dag gi sra bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa chos gos kyis g.yogs par rig par bya'o//kun tu bzang
277b4(mdo sde): po rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'dzin par rig par bya'o//de dag 'jig rten rgyang pan pa la dga' bar mi 'gyur ro///
277b5(mdo sde): de dag snyan dang gsal zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la dga' bar mi 'gyur ro//de dag gar byed pa dang rol mo byed pa dang gyad dang sha 'tshong ba drang ba shan pa dang
277b6(mdo sde): byAbya gag 'tshang ba dang phag 'tshong ba dang bud med dgra gso ba'i sems can rnams la dga' byor myi 'gyur ro//mdo sde 'di lta bu thos pa dang yi ger bris pa dang /
277b7(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang klags pa de dag gzhan la sred par mi 'gyur ro//sems can de dag chos kyi ngo bo nyid dang ldan par 'gyur ro//de dag so so'i bdag nyid tshul
278a1(mdo sde): bzhin yid la byed par 'gyur ro//rang gi bsod nams kyi stobs bskyed par 'gyur ro//de dag sems can rnams kyis mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro//
278a2(mdo sde): dge slong gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa de dag 'dod chags kyis gzir bar mi 'o gyur ro//zhe sdang med pa dang gti mug med pa dang ser sna med pa dang 'chab pa
278a3(mdo sde): med pa dang nga rgyal med pa dang che ba'i nga rgyal med pa dang log pa'i nga rgyal med par 'gyur ro//kun tu bzang po chos smra ba de dag bdag gi rnyed pas chog shes
278a4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//kun tu bzang po gang gis phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya pa tha ma la/dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong
278a5(mdo sde): mthong na/'di snyam du rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu 'di ni bdud kyi 'thub mo'i tshogs las rgyal bar 'gyur ro//
278a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro//'di ni chos kyi rnga brdung bar 'gyur ro//'di ni chos kyi dung 'bud par 'gyur ro//'di ni chos kyi
278a7(mdo sde): char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur ro//'di ni chos kyi seng ge'i khri la 'dug par 'gyur ro snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o//gang dag phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe
278b1(mdo sde): lnga brgya pa tha ma la/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag brkam par mi 'gyur ro//chos gos la chags pa dang /lhung bzed la chags par mi 'gyur ro//
278b2(mdo sde): chos smra ba de dag drang por 'gyur ro//chos smra ba de dag rnam par thur pa gsum thob par 'gyur ro//de dag gi tshe 'di la bzlog par 'gyur ro//gang dag mdo sde
278b3(mdo sde): 'di lta bu 'dzin pa chos smra ba'i dge slong rnams rmongs par byed pa'i sems can de dag dmus long du 'gyur ro//gang dag gi snga mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams
278b4(mdo sde): la mi snyan pa bsgrags na/de dag tshe 'di nyid la lus la shr-i bkra 'byung bar 'gyur ro//gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu yi ger 'dri ba rnams la 'phya ba dang bsgying ba de dag so chag

278b6(mdo sde): ro//lus dri mi zhim par 'gyur ro//lus la 'bras dang 'brum bu phra mo dang rkang shu dang shu ba dang g.yan pas gang bar 'gyur ro//gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin
278b7(mdo sde): pa dang /mdo sde 'di lta bu yi ger 'dri ba dang /mdo sde 'di lta bu klog pa dang mdo sde 'di lta bu 'chad pa rnams la mi snyan pa'i tshig bden pa 'am/mi bden pa bsgrags
279a1(mdo sde): na sdig pa'i las shin tu lci bar rig par bya'o//kun tu bzang po de byas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong la rgyud mya nas kyang ltung bar
279a2(mdo sde): bya'o//ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la gus par bya ba bzhin du mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge sbyong la'ang gus par bya'o kun tu bzang po spro bar bya ba'i le'u 'di

279a4(mdo sde): pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po las kun tu bzang pos spro bar bya ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
279a5(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa chos kyi gdan de las bzhengs te thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag bsdus
279a6(mdo sde): nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa yongs su grub pa'i phyag g.yas pas/de dag gi lag pa g.yas pa nas bzung nas de'i tshe 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
279a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag ngas bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yang dag par bsgrubs pa bla na med pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di khyed kyi lag tu gtad
279b1(mdo sde): do/yongs su gtad do rjes su gtad do//bzhag go/gtams so//rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis ci nas kyang rgya tshar rgyas par 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig/lan gnyis
279b2(mdo sde): lan gsum du'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag g.yas pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi lag pa g.yas pa nas bzung ste 'di skad ces bka' stsal
279b3(mdo sde): to//rigs kyi bu dag ngas bskul pa grongs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yang dag par bsgrubs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di khyed kyi lag tu
279b4(mdo sde): gtad do//yongs su gtad do//rjes su gtad do//bzhag go/gtams so//rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis blangs la bzung ngo //klago go/kun chub par bya'o//
279b5(mdo sde): bstan par bya'o//bshad par bya'o//sems can thams cad la bsgrags par bya'o//rigs kyi bu dag nga la ser sna med do//'dzin pa'i sems med do//'jigs
279b6(mdo sde): pa med par sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sbyin pa'o de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang rang byung gi ye shes sbyin pa'o//rigs kyi bu dgang ni sbyin pa'i bdag po chen po ste/rigs kyi bu
279b7(mdo sde): dag khyed kyang nga'i rjes su slobs shig sor sna med par gyis la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba thabs mkhas pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'ongs shing lhags
280a1(mdo sde): pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag la yang dag par sgrogs shig rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo glang dag dad pa dang /sems can gang dag
280a2(mdo sde): mya dad pa de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par gzud par bya'o rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis de ltar byas na de bzhin gshegs pa la lan lon par 'gyur
280a3(mdo sde): ro//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thob pas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems
280a4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpe' chen po de dag dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' bas khyab par byas par gyur nas/rjes cher bskyed de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
280a5(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga lo ba de logs su lus btud lus rab tu btudo nas lus btsums te mgo smad nas thal
280a6(mdo sde): mo sbyar te/thams cad kyis sgra skad gcig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom lnga ni 'das de
280a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o//bcom
280b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das thugs las chung ngur ci bder bzhugs su gsol/lan gnyis lan gsum du'ang thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs des sgra skad gcig
280b2(mdo sde): tu tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das la thugs las chung ngur ci bder bzhugs su gsol/bcom ldan 'das ji skad du de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa bzhin
280b3(mdo sde): du bgyi'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o zhes gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
280b4(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
280b5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad slar gshegs su gsol te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
280b6(mdo sde): la ci bder gnas por mdzod cig ces de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la ci bder gnas par mdzod cig ces bya bar gsungs so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
280b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang de'i mchod rten yang gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag go/de bzhin gshegs pa
281a1(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la ci bder bzhugs shag ces gsungs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa
281a2(mdo sde): nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra badzum pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med dpag tu med pa 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas byin te/rin patsha
281a3(mdo sde): shing ljon pa dag gi drung na seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa de dag dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya sna ran chen mang
281a4(mdo sde): mas cid dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de den dang /spyod pa khyad par can la sogs pas rbA nus 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa'i chen
281a5(mdo sde): grangs med dpes tu med pa de dge dang nyan thos chen po de dag ngang 'khor ban po de dag dang ste dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten ye rangs te/
281a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de//'phags pa dam pa'i chus pad+me dkar po las yongs su gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu bdun
281a7(mdo sde): pa'o///gang ni mad sde 'di yod par//mi mar mur gyi dang 'bogs shing //spu gri gtams las 'jigs nas kyang //rigs kyi bu dge 'grob
281b1(mdo sde): glu/'phags pa dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sde byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams pa/sangs rgyas thams cad
281b2(mdo sde): kyis yongs su bzung ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smra bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang

281b4(mdo sde): mkhas pa chen po theg pa gcig tu bstan pa/don dam pa bsgrub pa bstan pa'i mdo rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+ti bo d+hi dang /zhu chen gyi
281b5(mdo sde): lo tsA ba ban+de sna nam ye shes sdes bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa//rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya sarba d+harma gu Na b+hU ha rA dza nA ma
281b6(mdo sde): ma hA lA na sne tI/bod skad du/'phags pa chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems

282a1(mdo sde): pa na/dge slong lnga brgya tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' stong nyis brgya thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/chags
282a2(mdo sde): pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba/spyod yul chags pa med pa/thabs mkhas pa/khams gsum thams cad la sems snyoms pa/phan pa dang snying rje'i lhag
282a3(mdo sde): pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'brel pa'i gtam 'dri ba sha stag la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
282a4(mdo sde): byams pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brtson dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa dang /
282a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi g.yo ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros bzang po dang /byang chub sems dpa'
282a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa mtha' yas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
282a7(mdo sde): po rab gnon blo gros dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' stong
282b1(mdo sde): nyis brgya dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang /klu'i rgyal po rnams dang /srin po'i bdag po thams cad dang /gnod sbyin mo sum brgya

282b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bskor ba byas nas/de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir lha'i me tog gi char mngon par phab bo//tsan+dan

282b7(mdo sde): pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pas rdul med pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sa chen po 'di
