283a2(mdo sde): tu ldeg/kun tu rab tu ldeg/'khrugs/rab tu 'khrugs/kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/'u re'ur/rab tu 'ur 'ur/kun tu rab tu 'u ra'ur/chematshim/
283a3(mdo sde): rab tu chematshem/kun tu rab tu tshimatsham mo//lha'i tsin+dan gyi phye ma'i char yang bab bo//lha'i me tog gi char yang bab bo//lha'i 'od kyi snang ba'ang byung ngo //
283a4(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can grang su dag ngan song du skyes pa dri dag thams cad kyang ngan song rnams las yongs su grol
283a5(mdo sde): bar gyur to//lha'i dbang po dang /klu'i dbang po dang /gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /srin po'i dbang po dang /mi'i dbang po de dag thams cad kyi gnas
283a6(mdo sde): rnams kyang snang bar gyur to//lha'i sil snyan gyi sgra dag kyang grag go/lha'i 'od dag kyang snang bar gyur to//lha'i spos kyi ngad ldang bar gyur to//de nas
283a7(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyang cho 'phrul chen po de mthong nas ye mtshan du gyur te 'di snyam du sems so//gnas 'di dag snang bar gyur pa 'di dang /cho 'phrul chen
283b1(mdo sde): po snang bar gyur pa 'di dang /sa chen po g.yos pa 'di dang /me tog gi char chen po bab pa 'di su'i mthu yin/su'i byin gyi rlabs yin zhig gu snyam nas/de dag
283b2(mdo sde): thang cig cang mi zer sems nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin no//'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yin
283b3(mdo sde): no zhes smras so//de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi 'di snyam du sems te/bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /mchod pa dang /
283b4(mdo sde): chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga lwa ba der 'dong go rI ma chag snyam mo//de nas lha'i dbang po dang /klu'i dbang po dang /gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /
283b5(mdo sde): srin po'i dbang po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba de dag thams cad kyis lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar po dang /dri mchog dang /man+da ra
283b6(mdo sde): ba dang /man+da ra ba chen po dag khyer nas 'od ma'i tshul byA kaM lan+ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /bi com ldan 'das ga la ba dir dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan
283b7(mdo sde): 'das la mngon par mchod de phyag byas so//me tog gi char chen po des kyang sa tshan po 'di pus mo nub tsam du khyab par 'dug go/de nas byang chub sems dpa'
284a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la ldan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas byang
284a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag du mas bskor cing /lha bye ba phrag du mas bskor te/rig sngags 'chang brgya phrag
284a3(mdo sde): du mas mdun du bdar bas rdzu 'phrul dang mthu chen po dang /bkod pa chen po dang /me tog dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang bdug pa dang /rol mo'i sgra dang /
284a4(mdo sde): sel snyan dang /pheg rdob pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa la mngon par mchod
284a5(mdo sde): do//de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa'i rgyal pos lha'i bkod pa dang /bkod pa'i mthu dang /me tog gi char chen pos de bzhin gshegs
284a6(mdo sde): pa la mchod pa byas so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'dus pa chen po de mthong nas/chos kyi 'bel pa'i gtam 'dod
284a7(mdo sde): par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas/byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa'i rgyal po
284b1(mdo sde): de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu song la sa chen po 'di ltos shig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa'i rgyal pos sa chen po bltas so//bltas nas
284b2(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sa chen po bltas lags te/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis sems
284b3(mdo sde): can thams cad la bde ba'i 'dus pa chen po mdzad pa mthong lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bkod pa'i rgyal po srog chags drug khri bzhi stong bla na
284b4(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu deng kho na lung bstan par 'gyur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das
284b5(mdo sde): kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /mi
284b6(mdo sde): dang /spyod pa pa dang /kun tu rgyu mang po 'dus lags so//bde bar gshegs pa sems can mang po 'dus lags so//bcom ldan 'das chos mnyan pa'i
284b7(mdo sde): dus ni 'di legs so//bde bar gshegs pa chos mnyan pa'i dus ni 'di lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur nas/byang chub sems
285a1(mdo sde): dpa' lag na rdo rjes ldan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab ste/bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/bde
285a2(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa grub par mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das 'gyod pa bsal ba dang /sems can
285a3(mdo sde): thams cad la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba'i mdo//nyin mongs pa thams cad zad par bgyid pa/bdud
285a4(mdo sde): thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa/sdig pa thams cad zad par bgyid pa/sems can ma dad pa rnams dad par bgyid pa/mu ge'i gnod pa zhi bar bgyid pa/nang
285a5(mdo sde): thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa/dus ma lags par 'chi ba thams cad zlog pa/bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa glog snang ba las thos nas/thos pa'i mod la
285a6(mdo sde): chos thams cad mngon du gyur cing /ngan song thams cad yang dag par chad de/las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par chad pa gang lags pa de bstan par
285a7(mdo sde): gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe sems can
285b1(mdo sde): nga'i bstan pa la ma dad pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde dag la mngon par ma dad cing yid mi ches lnga/tshig 'di skad du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
285b2(mdo sde): pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde ma yin no//'dri la ni legs pa byas pa dang /nyes pa byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ci'ang med do zhes zer ba dag 'byung
285b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/de dag ni tshigs pas zil gyis non nas/mchod pa'ang mngon pararo 'du byed par mi 'gyur la/chos smra ba de dag la'ang mchod pa byed par mi
285b4(mdo sde): 'gyur te/de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la yang 'khrug pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur la/phyis kyang sems can dmyal ba rnams su btso bar 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu 'di
285b5(mdo sde): ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yab yum dang 'dra la/las thams cad zad par byed pa'i mdo sde'i rgyal po chen po mnyan pa'i dus ma yin te/gzhan mu stegs
285b6(mdo sde): can spyod pa pa dang /kun tu rgyu de dag dang /sems can mang po gzhan dag kyang dran song du 'gro bar 'dod do//rigs kyi bu de dag ni mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di la dang
285b7(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur te/'dod pas ldongs pa'i yid kyis khyim yongs su skyong bar byed cing /rmo rko dang /tsheng dang /g.yul 'gyed pa dang /'thab pa la sred par
286a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//de nas shi 'phos nas kyang sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad po dag tu btso bar 'gyur ro//de nas de'i tshe sgrog chags brgyud khri
286a2(mdo sde): stan las langs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dad par bgyid lags so//
286a3(mdo sde): mngon par mchod par bgyid legs so//rgyas par yang bgyid legs so//'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /nyan du stsal ba dang /'don pa la spro
286a4(mdo sde): bar bgyid lags so//slad kyis chos ma lags pa'i dus de la bab na/smyo ba dang /brgyad bkag pa dang /bsdigs pa bzod pa bgyid lags so//
286a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bka' drin gzo bar bgyid kyi/bka' drin mi gzo bar mi bgyid de/bdag slad kyis 'gyod par 'gyur ba rA mi bgyid lags
286a6(mdo sde): so//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba'i mdo bstan du gsol/'di ni slad ma'i dus slod ma'i tshe de bzhin
286a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i phrin las bgyid par 'gyur pa legs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'i lag ni rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol
286b1(mdo sde): to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i bshes gnyen ji ltar yongs su btsal bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
286b2(mdo sde): stsal pa/rigs kyi bu 'od la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i bshes gnyen la blta bar 'dod pa dang /brtson 'grus
286b3(mdo sde): brtsams pa dang /bsam po yongs su dag pa dang /chos 'dod par bya ste/chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
286b4(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su btsal bar bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/bcomo ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa
286b5(mdo sde): na gnas pas ji ltar bgyi lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'di lta ste/khyim na gnas pa yongs su spangs pa dang /mi dge ba'i bshes
286b6(mdo sde): gnyen gyi 'du 'dzi yongs su spang ba dang /bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems
286b7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs
287a1(mdo sde): 'di thos nas ngan song du mchi bar 'gyur ba de ma mthong ste/de ni gnas ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das gang la la chos kyi rnam blangs 'ang
287a2(mdo sde): nyan pa dang /'di la phyag 'tshal ba de ni rdzu 'phrul tsho zhing mthu che ba lags na/gang yi ger 'dri ba dang /yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang /'chung ba dang /
287a3(mdo sde): klog pa dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa bgyid pa dang /chos smra ba de la'ang gros dang /rgyan rnams kyis mchod
287a4(mdo sde): par bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa lags so//de ni de bzhin gshegs pas bde ba can gyi
287a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams su lung bskrun pa kho na lags so//chos smra ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba kho nar lta bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das
287a6(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin te/legs so legs so//chos smra ba de la ni ngas kyang mchod pa bya'o//'jig rten gyi khams
287a7(mdo sde): bde ba can du'ang lung bstan par bya'o//gang de bzhin gshegs pa la bla ma'i sri zhu byed cing me tog dang /bdug spos dang /spos dang /me tog
287b1(mdo sde): phreng dang /byug pa dang /gos dang /rgyan rnams dang /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /bra na rnams kyis mchod pa byed pa de na dus ma yin par 'chi bas
287b2(mdo sde): 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro//pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa'ang med/mu ge'i gnod pa'i 'jigs pa'ang med/bu las gyur pa'i yid mi bde ba'ang med//
287b3(mdo sde): chung ma las gyur pa'i yid mi bde ba'ang med la/bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ba
287b4(mdo sde): dang /mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di thos pa ni dka'o//rigs kyi bu grong ngam/grong khyer ram/grong rdal lam/khyim mam/dgon pa'i gnas gang la lar chos
287b5(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de ni de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bzung ba yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo
287b6(mdo sde): rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bgyi ba ci'i slad du de skad ces bgyi lags//
287b7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/gang gi phyir 'di ltar 'jig rten thams cad la lta bar byed/rtog par byed/tshim par byed/yongs su skyong bar byed/yang dag par/
288a1(mdo sde): dbugs 'byin par byed cing /snying rje'i sems dang /bde ba'i sems dang /byams pa'i sems dang /snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan
288a2(mdo sde): la/bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas na de'i phyir spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes
288a3(mdo sde): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigaso dbang phyug gi ming tsam la rtog pa gang lags pa de'ang bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur na//
288a4(mdo sde): glang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par mchod pa dang /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mngon par dad pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /yi ger
288a5(mdo sde): 'dri ba dang /yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang /gos dang /rgyan gyi mchod pa chen po dag gis mchod par bgyid pa dang /rgyan gyis brgyan nas yi ger 'dri ba
288a6(mdo sde): dang /yi ger 'drir stsol ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
288a7(mdo sde): gis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mthu che ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las bgyid pa lags so//bcom
288b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/de ni nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbyangs
288b2(mdo sde): las blangs te/thos pa'i modo la'ang sa bcu thob par gyur la/srog chags stong phrag du mas kyang chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa'
288b3(mdo sde): de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gzungs mthu chen po bstan par gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bya ka la pIdi'i
288b4(mdo sde): sgra dang gudangs sgrogs pas gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa/tad+ya thA/dza ya dza ya/dza ya ba ha/kha ba ha/dza ya ba ha/hu lu hu lu/pad+ma paM/a ba ma ba maM/sA ro swa ra Ne/d+hi ri//
288b5(mdo sde): d+hi rli d+hi rId+hi raM/dwe bA tA a nu ba la ni/yud+d+ha ut+ta r-i Ne/pA ra tsakr-i ni pa ra Ne/pU ra ya b+ha gA bAn sarba a sha na/ma ma sarba karma k+ShA pa ya/bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA nI nasA hI//
288b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di ni rgyal po can zhes bya ba'i gzungs yin te/sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa/nor dang /'bru rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/pha rol bying myig
288b7(mdo sde): tshogs zlog par byed pa/mu ge'i gnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa/tshe nur bar byed pa ste/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yo ba yum dang 'dra ba'i chos
289a1(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs yin no//rigs kyi bu la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang /gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams la phyag 'tshal
289a2(mdo sde): zhing bsam pa yongs su dge pas mchod pa byed de/yi ger 'dri ba dang /yi ge ri 'drir 'jug pa dang /mchod pa chen pos chos smra ba de la mchod pa de ni
289a3(mdo sde): las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro//dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro//tshe 'di nyid la'ang bde ba myong bar 'gyur te/bus
289a4(mdo sde): yid bde bar 'gyur ba dang /chung mas yid bde bar 'gyur ba dang /khyim gyis yid bde bar 'gyur ba dang /rgyal srid kyis yid bde bar 'gyur
289a5(mdo sde): la/byasam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de naso bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces
289a6(mdo sde): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phyag 'tshal lo//chos smra ba de dag dang /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba rnams
289a7(mdo sde): dang /'chang ba rnams dang /klog pa rnams le'ang mchod par 'tshal lo//gang la li chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa bgyid pa dang /chos smra ba
289b1(mdo sde): de dag la'ang gos dang /rgyun rnams dang /gdugs dang /bzhon pa rnams kyis mchod par bgyid pa de dag gis ni/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/
289b2(mdo sde): la mchod pa bgyid pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das de ni bdug dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la'ang mchod pa'i mchog gis mchod pa bgyid pa lags
289b3(mdo sde): so//rgyal srid thams cad la'ang bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o//bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o//rgyal srid thams cad la'ang
289b4(mdo sde): mchod par 'gyur bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos nyan pa de dag gi don du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnamos rjes su stsal par 'tshal

289b6(mdo sde): can rnams kyi don gyi phyir smos shig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lhag na rdo rjes gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smos so//na maHsarba ta thA ga
289b7(mdo sde): ta nA/na mo a mi tAM b+ha yaM/ta thA ga tA ya/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa nAM/na maHsarba ma hA ri d+ha ke b+h+yaHtad+ya thA/hu hu~M hai he/ma ti ma ti/ma hA ma ti/
290a1(mdo sde): badz+ra ma ti/drid+d+ha badz+ra ma ti/ta thA ga ta a nu pa ri pa li te/sa ra sa ra/a yo mu khi b+h+r-i ku Ti/b+h+r-i ku Ta mu khi/kri pe kri bA mu khi/sad \u0f7f
290a2(mdo sde): ba tsa nA/ma nu sma ra/b+ha ga bAn badz+ra pA Ni/sarba karma a ba ra Na ni k+ShA ba/sArba a sha ma ba ra pu ra yaM/de he mAM pa ra ma/bud+d+ha sad N+ye ne/bo d+hi satwa
290a3(mdo sde): sAd t+ye na swA hA/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la byang chub sems dpa'i sa btsal 'tshal ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba dang /sangs rgyas
290a4(mdo sde): kyi zhing du skye ba dang /rgyal srid dang /longs spyod 'tshal ba dang yul gru 'tshal ba dang /nor 'tshal ba dang /'bru 'tshal ba des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
290a5(mdo sde): dang /chos smra ba de la mchod pa chen pos mtshod par ba gyi'o//gang yi ger 'dri ba dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa de la'ang spos dang /me tog phreng

290a7(mdo sde): de la ni bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o//rgyal srid thams cad la'ang ches mchod par 'gyur bar bgyi'o//ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du sems dang //
290b1(mdo sde): yid bde bar bgyi'o//bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o//gang la la bdag mthong bar 'chal ba dang /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ba

290b3(mdo sde): la mchi bar 'tshal ba des ni zla ba yar gyi ngo tshas brgyad la nyin mtshan du sbyang ba bgyis la gzugs bgyid du sprul te/rdo rje 'ching gi gzugs 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i
290b4(mdo sde): mdog can rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa/zhi ba'i tshul tsan sku gdung dang ldan par bgyi'o//dbus su ni de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa bzhugs par bgyu'o//
290b5(mdo sde): g.yas logs su ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa bzhi pa rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa/sku gdung dang bcas pa bzhag go//g.yas g.yon
290b6(mdo sde): dag tu ni rgyal po chen po bzhi mchod pa bgyid pa bzhag go//sgrub pa po'i rigs kyi bu des kyang gtsang spro bgyi ba dang /dus gsum du khrus bgyi ba dang /dus
290b7(mdo sde): gsum du gos brje bar bgyi'o//sems can thams cad la'ang byams pa'i sems su bgyi'o//zla ba yer gyi ngo ches brgyad nas brtsams te/zla ba
291a1(mdo sde): phyi ma'i nya tshes bcu lnga'i bar du zas su nas kyi'o thug 'tshal zhing /dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyu'o//bdug pa ni a ga ru dang /tsan+dan
291a2(mdo sde): dang rtse brog dang /gu gul dbul lo//lan sum 'bum gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi ste/de ni sngar bsnyen pa bgyi ba lags so//sku gdung dang ldan
291a3(mdo sde): pa'i mchod rten nam/dgon pa'i gnas su sus dang /bdug pa dang me tog sde tshogs dang /bre den sna tshogs kyis kyang mchod par bgyi'o//dkar
291a4(mdo sde): bag gi lta ba shes dag kyang dbul bar bgyi'o//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang yi ger 'dir stsal cing /gos dang rgyan dang /lteb lhub dang /gdugs
291a5(mdo sde): dang /bzhon pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa bgyi'o//de nas zla ba nya ba chus bco lnga'i bar du sems can thams cad la snying rje'i sems dang ldan
291a6(mdo sde): bya dang /dus gsum du khrus bgyi ba dang /dus gsum du gas brje bar bgyi ste/dkyil 'khor grwa gzhi pa b.lang gi lci bas bskyes la me tog sku
291a7(mdo sde): tshogs kyis khebs par bgyi ste/bum pa gang ba bcu drug dang /mer me bcu drug kyang gzhag par bgyi'o//gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba den tu
291b1(mdo sde): tshogs kyis kyangs phyogs de brgyan par bgyi'o//ro sna tshogs sbyar ba'i lha bshos rgya chen po phab la spros chab kyis phyogs der chag chag btab nas/nam sru
291b2(mdo sde): gzugs dang /so gzhi 'gul ba dang /bdag nyid kyang dga' bor gyur pa'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//de nas ris 'di ni gcig tu nges par 'grub byar
291b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro snyam du shes par bgyi'o//de nas de'i 'og tu bdag gis rmi lam du bstan par bgyi zhing 'bel ba'i gtam bgyi'o//bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs
291b4(mdo sde): su rdzogs par bgyi'o//bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o//dam pa ci 'tshal bya'ang stsal bar bgyi ste/gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la
291b5(mdo sde): mo dad cing spong bar bgyid pa ni ma gtogs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lag na rdo rje khyod kyis tshig de skad ces smras pa legs saM legs so//
291b6(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byang chub sems dpa' lug na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu chos kyi
291b7(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di ni sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyi yul na spyod par mi 'gyur ro//'di ni sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyis yi ger 'dri ba
292a1(mdo sde): 'am/yi ger 'drir 'jug pa 'am 'chang ba 'am/klog par mi nus te/de dag la bdud kyis bar chad byed par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu
292a2(mdo sde): bzhi po 'di dag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /nyan du 'jug pa'i bdud kyi las yin te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/lo lo
292a3(mdo sde): dang /ma dad pa dang /bla ma la sri zhu med pa dang /chos smra ba'i sems mi brtan pa ste/rigs kyi bu des de la bdud kyi las yin no snyam du shes par bya'o//
292a4(mdo sde): gzhan yang bdud kyi las bzhi yod de/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la 'dun pa med pa dang yid la mi byed pa dang /khengs pa'i
292a5(mdo sde): tshig smra ba dang /'jig rten 'di la sems pa ste/'di snyam du 'jig rten 'di la'ang 'jigs pa med do//'jig rten pha rol lo'ang 'jigs pa med
292a6(mdo sde): do//sdig pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang med do//bdag la tshig mi gsal ba'ang med do//yid rtul ba'ang med do bdag ni mdzes
292a7(mdo sde): pa yin ni//bdag ni dbang phyug dang ldan no snyam du sems shing /khyim dang bu smad rnams la zhen to//de dag ni bskal pa du mar sdug bsngal myong
292b1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/bzhi po de dag ni de dag gi mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par blta bar bya'o//gzhan yang bdud kyi las bzhi yod de/bzhi gang zhen/
292b2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/nor la brkam pa ste/de dag bskal pa du mar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dang /de dag mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang rgad cing smra ba dang /
292b3(mdo sde): chung mas yid bde ba dang /chos nyan pa de dag gi 'dun pa zlog par byed pa ste/'di lta ste/blon po dang /'khor rnams 'dus pa de dag gi thad du lhags
292b4(mdo sde): nas 'di skad du sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa med do chos smra ba 'di ni sdig pa byed pa dbang phyug gi rgyags pas myos pa 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa/phra ma la dga'
292b5(mdo sde): ba yin te/'di ni khyod kyi srog gi pir chad byed par 'dod la/khyod ni chos la gnas pa ste khyod kyis chos mang du byas so//khyod ni mdo sde klog pa dang /'drir
292b6(mdo sde): 'jug pa yin no zhes 'dzir te/de dag mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dror 'jug par mi byed/mchod par mi byed de de dag la ni tshe 'di nyid la'ang bar chad mang
292b7(mdo sde): po 'byung bar 'gyur la phyi ma la'ang sems can dmyal bar btso bar 'gyur te/de'ang rigs kyi bu ngos bdud kyi las yin par rig par byas la de'i
293a1(mdo sde): dbang du 'gyur bar mi bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/grogs po dag ngas lan gnyis ldan gsum du tshig gis bsgo
293a2(mdo sde): ste/bag yod par gyis shig/phyis sems can dmyal ba dag tu btso ba na 'gyod par gyur ta re/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa
293a3(mdo sde): 'di dag bka' stsal to//ngas ni mdo sde'i rgyal po mang po bstan//byang chub la ni sems can du ma bkod//sangs rgyas tshul yang nga yis bstan par gyur//
293a4(mdo sde): de thos nas ni bag kyang yod par gyis//khyod rnams phyi dus rab tu 'jig pa'i tshe//log par lhung bar 'gro bar gyur ta re//mdo 'di la ni rtag tu gang dang
293a5(mdo sde): pa//de ni nges par nga yi bu yang yin//mdo 'di la ni rtag tu gang mchod pa//de ni sangs rgyas zhing du'ang skye bar 'gyur//gang phyogs mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di/
293a6(mdo sde): gnas pa//der ni 'byung po gnod sbyin srin po dang //yi dgas grul bum lto 'phye chen po dang //gshed byed byang ste ma rnams kyis yongs mi tshugs//de ni
293a7(mdo sde): bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs shing //de ni bde bar byang chub 'tshang yang rgyo//de'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas/
293b1(mdo sde): chos kyi shugs kyis mchi ma blags te/lus 'dar bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
293b2(mdo sde): 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis chos smra ba de la mchod pa bgyi'o//chos nyan pa de dag la'ang bsrung bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gang la la chos kyi rnam
293b3(mdo sde): grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /yi ge 'drir stsol ba dang /gzungs 'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /chos smra ba de la'ang gos dang /rgyan
293b4(mdo sde): ngag gis mchod pa bgyid pa de la'ang bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o//de'i yul yang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o//nor dang 'bru thams cad kyang stsal bar
293b5(mdo sde): bgyi'o//bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o//g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad du'ang mdun du mchi bar bgyi'o//rgyal srid thams cad du'ang
293b6(mdo sde): ches bkur stir bgyid par 'gyur bar bgyi ste/bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bka' drini gzo bar bgyid kyi bka' drin mi gzo ba rA mi bgyid lags
293b7(mdo sde): so//bcom ldan 'das gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mchod pa mi bgyid pa dang /chos smra ba de dag la'ang mchod pa mi bgyid pa de la ni bdag
294a1(mdo sde): cag gis sems mi bye par bsko'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag la lcags so zhes bya ba byin te/rgyal po chen po ngas
294a2(mdo sde): legs so//rgyal po chen po dag khyod legs kyis rtag tu khyod kyis de ltar gyis shig/de nas dri za'i bdag po chen po yul 'khor srung gis bcom ldan 'das
294a3(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe sems can myi dge ba'i spyod pa dang /de
294a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la ma dad cing gri bar ma chud pa dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/de dag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'dzin par mi bgyid/klog par mi
294a5(mdo sde): bgyid yi ger 'drir stsol bar mi bgyid/sbyin pa sbyin par mi bgyid/sbyin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la yid mi ches shing /'jig rten 'di'i bde ba
294a6(mdo sde): la lta bar bgyid de/sems can de lta bu de dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po chen po 'di bka' stsal to//bcom ldan
294a7(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu chos gnyis kyis sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed de/gnyis gang zhe na 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang ste/
294b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos de gnyis kyis sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed do//rigs kyi bu chos 'di bzhis ni bde 'gror 'gro bar byed de/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta
294b2(mdo sde): ste/sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang /bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang /bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /tshangs par spyod pa
294b3(mdo sde): la gnas pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//rgyal chen sbyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che//ngan song dran 'gro kun
294b4(mdo sde): las rab grol byed//rmongs pa'i sems can rtag tu 'dod la chags//chags pa sna tshogs brgya yis de dag myos//mdo sde 'di la dad par mi byed cing //
294b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bston pa sbyin pa sbyin mi byed//sems can de 'dra ba dag dran song sar//skyes nas tshor ba dag kyang myong bar 'gyur//sems can de dag la ni
294b6(mdo sde): phan pa'i phyir//de ltar mdo sde mthu chen rab tu bstan//mdo sde 'di la rtag tu dad pa gong //de la gshed byed med cing sdig byed med//'byung po grul
294b7(mdo sde): bum lto 'phye chen po med//rgyal po de la sdig pa byed pa med//legs 'dri nyan du 'jug dang mchod pa dang //legs par 'dzin pa'i bsod nams gang
295a1(mdo sde): yin pa//sangs rgyas ye shes kyis ni bsngags pa de//sems can kun gyis bskal mang brjod ma nus//gang dag rtag tu sangs rgyas byang chub
295a2(mdo sde): rnams//rjed cing mchod pa byed pa de dag dang //la la gzhan 'gas mdo sde 'di nyid las//yi ge 'bru gcig tsam yang legs bris na//de la bsod nams snga ma
295a3(mdo sde): de yis ni//de yi brgya stong char yang mi phod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
295a4(mdo sde): dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dod de/me tog dang //
295a5(mdo sde): bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan rnams kyis mngon par mchod pa dang chos
295a6(mdo sde): smra ba de dag dang /'dri ba rnams dang /'dzin pa rnams la mchod pa chen pos mchod pa bgyid pa de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la yon tan dang phan yon mang po thob
295a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/de'i lus la mig nad dang /rna nad dang /lce nad dang /rims nad dang /dug dang /mtshon dang /mes mi tshugs lags
295b1(mdo sde): so//de dag la pha mas yid bde ba dang /bu dang chung mas yid bde ba dang khyim gyis yid bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur lags so//g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad
295b2(mdo sde): du'ang rgyal bar 'gyur ro//'gum pa'i tshe'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/kye mi khyod tshur shog/
295b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du song zhig/skyes bu chen po khyod ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bar ba dang ldan te/gang du 'dod pa'i gnas rnams su skye bar 'gyur
295b4(mdo sde): ro zhes gsungs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
295b5(mdo sde): legs so legs so//de bzhin gshegs pas 'di dzam+bu gling du bzhag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las bgyid pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das
295b6(mdo sde): rig sngags chen po 'di ni las thams cad rnam par dag par bgyid pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu 'di ni sems can bsod
295b7(mdo sde): nams chung ngu dag gi yul na spyod par mi 'gyur ro//sems can bsod nams chung ngu dag gis thos par mi 'gyur lag tu 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro//sangs
296a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus gang gi lag tu 'ongs sam/de bzhin gshegs pas nyan du bcug na/des thos pa'i mod kho na la 'dri bar bya/yi ger
296a2(mdo sde): 'drir gzhug par bya ba klag par bya'o//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming tsam thos na'ang ngan 'gros 'jigs
296a3(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ro//le la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las yig 'bru gcig tsam mu ma/ming tsam nyan du bcug gam/phyogs same/yul
296a4(mdo sde): 'ga' zhig tu lung 'bog par byed na de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o//de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dro ba kho nar mchod par
296a5(mdo sde): bya'o//de ni pha ma dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o//rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa bdun pa rnams kyis gsungs so//byang chub
296a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang ngo //lha thams cad kyis rjes su bzung ngo //yongs su bskyangs so//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub
296a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi pha ma lta bu'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje so 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
296b1(mdo sde): skad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par thams cad rdzogs par gang du spyod par 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
296b2(mdo sde): stsal pa/rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam glengs 'di ni klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas su thams cad rdzogs par gnas
296b3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//lho phyogs su'ang spyod par 'gyur ro//dzam+bu'i gling du ni cung zad tsam gnas par 'gyur te/gnas kha cig tu ni spyod kha cig tu ni mi spyod
296b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'dzi
296b5(mdo sde): gzung bar bya ba dang /bklag par bya ba dang /mchod par bya ba dang /nyan du gzhug par bya ba'i phyir khyod la gtad de//de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i
296b6(mdo sde): chos kyi rnamo grangs 'di nub par 'gyur ta re/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba byed pa yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag
296b7(mdo sde): na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi ba dang /bklag par bgyi ba dang /mchod par bgyi ba dang /
297a1(mdo sde): nyan du gzhug par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis gzung lags so//chos smra ba de dag la'ang mchod par bgyi/rjed par bgyi'o//gang chos
297a2(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di dang /chos smra ba de dag la mchid pa bgyid pa de ni bdag la'adra mchod pa bgyid pa lags te de ni bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi ste/yongs su
297a3(mdo sde): bskyang bar bgyi ste/bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bka' drin gzo bar bgyid do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la
297a4(mdo sde): legs so zhes bya ba byin te/lag na rdo rje legs so legs so khyod kyis de ltar gyis shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das lo byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa
297a5(mdo sde): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phyag 'tshal lo//chos nyan pa de dag dang /
297a6(mdo sde): yi ger 'dri ba rnams dang /'dzin pa rnams dang /klog pa rnams dang /nyan du 'jug pa rnams la'ang mngon par mchod par bgyi'o//bcom
297a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das gal te sems can bsod nams chung ngu dag gi yul du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byung ngam gal te rgyal po chos dang mi ldan pa'i yul du chos kyi
297b1(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di byung ste spyod pa na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rgyal po de mchod par mi bgyid/dad par mi bgyid la/chos smra ba de dag dang /yi ger 'dri ba rnams
297b2(mdo sde): dang 'dzin pa rnams dang /klog pa rnams dang /nyan du 'jug pa rnams dang /lung 'bog pa rnams la'ang mchod par mI bgyid/bla ma'i 'du shes skyed
297b3(mdo sde): par mi bgyid na/des na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub par 'gyur lags so//de'i yul du sdig pa'i chos mang po dang /yid myi bde ba mang po 'byung bar 'gyur
297b4(mdo sde): te/des na rgyal rigs rgyal po des bdag gi yul du chos nub par gyur to snyam du 'tshal bar bgyi ste/des chos spyad par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis
297b5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu legs so legs so//de ni de bzhin te/rigs kyi bu dper na rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can la le zhig gis de
297b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la lo brgya'am lo stong gri bar du bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod
297b7(mdo sde): pa byed la/dzam+bu'i gling 'di rin po ches yongs su gang bar byas te/nyan thos rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin pa dang bdag nyid yongs su
298a1(mdo sde): gtong ba gang yin pa dang /chung ma dang /bu dang /bu mo yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa dang /gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod pa 'am
298a2(mdo sde): yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'am/klog pa 'am/me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng ba rnams kyis mchod de chos kyi rnam
298a3(mdo sde): grangs 'di'i phyir zho'i brgyad cha gcig tsam sbyin pa byin na de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur te/dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma shos de ni brgya'i
298a4(mdo sde): char yang mi phod na/gang bla ma'i 'du shes bskyed de/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa byed
298a5(mdo sde): cing /chos smra ba de dag la'ang gos sum/rgyon nam/gdugs sam/bzhon pa 'am/grong ngom/grong khyer ram/sa gzhi ba lang gi rmi ga
298a6(mdo sde): rjes tsam yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir sbyin pa byed la/lus 'di ni snying po med pa'o snyam du shes shing rmi lam lta bu'o//sgyu ma lta bu'o//chu'i chu bur
298a7(mdo sde): lta bu'o snyam du shes te/lus 'di la ni snying po med do chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o snyam du shes na/de ni de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa kho na
298b1(mdo sde): yin no//de bzhin gshegs pas dbugs phyung ba kho na yin no//des ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa yin no//phyis kyang mthar gyis bla na med pa
298b2(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /lha'i dbang
298b3(mdo sde): po rnams dang /klu'i dbang po rnams dang /gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnams dang /lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang /nam mkha' lding gi dbang po rnams dang /
298b4(mdo sde): mi 'am ci'i dbang po rnams kyis tshig mthun par bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so//'di ni chos kyi
298b5(mdo sde): 'khor lo lan gnyis bskor bar gyur to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang gcig tu mthun par bgyis te/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod par bgyi'o//
298b6(mdo sde): yul de'ang bskyang bar bgyi'o//chos smra ba de la'ang mchod par bgyi/bsrung bar bgyi/lus bstan par bgyi/dbugs dbyung bar bgyi'o//gang la la chos
298b7(mdo sde): smra ba dang /yi ger 'dri ba dang /'dzin pa dang /klog pa de la bla ma'i 'du shes skyed pa dang /pha'i 'du shes dang /bu'i 'du shes skyed pa de la ni bdag gis
299a1(mdo sde): kyang pha'i 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o//gal te chos kyi rnam grangs de ma rung bar bgyid na ni de'i yul thams cad du bu dang mchis 'brang dang pha
299a2(mdo sde): ma'ang mi bde bar 'gyur la/de'i 'og tu sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /lha'i
299a3(mdo sde): dbang po nas ma'i dbang po'i bar de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin to/rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so//grogs po dag khyed kyis de ltar gyis shig/
299a4(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan du gzhug pa dang /mchod par bya ba'i phyir khyod la gtad do//de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myur du nub
299a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ta re/la la zhig gis spangs te/sems can dmyal bar lhung ba de/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la
299a6(mdo sde): bde bar 'gyur pa'o//khyed phyis 'gyod par 'gyur ta raM/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa ni/sa chen po 'di g.yos te/g.yos rab tu g.yos
299a7(mdo sde): so//srog tshogs drug stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 'phags
299b1(mdo sde): paspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /yi ger 'drir stsol ba
299b2(mdo sde): dang /'dzin pa dang /klag pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /gzhan la'ang rgyas par yang dag par ston pa dang me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spros
299b3(mdo sde): dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan rnams kyis mchod par bgyid ni/bcom ldan
299b4(mdo sde): 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ji skad cig skyed par 'gyur ljags/gAng du ni skye bar 'gyur lpags/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
299b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byon te/rigs kyi bu legs so legs so//khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di zhus
299b6(mdo sde): papopa ni legs so//rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon lo yod la gzung zhig dang /ngas khyod la bshad do//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
299b7(mdo sde): la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /gzhan dag
300a1(mdo sde): la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang /me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /
300a2(mdo sde): gos dang /gdugs dong /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa byed pa de ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du
300a3(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu gang lA las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po ches yongs su gang bar byas te/nyan thos
300a4(mdo sde): rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin pa bas ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /mchod pa dang yi ger 'dri ba dang /yi ge rA 'drir
300a5(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang /chos smra ba de dag la'ang me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa la sogs pas mchod pa 'di rigs kyi
300a6(mdo sde): bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams tshes mang du 'phel bar 'gyur gyi/rigs kyi bu snga ma gang yin pa des ni de snyed bsags pa ma yin no//rigs
300a7(mdo sde): kyi bu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad de/bu dang /bu mo dang /chung ma yongs su gtong ba
300b1(mdo sde): dang /lag pa dang /rkang pa dang /mig dang /mgo bo yongs su gtong ba bas ni gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri yi ger 'dri ba 'am/yi ger 'drir 'jug
300b2(mdo sde): gam klog gum/dad par byed pa 'di bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar 'gyur gyi/rigs kyi bu snga ma gang yin pa des ni de snyed bsngags pa ma yin no//
300b3(mdo sde): chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba kho nar blta bar bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba kho nar mchod pa mngon par 'du bya bar bya'o///

300b5(mdo sde): 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi bar 'os lags so//chos smra ba de'ang phyag bgyi ba dang
300b6(mdo sde): mchod par bgyi ba'i 'os lags so//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba lags te/de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo
300b7(mdo sde): dad pa can gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gus par bgyis te mnyan par bgyi'o//gus par bgyis te yid la bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs gang na
301a1(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod paSh+Ti sa phyogs de ni de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa lags so//sa phyogs de ni mchod rten du gyur pa
301a2(mdo sde): blta bar bgyi'o//sa phyogs da ni lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba'i gnas lugs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
301a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rigs kyi bus phyogs de ni lha dang /mI dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyug

301a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la'ang mchod pa bgyid la 'di'i slad du mchod pa dang bkur sti la brtson pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa yungs 'bru tsam

301a7(mdo sde): ro//bskal pa brgyad khri'i bar du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag po rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro//gshis
301b1(mdo sde): dran du 'gum par mi 'gyur ro//ngan song du skye bar mi 'gyur/bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
301b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa

303b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/tshigs kyang 'bye bar 'gyur/lto'ang chung bar 'gyur/skad kyi bcom yang chung bar 'gyur te/tshor ba de dag gis yongs su gzir
303b6(mdo sde): bya'i lus kyis de tsam du sdug bsngal gyi tsher ba myong bzhin du lus 'dzin par byed de/bu btsa' ba'i dus kyi bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong
303b7(mdo sde): ngo//ni de 'di snyam du sems te/gang gi tshe bdog gi bu btsa' bar 'gyur to/bdag bde bar btsas par gyur na de'i tshe tshangs por spyad par bya'o snyam mo///
304a1(mdo sde): de phyis yang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis chags par gyur pa na sdug bsngal de dag phyis mi dran te/bde ba'i 'du shes skyed par byed do//de bzhin

304a3(mdo sde): mi byed de/de dag sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro//de dag kyang 'dod chags kyis

304b1(mdo sde): dang /chung ma dang /bu dang /bu mo'i 'du shes kyang med/sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun yang mi dran te/de chang gis myos pa'i mthus dur khrod na 'dug na'ang

304b5(mdo sde): pas rnam par 'khrul pa nor gyis sems myos pa rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun yang yongs su tshol bar mi byed/sbyin po'ang mi dran//

305a2(mdo sde): de dag nas thar te/brgyal brgya lam na me'i lus thob par gyur pa de'i tshe mngal na gnas pas lus yongs su gzir cing mun nag gis skyo bar gyur pa'i

305a6(mdo sde): gis kyang sngon sdig pa mang du byas so snyam ste/de ltar mngal na gnas nas sems can dmyal ba dang 'dre bar 'gyod pa skyed par byed de/gang gi tshe

307a2(mdo sde): rgyas tshe dpag med ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/'jig rten gyi khams de ci'i phyir bde ba can zhes bya zhe
